'De "wliiɛjei ‑mɔ ɛ, ɔ 'bo ɔɔ' ‑cɛi" 'beeɛ‑ 'de ɔɔ' "wlii 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn. 'Kaa dɛ ‑jɛ ɔ 'je ‑kwlʋ o po ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ka ɔɔ' 'kmʋnɩa' ‑wee' nɩa 'e Kea 'kwa a. Ka sii" 'a ‑faɩn' a ‑kwlea "joo ‑tɩ ɛ, 'kamɔ ɔ nɩ‑.
‑Bo 'jrʋ 'wlʋ 'kwla ‑wɛe ɛ ‑te faan' ‑pʋn" 'sʋ ɛ, sii" jɛ', ‑wɛe ɛɛ' ‑faɩn' blu. 'Sʋ ɛɛ' ‑faɩn' 'a "jriinmɔa' ‑wee' sɔn i, 'kamɔ "wliiɛjei a mu dɛ i ‑pɔan' "sia' 'sʋ ɔ 'je isɔn‑.

Nyɔ dɛsaʋn a ‑cria' ‑wɛe ‑ɔ ‑kuua pɛe i mamaʋ 'sʋ ‑ɔ se ɛ nʋ ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑mɔ nʋ 'mʋa‑, dɛ‑nʋɛ' dɛ dɛsaʋn ‑tɩn' ɔ i, ‑wɛe ɔ nyna ‑sisi' ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑tɩ 'kmʋnɩa' ‑sea' ‑kwɛ ‑ta 'ble nɩ ɔɔ' ‑kei". Ɛɛ' ‑kei" tu mɛ Kea 'a ‑cɛ" 'kpa cɛn wlu ‑tie" ɛ 'na ɛɛ muɛ nyʋ ‑ʋʋ ‑kma ɛɛ' ‑tɩ' "nyɩa'.
‑Bo dɛsaʋn a sea nyɔ ‑cri' ɛ, ɔ 'bo wluɛ ka : Kea mɛ ɛɛ ‑tun" 'ʋn 'de dɛsaʋn 'di ! Dɛsaʋn se ɛ 'bɛɛ‑ ɛ 'je Kea i ‑tɩn'. 'De Kea se ɛ 'bɛɛ‑ ɛ 'je nyɔ 'e dɛsaʋn nʋa' "tun.
'Kaa nyɔ "o nyɔ dɛsaʋn a ‑cria', ‑mɛ dɩ ‑ɩa poo ɔ pɛe "i ɛ, ɩmɩ ‑a ‑cri ɔ, ‑wɛe ‑ɩa poo ɔ 'srɛ i.
'De ‑bo nyɔ "tai‑ tɔ' saɩn "i ‑wɛe ɩ 'je snɩ' ‑te' 'de ɔ 'ʋn ɛ, ‑mɛ ɛɛ muɛ dɛsaʋn 'wlʋa' see, 'de ‑bo dɛsaʋn ‑mɛ 'boa ‑boa ‑boa 'sʋ ɛ, ɛɛ poɛ 'mɛa' "jru "kpei‑.
'Ma de'di ‑wi" ‑ɔɔ ‑tɩ' 'ɩn kma, 'de dɩ ‑nɩa 'mʋa 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn ɛ, ao 'bo aoa' ‑cɛ" 'srɛ ipooɛ.
Dɩ 'dɔe 'a "kwli ‑wee' ke 'saaʋn ‑cɛɛn' a 'wlʋɛ 'e ‑a "Bo Kea ‑nɩa 'de jaʋn 'di 'kwa. Ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ‑sɔn' ‑nɩa 'e jaʋn 'di 'a nʋi, ɛ se fai" poo ‑ta 'ble. Ɛ nɩɛ 'e ‑sɔn' 'ʋn jeejee.
Ɛmɛ ‑nʋ' tɔ' ‑tɩ 'a wlu, ‑wɛe ‑ɛ ‑nyɩ" ‑aʋn 'kmʋnɩa' 'de ɛɛ' ‑cɛ" 'kpa 'a ‑kwlʋtɩ 'ʋn. Dɩ "klein ɛ nʋa, ɛ ‑kɔ' ‑na ‑apʋ ‑nɩ ɩa' "i‑saadɩ jɔ.
'Ma de'di ‑wi" ‑ɔɔ ‑tɩ' 'ɩn kma, ao sie ɛ ‑kwlʋ o, ao ‑wee' "klein ‑too"‑, ao 'je dɛ doin" o po, 'kaa ao ‑cnɛ' wlua' i, ao 'bo 'cɛn 'kpaa' ‑too"‑,
dɛ‑nʋɛ' nyɔ ‑ɔɔ ‑kpa 'cɛn ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔɔ' nʋ "isrɛdɩ 'de Kea "jri 'de.

Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ 'ma 'tmʋ aopʋ ‑wɛe ao 'je dɩ ‑a kpʋʋan nyʋ ‑flɛn" o, dɩsaɩn 'a "kwli ‑wee' kwa ‑sɔn ‑saa. 'De Kea 'a wlu nyʋ 'tmʋa 'de aopʋ ‑pee ɛ, ao 'je ɛ sɩn 'sɔɔn kpʋʋn 'de ‑cɛi" 'piia' 'ʋn ‑wɛe ɛ 'je 'sɩn po 'de ao pɛe o, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɛmɛ ‑bɛɛ' ‑ɛ ‑je aoa' ‑suu 'pʋʋ‑.
Kea 'a wlu aoa 'wɔan, ka ɛ "sia 'nynɩ ɛ, ao nʋ kan', ao 'bo ɛɛ' doin" o poa 'a 'sʋ kpaa. Ao 'bo aoa' ‑cɛ" pɛe 'di i ‑teɛ. ‑Bo aoa sea aoa' ‑cɛ" pɛe 'di i ‑te ɛ, ‑mɛ aoa pooɛ aoa' ‑cɛ" 'srɛ i,
dɛ‑nʋɛ' ‑bo nyɔ ɔ sea Kea 'a wlu doin" o po ‑wɛe ka ɛ "sia 'nynɩ ɔɔ' nʋ kan' a, ‑mɛ ɔ ‑kɔ' "jɩɩan‑ 'di ‑gbʋin.
Ɔ ‑kɔa' ɔɔ' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ nɩsʋn ja ‑gbʋan' 'de "jɩɩan‑ 'di 'sʋ ɛ, ɔ 'kpa 'o 'ɛ, 'sʋ 'bomɔ ɔ "sri ɔ je ɔɔ' nɩsʋn o"mae'‑, ɔ se dɛ jrɛ' nmae‑. 'De Kea 'a wlu ‑mɛ ɛ, ka "jɩɩan‑ nɩa, 'kamɔ ɛ nɩ‑.

Ɛ nɩɛ Kea 'a kɛ' ‑cɛɛn' ‑ɛɛ ‑nyɩa" nyɔ ‑cɛ" ‑pee‑tea' a. Nyɔ ‑gbʋan 'e ɛɛ' kɛ' tu 'di ‑wɛe ‑ɔɔ ‑jree" ɛ jeejee 'de nai" 'blea' 'ʋn ɛ, ‑mɔɔ nʋɛ dɛ ‑cɛɛn'‑. ‑Bo ɔ se dɛ doin" o poa 'a 'sʋ kpa a, dɛ ɔ nʋa 'dii, ‑bo ɔɔ' "mae'‑ ɛ o ‑wɛe ka ɛ "sia 'nynɩ, ɔɔ sea kan' nʋ ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔɔ' nyɔ tu ɛ, Kea a muɛ ɔ "diwan poa' 'de ɔɔ' nʋʋdbo 'ʋn.
'De ‑bo nyɔ 'na ɔɔ naa Kea 'a ‑jei" ‑wɛe ɔ se ɔɔ' mɩɩɔ "wɔin 'bɛɛ‑, ‑mɛ ɔ pooɛ ɔɔ' ‑cɛ" 'srɛ i, ɔɔ' Kea 'a ‑jei" naa' se dɛwɔn nɩ‑.

Kea 'a ‑jei" naa' ‑jɛ ‑nɩa dɛwɔn ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ‑bo "kwienynuu ke ‑tiɔn"nynʋkpae' nɩ 'e 'kle 'di ɛ, nyʋ 'je ʋʋpʋ "i ‑tee'‑. Dɛ ‑jɛ ‑a "Bo Kea a 'daa‑ ɛɛ' ‑jei" naa' ‑cɛɛn'‑, ɛmɛ ‑nao. 'De dɛ nyɔ 'jea nʋ ke'wlɛ ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ nyɔ 'je ɔɔ' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ ‑tɩ' ‑tu" 'de dɩsaɩn "klein ‑a kpʋʋan nyʋ ‑flɛn" 'nɔ 'kmʋ "kpei 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn.
'Ma de'di ‑wi", aopʋ ‑ɔ ‑tea ‑aa kɛɛma' Sesi Klisɩ ‑kwlɩ" ɛ, ao 'bo nyʋ i'craa.

Ao ‑gbʋn 'nɔ, nyɔ se o juo, "ko 'wɩ jrɛ' o 'sʋ "wliiɛjei due' pa 'de aoa' "jrui 'kɩɩn‑gbu 'di ‑wɛe 'sani‑cɩɛpodɛ nɩ 'de ɔ ‑cɩɛ, 'de ɔ ‑tu" "wliiɛ‑ 'dɔe ‑pʋn", ‑wɛe nɩɩa" nyɔ paa "saɩn‑sɩn 'ʋn 'de ɔ pa 'e aopʋ "klu ‑ke.

‑Bo ao ‑gbʋn nyɔ ‑ɔ ‑tua" dɩ 'dɔe ‑pʋn" ja ‑wɛe ao 'na : Klaa" ‑nɔ, ‑ɩn ‑jii ‑ta "kpa‑tɛ 'dɔe ‑nɛ "kpei, ‑ɩn ‑je i ‑te ! ‑Wɛe ao 'je wlu 'e nɩɩa" nyɔ ‑pee ao 'je nʋ : ‑Ɩn ‑nyna i ‑ta, 'de ‑ɩn ‑jii ‑ta 'ma "kpa‑tɛ ‑pʋn", ‑wɛe ‑ɩn ‑je i ‑te 'bo 'blʋɔ,
‑mɛ aoa 'cra nyʋ 'mii 'bo aoa' 'sʋ 'nynɩ. 'De ‑bo aoa sea kan' ‑mɔ nʋ ɛ, ‑mɛ tɔ' saɩn mɩ ‑a po aopʋ ‑je o, ‑wɛe aoa blaa ba 'blʋɔ.

Ao 'ma de'di ‑wi" ‑ɔɔ ‑tɩ' 'ɩn kma, ao po doin" i, nyʋ ‑ʋʋ ‑nɩa nɩɩa" nyʋ 'nɔ 'kmʋ "kpei ɛ, ʋʋpʋ Kea 'cra i, 'de ʋʋ 'je ɛɛ' ‑kwlɩ" ‑teʋn nɩ‑, ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'je kɛɛma' dɛ kpa ka ʋʋa' 'kɛn nɩa. Ɛmɛ Kea 'na ɛɛ muɛ nyʋ ‑ʋʋ kma ɛɛ' ‑tɩ' "nyɩa'.
'Kaa aopʋ mɔ ɛ, aoa' 'wɔn aoa' 'je nɩɩa" nyʋ dɛ 'ʋn. 'Mɔ 'na, "wliiɛjeʋn mʋ ‑ʋʋa bla aopʋ ‑tɩ' "kpei ‑wɛe ‑ʋʋ ‑ke aoa 'jrɛ 'pee 'je ‑gbi 'dii o, ‑aee' ɛ se kan' nɩɩ‑ ?
Klisɩ 'a 'nynɩ 'dɔe ‑nɩa aopʋ "kpei ɛ, ʋʋpʋ ‑a sɩ doaa ?
Ka Tʋ"bodɛ 'ɛ kɛ' "sia 'nynɩ, ‑bo aoa sea kan' nʋ ɛ, ‑mɛ nmɔ "jrii. Kea 'a wlu ‑crɩɩa' kɛ 'da ka, ɛ 'naa : ‑Ɩn ‑kma ‑ma ‑ponyiɔ 'ɔ ‑tɩ' ka ‑ɩn ‑kma ‑ma ‑cɛ" 'kpa 'a ‑tɩ' ɛ.
'Kaa ‑bo aoa sea nyʋ 'mii 'cra a, aoa nʋɛ dɛsaʋn, ao se kɛ' wɔn 'je, ‑mɛ 'pee kpʋn aopʋ 'mɛ,
dɛ‑nʋɛ' nyɔ "o nyɔ ‑je kɛ' ‑wee' wɔn ‑wɛe ‑ɔ sia 'o ɛ due' koun ‑gbai' ɛ, ‑mɛ ka nyɔ a sea ɩ ‑wee' wɔn 'je, 'kamɔ ɔ nɩ‑.
Tɔ' ‑o, "ju ‑ɔ ‑na' : ‑Ɩn ‑bo jɛi" 'jeeɛ, ɔmɔ ‑na : ‑Ɩn ‑bo "ku 'dbaa ‑ke. 'De ‑bo ‑ɩn se jɛi" 'je, ‑wɛe ‑ɩn ‑je "ku 'dba a, ‑mɛ ‑ɩn ‑saa kɛ' 'mɛ.
'De aoa' wlusʋn ke aoa' nasʋn 'ʋn ɛ, ka kɛ' ‑ɛ ‑nyɩa" ‑aʋn ‑cɛ" ‑pee ‑tea' ‑wɛe ‑ɛ ‑jea ‑aa 'pee 'je 'da a, ‑a nʋ kan',
Nyɔ ‑ɔɔ' 'jea nyʋ 'a wɛe ɛ, ‑bo nyʋ a sea ɔɔ' 'pee 'je ɛ, nyʋ se ɔɔ' wɛe 'jei ‑ke. ‑Bo nyɔ 'je nyʋ 'a wɛe ɛ, ɛ "paa', ɛ je nyʋ 'a 'pee 'jea' ‑sii.
'Ma de'di ‑wi", ‑bo nyɔ 'na ɔ ‑teɛ Kea ‑kwlɩ", 'de ɛ se "jri "kpae' po 'de ɔɔ' kplɩn 'ʋn 'ee, ɛɛ' Kea ‑kwlɩ" ‑tea' tu 'beeɛ' ɛ 'je ɔ 'pʋʋ‑ ?
"Ko aoa' de 'di nmɔu jrɔ' ke aoa' de'di nynɔkpao' ‑nɩ 'e aopʋ "klu, ‑wɛe ‑ʋʋ se 'ʋnpaadɩ ke diidɛ 'ble ɛ,
'sʋ aoa' due' wlu' 'de ʋʋ ‑pee ɔ 'na : Ao mu 'de pɛe 'dɔe 'ʋn ! Ao 'je dɛ "kpei‑ 'wla ‑wɛe ao 'je dɛ di, ao 'je dbo ! 'De ‑mɔ se ʋʋpʋ dɛ ‑ɛɛ ‑tɩ' kma ʋʋpʋ "bli "nyɩ 'ee, ‑mɛ dɛ ‑mɛ 'da‑ ?
'Kamɔ ɛ nɩ‑ 'de Kea ‑kwlɩ" ‑te' ‑tɩ 'ʋn ‑ke. ‑Bo ɛ se nʋʋdbo 'ble ‑wɛe ɛ 'je wɔn 'di poɔɔ' 'sʋ nɩ ɛ, ‑mɛ ɛ 'mɛɛ.

"Ko nyɔ jrɔ' 'bɛɛ‑ ɔ 'je wlu ka, ɔ 'e nʋ : 'Ɩn ‑teɛ Kea ‑kwlɩ" ɛ sie kan', 'de ‑mɔ ‑ma a nʋɛ dɩ 'dɔe. "Ju ‑wlua kan' a, 'ma muɛ ɔ ‑pee wlua' 'ɩn 'je nʋ : ‑Bo ‑ɩn ‑te Kea ‑kwlɩ" ‑wɛe ‑maa' po ɛ "kpae' 'de ‑ma nʋʋdɩ 'ʋn 'ee, ‑mɛ ka nyɔ 'je ɛɛ' 'jesʋn nʋ ɛ‑ ? Ka Kea ‑kwlɩ" ‑tea' nɩa 'de ‑ɩn 'ʋn ɛ, nyɔ jrɔ' se ɛ 'bɛɛ‑ ɔ 'je ɛ juo‑. 'Mɔ 'na ‑ɩn ‑bɔ ke, 'ma muɛ ‑ʋn 'ma Kea ‑kwlɩ" ‑tea' tɔɔa' 'de 'ma nʋʋdɩ 'ʋn.
Ka Kea nɩa due' koʋn ‑gbai' ɛ, ‑ɩn ‑je ɛ tɔ' 'ʋn 'ɛ, ‑mɛ nmɔi", 'kaa ‑siɔn 'ɔ ‑sii 'je ɛ tɔ' 'ʋn ‑ke, 'kaa faʋn a nʋ ɩ, ɩa dɩ a crɛ'.
'Oo nyiɔ, ka ‑ɩn se tɔ' ‑tuu" 'ble kan' a ! Ka Kea ‑kwlɩ" ‑tea' ‑sea' nʋʋdbo 'ble ‑mɛ nɩa wɔn 'dipoɔ' ɛ, ‑ɩn se ɛ "inɩ ‑ɩn ‑je ɛ 'mii 'wɔn ?

‑Ɩn ‑gbʋn 'nɔ, 'de ‑a 'mɩa Ablaam 'a nʋʋdɩ 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn mɔ Kea 'dɔɔ‑ "isrɛi. ‑Ta ɔ 'wɔɔan ɔɔ' "ju Isaakɩ 'sraa‑ 'ʋn‑saatɩ ‑wɛe ɔ kpɔ mamaʋ 'sʋ ɔ nynia 'o 'sraa‑sa'ɩn 'bomɔ ɔ ‑tee Kea ‑kwlɩ" ka ɛ kmai".
Ka ɔ 'jea Kea 'a ‑tɩ' tɔ' 'ʋn ɛ, ɔɔ' nʋʋdɩ mɩ ‑toɛ. Ka ɛ nʋa ‑wɛe ɔɔ' nʋʋdɩ nynia ɔɔ' Kea 'a ‑tɩ' tɔ' 'ʋn 'jea' "i, 'ka ‑nao.
Ka ɛ 'crɩɩa' 'de Kea 'a 'sbɛ 'di 'ka ka : Ablaam ‑teɛ' Kea ‑kwlɩ", ɛmɛ ‑tɩ Kea nʋ ɔ "isrɛi 'ʋn, ‑wɛe ɛɛ 'dɔɔ‑ ɛ ba.
Aoa 'jee, ‑bo nyiɔ 'kpa "isrɛi 'bo Kea "juɔi ɛ, ‑mɛ 'de ɔɔ' nʋʋdɩ 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn ‑o, ɛ se 'de ɔɔ' Kea ‑kwlɩ" ‑tea' 'a 'sʋ 'ʋn nɩ‑.

'Kamɔ ɛ nɩ ‑ke 'de ‑kwlɔite 'nynɔ Raabʋ 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn. ‑Bo Kea 'dʋʋ "isrɛ nynɔkpao' 'bo ɛ "juɔi ɛ, ‑mɛ 'de ʋa' nʋʋdɩ 'ʋn ‑o. ‑Ta ʋ "nyɩa nyʋ Sosue dboa ‑teɩn, ‑wɛe ʋ tɔɔa ʋʋpʋ ‑je jrɛ' ɛ, 'bomɔ ʋa' Kea ‑kwlɩ" ‑tea' poo "jri "kpae' ‑ke.
Tɔ' ‑o, ka 'blʋku ‑suu sea 'ʋn nɩ 'mɛa, 'kamɔ ‑bo nyiɔ 'ɔ Kea ‑kwlɩ" ‑tea' se "jri "kpae' po 'de ɔɔ' nʋʋdɩ 'ʋn ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔɔ' Kea ‑kwlɩ" ‑tea' ‑nɛ 'mɛɛ ‑ke.
'Ma de'di ‑wi", nyʋ ‑tuu"‑tuu 'bo 'de aopʋ "klu nɩɛ, ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'bo nyʋ dɛ tɔɔa' i‑pɔɛn, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ao 'je kan' 'mɛ ‑apʋ ‑ɔɔ tɔɔa nyʋ dɛ ‑aa 'pee a muɛ "ikmaa' ɛ 'je nyʋ jrʋ' ‑sii.
‑A ‑wee' "klein a ‑si' ‑tɩ' "i 'mɛ due 'due 'de ba ‑pee 'de dɩ ‑tuu"‑tuu 'ʋn. Nyɔ ‑ɔɔ' ‑sia ‑tɩ' "i 'de ɔɔ' 'tmʋ‑tɩ 'ʋn ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔɔ' nyiɔ tu nɩɛ 'pepe, ɔ 'bɛɛ‑ ɔɔ' ku "wɔin 'bɛɛa' 'mɛ ‑ke.
Ao ‑gbʋn 'nɔ ‑bo ‑a ‑nɩɛi" ‑wɛe soo" 'je ‑a wɔn 'je 'sʋ ɛ, ‑a ‑jaa ɛ ‑ka'pee 'wɔn, 'kamɔ ‑bo ‑a nʋ ɛ, ‑wɛe ‑aa po soo" ‑wee' ‑je o.
'Bo ‑mɛ 'de ɛ, ao naa ‑bato' 'a ‑tɩ' tɔ' "kpei‑ ke'wlɛ. Ɛ 'bɛi", ‑wɛe ‑bo ‑sɔn' jrɔ' ɔ, poɔ' klaa" a "tun ɛ ‑tajrɔ. 'Kaa nɩɩɛ dɛ‑saan" ka mɛ ‑ɛɛ po ɛ ‑je o, ‑wɛe ‑ta ɛɛ' tbaai nɩai" ɛ, 'de ɛɛ muu 'o.
Aoa 'jee, 'kamɔ mɩɩɔ nɩ ‑ke 'bo nyiɔ ‑pʋn". Ɛ 'piiɛ "i, 'kaa ɛ 'beeɛ' ɛ 'je wlu klae" klae" 'tmʋ. Ka nɛ dɛ‑saan" ka 'bɛɛa ɛ 'jea 'kwlajeea "jri po ɛ, ao nɛɛ tɔ' "kpei‑ ‑ke.

Ka nɛ nɩa, 'kamɔ mɩɩɔ nɩ ‑ke. 'Bo mɩɩɔ "kpei mɔ dɩsaɩn 'a "kwli ‑wee' a 'wlʋ. Mɩɩɔ 'ɔ dɛ tu ‑nɩa 'o nyiɔ ‑pʋn" ɛ, ɛɛ ja nyiɔ nʋʋa' o, ‑wɛe ɛɛ kpʋʋn nyiɔ ‑flɛn". Dɛ ‑tba' 'e nyiɔ 'ɔ 'wlʋa' o ɛ, ɛɛ' nɛ tu ‑tbaa' 'bo ɔɔ' mɩɩɔ "kpei ‑wɛe ɛɛ jɔ ‑tɩ' ‑pʋn", dɛ‑nʋɛ' nɛ ‑ɛ 'ʋn ‑siɔn' 'jea mu ɛ, 'demɔ ɛ 'wlʋ.
Nyiɔ 'bɛɛ‑ ɔ 'je 'kwla 'dinmi 'a kpɛ ‑wee' kplɩn ‑tuu"‑, ‑wɛe ɩ 'je ɔ wɔn 'je : nmi o, nʋʋɩ o, cniɛ ‑pɛɛ' o, ‑smii' o, nyiɔ ‑tuu"‑ ɩ kplɩn 'mɛ ‑wɛe ɩa 'je ɔ wɔn,
'kaa mɩɩɔ ‑mɛ ɛ, nyɔ se ɛ 'bɛɛ‑ ɔ 'je ɛ kplɩn ‑tuu"‑. Mɩɩɔ nɩɛ nyʋ 'kle "kpei jadɛ ‑o. Ɛɛ' ‑te ‑tadue i. Dɛ jrɛ' ‑nɩ 'e mɩɩɔ 'ʋn ‑ɛ ‑ke sɛn 'ɛ ‑ku' ‑kooɔ'‑, ‑wɛe ‑ɛɛ ‑dba nyʋ.
Mɩɩɔ mɛ ‑aa nʋ ‑wɛe ‑aa po ‑a "Bo Kea ‑ɛ ‑nɩa ‑aa Tʋ"bo 'sɛ‑, ‑wɛe nyʋ Kea nʋa 'de ɛɛ' ‑kooɔ' i 'ʋn ɛ, 'de ‑aa poo ʋʋpʋ ‑soo' o.
Wɔn due' koun ‑nɛ ɛmɛ ‑ɛɛ po nyʋ "diwan, ɛmɛ ‑ɛɛ poo nyʋ ‑soo' o. 'Ma de'di ‑wi", ɛ 'bo kan' ‑mɔ nɩɛ 'bo ‑a ‑nynɩ.
"Ni 'dɔe ke "ni saʋn 'beeɛ' ɩ 'je 'o "kao‑ due' wɔn 'wlʋʋ ? "Ɩɩn‑, ɛ se kan' nɩ‑.
'Ma de'di ‑wi", 'mawlotu se ɛ 'bɛɛ‑ ɛ 'je ‑kwɛn' mua" cro, 'de ‑kao se ɛ 'bɛɛ‑ ɛ 'je 'mawlobuo cro‑. 'Tɔni se ɛ 'bɛɛ‑, ɛ 'je 'dɩɩ.
‑Bo ao 'na ao nɩɛ tɔ'di ‑wɛe ao juo dɛ "i ɛ, ‑mɛ ao to ɛ 'de aoa' 'kmʋ 'ʋn. Aoa' tɔ'di nɩa' 'je "jri "kpae' po 'de ‑cɛ" ja jaa' ke pɛe 'dɔe 'ʋn.
'Kaa ‑bo ao 'bɛɛ‑ aoa' ‑cɛi" ‑wɛe ao 'na ao nɩɛ tɔ'di, 'de aoa' ‑kwlɛn nʋ pɛe ke aoa' "cɛi nʋ pɛe a sea aopʋ i 'sʋan a, ‑mɛ aoa 'tmʋɛ sɩ, tɔ' ‑tɩ se 'de aopʋ 'ʋn nɩ‑.
‑Bo aoa sea dɩ ‑nɩa kan' ‑mɔ nʋ ɛ, ‑mɛ aoa' tɔ' 'dinɩa' se 'e jaʋn 'di 'wlʋ, ɛ 'wlʋɛ 'nɔ 'kmʋ "kpei. Ɛ nɩ aoa' nyiɔtɔ' ‑o, ɛ 'wlʋɛ 'e ‑siɔn' 'ʋn,
dɛ‑nʋɛ' ‑ta ba ‑kwlɛn o nʋa' ke ba "cɛi o nʋa' nɩa, 'bomɔ ‑puaa' ‑pua ‑puaa' ke dɩsaɩn 'a "kwli ‑wee' nɩ‑.

Tɔ' ‑jɛ ‑wlʋa 'e jaʋn 'di ‑mɛ ɛ, ɛ nɩɛ 'pepe, ‑flɛn" se ɛ ‑pʋn" nɩ‑ ‑wɛe ɛɛ ‑pɔn pɛe 'a blua' i. Ɛɛ' ‑pɔn ‑kɩn i, ɛɛ ‑teɛ nyiɔ 'ɔ ni', ɛɛ 'jeɛ nyʋ 'a wɛe‑, ɛɛ nʋɛ dɩ 'dɔe ‑tuu"‑tuu. Ɛɛ' nʋ nyʋ "cɛi o, ɛɛ' 'cra nyʋ 'mii, ɛɛ' poo "jri de.
Nyʋ ‑ʋʋa ‑pɔan pɛe 'a blua' i 'bo ʋʋ ke ʋʋa' ‑ponyiɔ 'nynɩ ɛ, ʋʋa' ‑cɛ" 'kpa 'a pɛe blu', ʋʋa' 'kmʋ a muɛ 'e Kea "jri 'dei nmɔɔa'.
‑Taka tʋ ke ‑cɛa' a 'wlʋ 'de aopʋ "klu ɛ‑ ? Aoa' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ 'tʋn nʋdɩ ‑ɩa ‑fɔan' ‑gba 'de aopʋ 'ʋn, ɩmɩ ‑a nʋɛ ‑wɛe tʋ ke ‑cɛa' a 'kpa 'de aopʋ "klu.

Ao ‑nɩɛi" ao 'je dɩ 'ble, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɩa pooa aopʋ pɛe "i, 'kaa aoa' 'ble ɩ 'sʋ aoa 'dba "ku, aoa nʋɛ ba ‑kwlɛn o. Ao 'bleɛ dɛ i ‑pɔan' 'a 'kpɩ, 'kaa aoa' 'je dɛ aoa ‑pɔan' i ɛ, dɛ‑nʋɛ' aoa ‑cɛ' ba o ‑wɛe aoa ‑fɔn' ba tʋ o. Dɛ ao nɩai" ɛ, aoa' 'je ɛ, dɛ‑nʋɛ' aoa' ‑tee' Kea dɛ i.
Dɛɛ‑tɩ ‑bo ao ‑tee' dɛ i 'de aoa' 'je ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ aoa ‑tee' ɛ i ka saʋn ka‑, ‑wɛe ao 'je ɛ aoa' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ ‑kwlʋtɩ 'ʋn nʋʋ‑.

Ao ‑gbʋn ka aoa' kpʋan wlu "kpei‑ i ɛ ! Ka nyʋ ‑a ‑pɔan dɩ 'a kpɛ 'sɔɔn i ‑tadue nɩa, 'kamɔ ao nɩ‑. ‑Bo ao ke 'kmʋ "kpeidɩ dbɛɛ ɛ, ‑mɛ ao ke Kea 'nyɛɛa 'ʋn ɛ, ao se ɛ juoo‑ ? Nyɔ ‑ɔ ‑nɩai" ‑ɔ ‑jea 'o 'kmʋ "kpeidɩ 'de bla 'ja a, ‑mɛ ɔ ke Kea se dbɛɛ.
Wlu ‑crɩɩa' 'de Kea 'a 'sbɛ 'di ɛ, ɛ 'naa :
Kea 'a ‑Suu ɛ "nyɩa ‑aʋn ɛ, ɛ 'bleɛ ‑kwlɛn, ɛ ‑nɩɛi" ‑aa 'kmʋ ‑wee' 'je ɛɛ' ‑tea' ‑te.
Aomɔ naa tɔ' i, ‑bo Kea 'a wlu 'da kan' 'ee, ‑mɛ foo" 'ʋn ‑tɩ' ‑oo ?
"Ɩɩn‑, ɛ se kan' nɩ‑, 'kaa nyʋ ‑kma Kea 'a ‑tɩ' ɛ, ɛ nʋɛ ‑wi" ‑mʋ 'saaʋn ‑cɛɛn' "jrii, 'kamɔ wlu ‑crɩɩa' 'da, ɛ 'naa :
Kea a ‑fɔn' ‑cɛi" 'bɛɛʋn o. 'Kaa ɛɛ 'jeɛ nyʋ ‑ʋʋa ‑piia' ʋʋa' ‑cɛi" 'a wɛe‑.
‑Bo ɛ nɩ kan' ‑mɔ 'ja a, ‑mɛ ao jaa "jru ja 'de Kea ‑pee, ao ‑fuun ‑siɔn' nya ‑wɛe ɔ 'je aopʋ kɩɩn tɛɛn‑.
Ao 'kpa Kea ‑pʋn", ‑wɛe ɛ 'je ao ‑pʋn" 'kpa. Ao dɛsaʋn nʋʋ, ao ‑sa dɩsaɩn 'a ‑flɛn" kwa i ! Ao "jridepooʋn, ao wɔɔ aoa' pɛe !
Ao nɩ 'e "jrii "kaea' 'ʋn, ao ‑fɩn", ao kplee‑, aoa' 'keeɛ nynɩ ‑srɛɛn 'kwɛ‑ paa' 'ʋn, ‑wɛe aoa' 'mʋa‑ 'je "jrii "kaea' 'ʋn ‑srɛɛn.
Ao jaa aoa' ‑cɛ" ja 'bo Tʋ"bo ‑sɔn ‑wɛe ɛ 'je aopʋ "jɛi kpa.

'Ma de 'di‑wi", ao 'bo ba cɩɩɛn. Nyɔ ‑ɔɔ dooa ɔɔ' de'di 'a 'nynɩ, ‑wɛe ‑ɔɔ ‑jea ɔɔ' 'pee ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔɔ blaa Kea 'a kɛ' wɔn i, ‑mɛ ɔɔ wluuɛ Kea 'a kɛ' 'dei. 'De ‑bo ‑ma sea Kea 'a kɛ' 'dei wluu ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑ɩn se ɛɛ' wɔn'jei nɩ‑, ‑ma ‑jeɛ ɛɛ' 'pee.

'Kaa 'pee 'jei nɩɛ due' koʋn ‑gbai', ɛmɛ ‑nɩ Kea. Nyɔ "o nyɔ jrɔ' se ɛ 'bɛɛ‑ ɔ 'je ɔ ‑ponyiɔ 'pee kpʋʋn‑. Kea ‑ɛ ‑nyɩa" nyʋ kɛ' ɛ, ɛɛ' 'sʋ mɛ ‑bɛɛ' ‑ɛ ‑je nyʋ 'pʋʋa' "nyɩ 'de ‑ɛ ‑bɛɛ' ‑ɛ ‑je nyʋ i‑sa. ‑Mɔ ‑ɔɔ kpʋʋan ɔ ‑ponyiɔ 'pee ɛ, dɛ ‑ma ‑daa' ‑ma ‑cɛ" ɛ‑ ?
Ao po 'ma wlu doin" o la, aopʋ, kaan ‑ɔ ‑na : ‑Sɩan wɩ o, ‑klae"‑ o, ‑aa muɛ 'o ‑kwlɔ ‑nɛ 'di mua', ‑wɛe ‑a ‑je 'dɔɔ po, 'de ‑a ‑je 'wɛi 'je.
Dɛ ‑ɛɛ mua ao "jrii nʋʋa' ‑klae" ɛ, ao se ɛ juo‑. Dɛ aoa' 'kmʋ nɩ 'ʋn ‑ɛ ? Ɛ ‑kɔ' "ni smua 'a fuu". ‑Bo ɛ mu "jɛi dɛ‑saan" ka 'sʋ, ɛ cɩɛn i.
Ka ‑jɔ ao 'jea 'da 'de ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ : ‑Bo Kea ‑nɩɛi" ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑aa muɛ 'kmʋnɩa' ‑wɛe ‑a ‑je dɛ ‑jɛ ke dɛ ‑nɩ nʋ.
'Kaa kaan ka aoa' 'bɛɛ‑ aoa' ‑cɛi" 'de tɔ klae" 'ʋn. ‑Cɛi" 'bɛɛa' ‑jɛ ‑nɩa kan' ‑mɔ ɛ, ɛ nyniɛ "jrii.
Nyɔ ‑jua dɛ 'dɔe ‑ɔ ‑jea nʋ 'pepe ‑wɛe ‑ɔ se ɛ nʋ ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑mɔ nʋɛ dɛsaʋn.
Aomɔ "wliiɛjeʋn kaan la ! 'Kle ‑ɛɛ mua aopʋ "kpei jia', 'de ɛɛ' ‑tɩ' 'ʋn ɛ, ao ‑fɩn", ao kplee‑.
Aoa' "wlii‑ ‑sɔɔn, ‑wɛe wlɔn di aoa' 'ʋnpaadɩ.

Aoa' 'sani ke aoa' 'wɛi kpʋɛn 'kɩn. Ɩa' 'kɩn ‑nɩa 'mʋa‑ ɩmɩ ‑a mu aoa' "kpei ‑tɩ 'tmʋi nɩa' 'pee 'jewɩ o, ‑wɛe ɩ 'je ao ‑siian', ka nɛ ɛ siian dɩ ɛ. Aopʋ de 'bɔɔ ‑sɔn nɩa 'e nyʋ "jru, ‑wɛe ‑ɔɔ ‑sii" a "wlii‑ ‑pɔan 'a "jru i ke mamaʋ ɛ, ao ‑gbʋn 'nɔ !
Nyʋ ‑ʋʋa nʋa dbo 'de aopʋ o ‑kle' ɛ, ʋʋa wluuɛ 'mii, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ao se ʋʋpʋ ‑kei" ‑sa. Ʋʋa' ‑fɩn" wlu mu' mamaʋ 'sʋ ɛ je 'e 'kmʋ ‑wee' "klein 'a Tʋ"bo doin" 'kpa.
'De 'kmʋ "kpei aopʋ nɩa dɩ ‑wee' "klein siiɛ aopʋ i. Dɛ ‑ɛ nʋa aopʋ 'tʋn ɛ, aoa nʋɛ'. Ao diɛ dɩ 'dɔe ‑di'pɛn 'sʋ ao je 'cna pa pɔn pɔn, 'de ‑mɛ 'kamɔ aoa' 'mɛ nɔ" "kʋʋan‑ i.
"Isrɛi ‑ɔ sea 'bɛɛ‑ ‑ɔ ‑jea ɔɔ' ‑cɛ" "kpei‑ 'tʋan‑ 'de ao 'kwa a, ao kpʋʋn ɔ 'pee, ‑wɛe ao 'dbɔ.

'Ma de'di ‑wi", ao kuu pɛe i mamaʋ 'sʋ Tʋ"bo 'je de ji. Aoa 'je ‑tiɔnʋi 'mɛɛ ? ‑Bo ɔ po ko 'de ‑kle ɛ, ɔ kuuɛ tɔ' i mamaʋ 'sʋ ɔɔ jea ɩa' ‑flu" nɔ" fuo, ɛmɛ ‑kɔn ‑tɩ'. Tɔ' due' ‑nɛ ɛmɛ ɔɔ kuu i mamaʋ 'sʋ ‑kua" a jea 'nɔ ‑sɔn 'kpa.
Aopʋ mɔ ‑ke ɛ, ao kuu pɛe i, dɛ‑nʋɛ' Tʋ"bo 'a deji nɔ" se o tɛɛn‑.
'Ma 'cɛ, ao 'bo ba 'dei wluuɛ, ‑wɛe Kea je aoa' 'pee 'je. Ao ‑gbʋn 'nɔ, 'pee 'jei ‑teɛ ji ‑tɩ. Ɔ nɩɛ 'o ‑gbɛin" ‑jei".
'Ma 'cɛ, Kea 'a wlu 'kwajaaʋn ‑ʋʋ ‑tmʋa Tʋ"bo 'a ‑tɩ' tɛin" ɛ, ao po ʋʋpʋ 'a ‑tɩ' ‑kwlʋ o, 'bo ʋʋpʋ "kpei mɔ ao 'je 'kle 'jea' 'cɩan‑ 'de pɛe "wɔin 'bɛɛa' 'ʋn.

Aoa 'jee, nyʋ ‑ʋʋ ‑kuua tɔ' i 'de 'kle 'di ɛ, "diwan nyʋ ‑o, ‑aa poɛ ʋʋpʋ ‑tɩ' o. Ka Sɔbʋ kuua pɛe i ɛ, ao 'wɔɛn', 'de 'dɔe ‑jɛ Kea "nyɩ ɔ de'bɔɔ‑ nɔ" ɛ, ao juo ‑mɛ 'mɛ. 'Ma 'cɛ, Kea nmɔ 'di wɔn, ɛɛ 'jeɛ nyʋ 'a wɛe‑.

Dɛ ‑jɛ ‑kɔan ‑tɩ' ke'wlɛ ‑wɛe 'ma 'tmʋa 'de ao ‑pee ɛ, 'ma de'di ‑wi", ɛmɛ ‑nɩ, ao 'bo 'blʋa‑ ke jaʋn 'ʋn ‑snɛɛn ɛ. Dɛ ao 'jea nʋ ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ aoa' kɩɩn nɩ kɩɩn, aoa' "ɩɩn‑ nɩ "ɩɩn‑, ‑wɛe 'pee je aopʋ kpʋn.
‑Bo nyɔ jrɔ' nɩ 'e aopʋ "klu, ‑wɛe ɔ nɩ 'de 'kle 'di ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔ 'tmʋ ɛ 'de Kea ‑pee 'de baewlu 'di. 'De ‑bo jrɔ' nɩ 'de 'mʋa‑ 'ʋn ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔ ble, ɔ 'je Kea 'a 'nynɩ "i 'bɛɛ‑.
‑Bo nyɔ jrɔ' nɩ 'de aopʋ "klu ‑wɛe ɔɔ' dɛ ɛ sea pooa a, ‑mɛ ɔ 'da Kea ‑gbu 'a nyʋsoa ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'je ɔ 'cna "jru po 'de Tʋ"bo 'a 'nynɩ 'ʋn, ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'je ɔɔ' Kea bae‑.
‑Bo ʋʋ bae Kea 'de ɛɛ' ‑kwlɩ" ‑tea' 'ʋn ɛ, 'wɛ‑nʋi ‑nɔ ɔɔ muɛ 'pʋʋa'. Tʋ"bo a mu ɔ kui‑sɔn iflɔan' "nyɩa'. Ɛ 'je ɔ "jɛi kpa, ‑wɛe ‑bo ɔ nʋ dɩsaɩn ɛ, 'de ɛ 'jɩ ‑kɔ'.
Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ ao 'je aoa' dɩsaɩn 'a ‑kɩn cɛn 'de ba ‑pee, ‑wɛe ao 'je ba 'a Kea bae 'de ao 'je 'pʋ. ‑Bo nyɔ ‑srɛi" ɛ, ɔɔ' baewlu a cɛn dɛ.

Kea 'a wlu 'kwajaai Eli nɩɛ nyiɔ ‑o, ka ‑a ‑nɩa, 'kamɔ ɔ nɩ‑. 'Wɩ jrɛ' o ɛ, ɔ baeɛ Kea i, ‑wɛe "ni se dbai, 'sʋ 'bo ɔɔ' baewlu "i ɛ, "ni se dba ‑cɛɛn'‑ 'de 'blʋa‑ "kpei 'de ‑sɩn taan 'cʋɩ ‑mɛɛo"‑ 'di.
'De ɔ bae Kea ke'wlɛ ‑wɛe "ni 'je dba 'sʋ "ni ‑teɛ dbaa' ‑pʋn", ‑wɛe doodɩ ‑wee' "klein mɛ 'de ɩ ‑te croa' ‑pʋn".
'Ma de'di ‑wi", ‑bo aoa' due' "tai‑ tɔ' ‑tɩ 'a ‑jeblʋ "i ɛ, ‑wɛe nyɔ due' jɔ 'o tɔ' ‑tɩ 'a ‑jei" de ɛ, ‑mɛ nmɔ "jrii.

Dɛ ao 'jea ‑kwlʋ o sie ɛ, ɛ ka : nyɔ ‑ɔɔ muɛ nʋa' ‑wɛe nyɔ jrɔ' 'jea 'o ɔɔ' dɛsaʋnʋ ‑jei" 'wlʋ 'de ɔ 'jea 'o Kea 'a ‑jei" de ji ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔɔ muɛ ɔɔ' jei tu 'a ‑suu 'pʋʋa' 'de ɔ 'je dɩsaɩn ‑tuu"‑tuu 'a ‑kɔ "puue' "kpei po 'de ɩ 'je ‑kwɛ‑.
I Peter: 'Mɔ Piɛi, 'ɩn nɩɛ Sesi Klisɩ 'a ‑tadboi ‑o. Aopʋ Kea 'cra i ‑wɛe ‑ɔ ‑nɩa 'dʋɩ‑ 'de 'blʋa‑ 'srʋ "kpei ɛ, 'de ‑ɔ ‑kɔa Pɔnblʋa ke, Galasiblʋa ke, Kapadosɩ‑blʋa ke, Asiblʋa ke, Bitiniblʋa ja, 'mɔ ‑ɔɔ ja aopʋ 'sbɛ ‑nɛ.
Kea ‑ɛ ‑nɩa ‑a "Bo ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑tee aopʋ kpɔi" 'de ɛɛ' ‑Suu 'ʋn, ao nɩɛ ɛɛ' nyʋ ‑o. 'Kamɔ ɛ nɛɛ tɔ' "kpei‑ sese, ‑wɛe ao 'je Sesi Klisɩ wɔn 'je, 'de ɔɔ' nymɔ ‑wla i 'je aoa' dɩsaɩn ‑kɔ'.
Kea po ao "diwan ‑wɛe ɛ 'je aopʋ 'saaʋn "jrii nʋ, 'de aoa' pɛe 'a blua' 'je "kpei 'kpa jeejee !

Kea ‑ɛ ‑nɩa ‑aa Tʋ"bo Sesi Klisɩ "Bo ɛ, ‑a ‑bɛɛ' ɛɛ' 'nynɩ "i, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɛ nmɔ 'di wɔn 'pepe 'de ‑a ‑pee. Ɛ ‑sa Sesi ‑klu' ‑wɛe ‑a ‑mɔ ‑ke Sesi "sia "i ɛ, ɛ "nyɩ ‑a 'kmʋ dee nɩa' 'de ɔ 'ʋn. 'De ɛɛ' ‑tɔ' 'ʋn ɛ, ‑a tba 'kmʋ dee nɩa' ‑nɛ tɔ' "i.

‑Bo ɛ nɩ kan' a, ‑mɛ ‑a ‑beeɛ' 'kɛn Kea ‑teea ɛɛ' 'cɛ 'dei 'de jaʋn 'di ɛ, ‑a ‑je ɛɛ' 'mʋa‑ nʋ. Ɛɛ' 'kɛn tu se dooa‑ta 'ble, ɛ se ‑flɛn" kpʋn ‑ta 'ble, ɛ se "jrii‑kwɛ ‑ta 'ble, ɛmɛ Kea ‑tee ao 'dei 'de jaʋn 'di.
Aopʋ ‑ɔ ‑tea' Kea ‑kwlɩ" ɛ, ɛɛ' "ikmaa' a fuɛ aopʋ i mamaʋ 'sʋ, ɛ 'je 'blʋa 'a ‑kwɛ‑ nɔ" jɛɛ‑, ‑wɛe 'pʋʋa' ɛ ‑teea ao 'dei ɛ, ao 'je ɛ 'je.
'De ɛɛ' ‑tɔ' 'ʋn ɛ, ‑bo aoa sea 'kle 'a kpɛ ‑wee' 'je 'de ‑sɩanwɩ 'di mɔ 'de ɛ, ao nʋ 'mʋa‑, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɛɛ' nɔ" tu se "itɛn 'bode.

'Ma 'cɛ, 'kle 'a kpɛ aoa cɛɛan 'ʋn ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑ɛɛ muɛ nʋa' ‑wɛe aoa' Kea ‑kwlɩ" ‑tea' 'je 'pepe nɩ‑. Aoa 'jee, 'sani ‑ɛɛ mua isɔan' a, ka ɛ nɩa 'pepe ‑bo nyɔ ‑nɩɛi" ɔ 'je ɛ juo ɛ, ɔ nyɛiɛ' 'bo "jri. 'Kamɔ ɛ nɩ ‑ke 'de aoa' ‑tɔ' 'ʋn. Aoa' Kea ‑kwlɩ" ‑tea' ‑ɛ ‑nɩa dɛwɔn kpɛ ‑puue ‑ɛ ‑sia 'sani ɛ, ɛ 'je 'de 'kle 'ʋn cɛɛn ‑o. ‑Bo ɛɛ sea 'e 'kle 'ʋn cɛɛn ɛ, ‑mɛ ɛɛ muɛ 'pepe nɩa', ‑wɛe ‑sɔntɩ Sesi Klisɩ a mua de jia' 'de Kea 'je aoa' 'nynɩ "jɛi kpa.
Ao se Sesi Klisɩ "jriɛ‑ 'jee‑ due', 'kaa ao kma ɔɔ' ‑tɩ'. 'Kamɔ ao se ɔ "jriɛ‑ tba 'de ‑sɩanwɩ 'di ke, ‑wɛe ao ‑te' ɔ ‑kwlɩ". Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ 'di 'a wɔn nmɔa' ke 'mʋa‑ klaa" nɩ 'de aopʋ 'ʋn.
Ao 'je kan' 'mɛ aoa' Klisɩ ‑kwlɩ" ‑tea' mɛ ‑ɛɛ mu aoa' ‑suu 'a 'pʋʋa' "jru "kpei poa'.
'De ɛɛ' 'pʋʋa' tu 'a ‑tɔ' 'ʋn ɛ, Kea 'a wlu 'kwajaaʋn "jrɛɛ‑ Kea 'a 'sbɛ 'mɛ tɛin" sese, ‑wɛe 'saaʋn Kea 'na ɛ 'je aopʋ "jrii nʋ ɛ, 'de ʋʋ 'tmʋ ɛɛ' ‑tɩ'.

Klisɩ 'a ‑Suu ‑ɛ ‑nɩa 'de ʋʋpʋ 'ʋn ɛ, ɛmɛ ka Klisɩ a mua 'kle 'jea' ‑wɛe Kea 'jea dɩ klae" nʋ 'de ɔɔ' ‑kɔ 'di ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑tmʋ ɛ 'de ʋʋ ‑pee. Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ ʋʋ "jrɛɛ‑ 'sbɩ ‑wɛe ʋʋ ‑pɔn ɛɛ' 'o nyni nɔ" ke ɛɛ' ‑sɔn' i.

'Sʋ ka ɩa' dɩ tu sea "jri "kpae' poi 'de ʋʋa' ‑nɛ nɔ" 'di ‑wɛe ɩa mua "jri "kpae' poa' 'de aoa' ‑nɛ nɔ" 'di ɛ, ʋʋ 'wɔn ɛ 'mii. 'De ‑sɩanwɩ 'di ɛ, dɩ ʋʋ ‑sa 'kwla a, ɩmɩ Kea 'a ‑Suu a po ɛɛ' dbonʋʋn ‑je o ‑wɛe ʋʋa 'tmʋ 'de ao ‑pee. Ɩa' dɩ tu ɛ, Kea 'a "soa‑wi" ‑nɩa 'e jaʋn 'di ‑nɩɛi" ʋʋ 'jɩ ja ‑gbʋn ‑ke.
Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ ao 'je aoa' ‑cɛ" ikpʋʋn‑, ao kpʋn 'e "jri ao 'je Kea 'a ‑kwlʋtɩ nʋ. 'Saaʋn Kea a mua ao "jrii nʋa' Sesi Klisɩ 'a deji nɔ" ɛ, ɛmɛ ao 'je tɔ' "itba ‑sisi'.
Ao 'je Kea wɔn jeejee, dɩ ‑nɩa aoa' 'tʋn nʋdɩ tɛin" ‑mɛ ao se Klisɩ 'a ‑tɩ' tɔ' 'ʋn 'je ke ɛ, ao 'bo 'e ɩ 'di de muɛ.
'Kaa ao nɩ 'pepe 'de aoa' nʋʋkplɩn ‑wee' 'ʋn ka Kea ‑ɛ ‑da aopʋ nɩa 'pepe ɛ.
Tɔ' ‑o, Kea 'tmʋ ɛɛ' wlu tu 'mɛ sese ɛ 'naa : Ao nɩ 'pepe, ka 'mɔ nɩa 'pepe ɛ.

'De aoa' baewlu 'di ɛ, aoa 'daa‑ Kea "Bo, ‑wɛe aoa poo ɛ ‑too"‑ "i. Dɩ "klein nyiɔ ɔ nʋa due 'due ɛ, Kea mɛ ‑ɛɛ mu ɩa' 'pee 'jea' ka due' ka‑. ‑Jɛ ɛ nɩa kan' ‑mɔ 'ja a, ‑mɛ nɔ" ‑sia 'o aoa mua nʋa' 'de 'blʋa‑ "kpei ɛ, ao kpa ɛɛ' ni' ‑tea' nya 'de aoa' nʋʋkplɩn ‑wee' 'ʋn.
Sɔɔn' ‑jɛ ɛ ja ‑wɛe ɛ ‑seia aopʋ 'de ao "bo ‑wi" 'a kplɩn 'kwa a, ao juo ‑mɛ 'mɛ. Ɛ se dɩ ‑jɩ ‑a mua isɔan' ka 'sani ke 'wɛi nɩa mɩ Sesi Klisɩ nʋ ‑wɛe ɔ seie aopʋ nɩ‑.
'Kaa Klisɩ 'a nymɔ ‑ɛɛ sɔɔn'ɔ kɛ' kma', ɛmɛ seie aopʋ, ka 'blaaju ‑ɛ sea ‑kɔ ‑pʋn" nɩ 'a 'sraa‑ nɩa.
'De nyiɔ 'ɔ ‑seie ‑tɩ 'ʋn ɛ, Kea ‑teeɛ Klisɩ kpɔi" sese ‑mɛ 'kmʋ se nʋʋɛ ke, 'de ɛ ‑sɔ 'kwla 'de de'bɔɔ‑ nɔ" ‑a ‑nɩa 'di ‑ta 'di, ‑wɛe ɔ 'je aopʋ seie‑.
Ɔmɔ ‑nʋɛ' ‑wɛe ao 'bɛɛ‑ Kea ‑kwlɩ" ‑tea'. Kea mɛ ‑sɔ "kunyɩɔ' ‑wɛe ‑ɛ nʋ ɔ kɛɛma' 'ʋn. Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ ao ‑te' 'e Kea 'kwa ‑kwlɩ" ‑wɛe ao 'jeɛ tɔ' "itba.
Tɔ' ‑tɩ ao 'wɔan ‑wɛe ao 'jea wɔn ɛ, ɩmɩ ‑wɔɔ aoa' pɛe ɛmɛ ‑tɩ ao 'bɛɛ‑ ba 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' ka ‑cɔɔn' ka. ‑Jɛ ɛ nɩa kan' ‑mɔ 'ja a, ‑mɛ 'de aoa' pɛe ‑wee' "klein 'ʋn ao kma ba 'a ‑tɩ' due 'due.

Ao 'je kan' 'mɛ Kea 'a wlu ‑ɛ sea isɔn‑ta 'ble ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nʋɛ' ‑wɛe ao 'wlʋ 'wlʋa' dee‑. Ɛ se nyiɔ ‑ɔɔ mua 'mɛa' mɔ ‑nyɩ" aopʋ ɛɛ' 'kmʋnɩa' tu nɩ‑, Kea ‑sea' 'mɛ‑ta 'ble ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nyɩ" aopʋ ɛɛ' 'kmʋnɩa' tu.
Dɛ ‑crɩɩa' 'de Kea 'a wlu 'di sese ɛ, ɛ 'na :
Ka sii" 'a ‑faɩn' nɩa, 'kamɔ nyʋ 'a dɛwɔnɩa' ke ʋʋa' "jriinmɔa' ‑wee' nɩ‑, ‑bo sii" jɛ 'sʋ ɛɛ' ‑faɩn' blu'.
'Kaa Kea 'a wlu mɛ ‑nɩ 'kmʋ jeejee. Ɛ se isɔn‑ta 'ble.
Ɛɛ' wlu tu mɛ ‑nɩ ‑pɔia" ‑tɩ nyʋ 'tmʋa 'de ao ‑pee ɛ.
‑Jɛ ao 'wlʋa 'wlʋa' dee‑ ‑mɔ kaan 'ja a, ‑mɛ ao 'bɔ dɩsaɩn 'a kpɛ ‑wee' o, ao 'bɔ sɩ 'tmʋ‑tɩ, ao 'bɔ "jridepoo‑tɩ, ao 'bɔ ba ‑kwlɛn o nʋ‑tɩ, ao 'bɔ ‑sɔɔ wlu‑tɩ.

Ka nyɩɩɛ 'nya tʋn a nʋa "nynupliiɛ ɛ, 'kamɔ Kea 'a wlu ɛ ke dɛ jrɛ' ‑sea' "jrii bee a' 'tʋn 'je ao nʋ ‑ke, ‑wɛe ao 'je 'boa 'de ɛ 'ʋn 'bo Kea 'a ‑jei" mamaʋ 'sʋ ɛ 'je aoa' 'pʋʋa' 'a "jri "kpae' powɩ jɛɛ‑.
Tɔ' ‑o, ao ‑tɩn' Kea 'a 'diwɔnmɔa' wɔn 'mɛ, ao je ɛ 'je.

Ao 'kpa Tʋ"bo ‑pʋn", ka ‑gbu" 'a "sou nɩa 'kamɔ ɔ nɩ, 'kaa ɔ nɩɛ 'kmʋ, ɔ se 'mɛ. Ɛɛ' "sou tu ɛ, nyiɔ poo ɛ sʋn i, ka "sou sea nʋʋdbo 'ble nɩa. 'Kaa 'de Kea "jri 'de ɛɛ' "sou tu nɩɛ dɛwɔn, ɛmɛ ‑tɩ ɛ ‑tee' ɛ kpɔi".

Aopʋ mɔ ‑ke ɛ, ao 'kpa ‑gbu" 'a "sei ‑nɩa 'kmʋ ɛ. Ao "tai aoa' ‑cɛi" ‑wɛe Kea 'je aopʋ 'ʋn "duo‑ 'de ɛ 'je ao ɛɛ' ‑gbu" ‑tee, ‑wɛe ɛɛ' ‑Suu 'je 'de ɛ 'di "ti. Ao 'je kpɔi" ‑tee, 'de ɛ 'je aopʋ dbonʋʋn 'ʋn nʋ 'de ɛɛ' ‑gbu" 'di. ‑Mɛ aoa' jeʋn tu ɛ, ao 'je Kea wɔn ‑saa 'de Sesi Klisɩ 'ʋn, ɛmɛ ‑ɛɛ nʋ Kea 'tʋn.
Dɛ ‑ɛ ‑crɩɩa' 'de Kea 'a wlu 'di 'de ɛ, ɛ ka :
"Sou ‑nɩa dɛwɔn ɛmɛ 'ɩn 'cra i ‑wɛe 'ɩn ‑te i 'bo Selisalɛm, 'de ‑ɛ "kpei 'ɩn 'je 'ma ‑gbu" poo‑. Nyɔ ‑ɔɔ mua ɛɛ' ‑tɩ' tɔ' 'ʋn 'jea' a, ‑tɩn' se ɔ "i 'dbaai.
Aopʋ ‑ɔ ‑jea Klisɩ 'a ‑tɩ' tɔ' 'ʋn ɛ, ɛɛ' "sou tu nɩɛ dɛwɔn 'de aoa' ‑tɔ' 'ʋn. 'Kaa nyʋ ‑ʋʋ sea Klisɩ 'a ‑tɩ' tɔ' 'ʋn 'je, 'de ‑wi" ‑mʋ 'a ‑tɔ' 'ʋn Kea 'a wlu 'naa :
"Sou ‑gbu"poʋn pooa sʋn i ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑ɛɛ "sou tu ‑snɛɛ "sou ‑cɛɛn' 'ʋn de'bɔɔ‑ nɔ", ‑ɛ ‑sii "sei ‑wee' "klein.
'De fɔ' jrɛ' o ke'wlɛ, wlu ‑ɛ ‑crɩɩa' ɛ 'naa :
Ɛɛ' "sou tu a muɛ nyiɔpʋ 'a bɩɩ ‑tiia' ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'je i ‑ka 'bo ɛ "kpei.
Dɛɛ‑tɩ ʋʋa' nyʋ tu ‑ka i ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ, ʋʋ se ɛ "inɩ ʋʋ 'je Kea 'a wlu wɔn 'je. Nyʋ ‑ʋʋ ‑na" o a dɛ tɔ' 'ʋn 'je ‑tɩ ɛ, dɛ Kea ‑tea' 'de ʋʋpʋ 'a 'kmʋ 'a nya i ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nao.

'Kaa aopʋ mɔ ɛ, ao nɩɛ Kea 'a nyʋ ‑o, ao ‑teeɛ kpɔi", ao nɩɛ 'beɔ 'ɔ dbonʋʋn ‑o. Ɛ ‑tɩn' aopʋ 'mɛ, ‑wɛe ɛ ‑sa aopʋ 'de kwie 'di 'de ɛ ja aopʋ 'de ɛɛ' ‑sɔn' ‑cɛɛn' 'ʋn, ‑wɛe ao 'je ɛɛ' nʋʋdɩ 'dɔe 'a ‑tɩ' 'tmʋ 'de nyʋ ‑pee.
Ao se Kea 'a 'cɛ nɩ tɛin" 'de‑, 'kaa kaan ka ao nɩɛ ɛɛ' 'cɛ ‑o. Ka Kea a 'jea nyʋ 'a wɛe‑, tɛin" 'de ɛ, ao sɩ juo‑, 'kaa kaan ka la ɛ 'jeɛ aoa' wɛe‑ ‑ke.
'Ma ‑tɩ' kmaʋn, ka 'dʋɩ‑ nɩa, 'kamɔ ao nɩ 'nɔ 'kmʋ "kpei, ao nɩɛ nabʋ ja. Ao ‑tu" aoa' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ ‑tɩ', ao 'bo 'o aoa' 'tʋn nʋdɩ saɩn 'de blaa, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɩa ‑fɔn' aoa' ‑suu tʋ o.

'De nyʋ ‑ʋʋ sea Kea juo "klu ao nɩa, ao ‑tu" aoa' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ ‑tɩ' ‑wɛe ao 'je kplɩn 'dɔe nʋ. ‑Bo ɛ nɩ kan' a, ‑mɛ ‑bo ʋʋa sea aopʋ dɛsaʋnʋʋn 'daa‑ mɔ 'de ɛ, ʋʋa muɛ aoa' kplɩn 'dɔe "jriɛ‑ 'jeea' ‑wɛe ‑sɔntɩ Kea a mua ɛɛ' ‑cɛ" 'kwla ‑saa' 'de ʋʋ ‑pee ɛ, ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'je ɛɛ' 'nynɩ "i 'bɛɛ‑.
'De Tʋ"bo 'a ‑tɔ' 'ʋn ɛ, ao 'je nyʋ ‑tea nyʋ "jru kpɔ' i wɔn. ‑Bo ɛ nɩ ‑bluajei 'a ‑cɛ" 'kpa o,
‑bo ɛ nɩ nyʋ ɔ ‑tea' 'o ‑wɛe ‑ʋʋ ‑jea dɛsaʋn nʋʋn 'a 'pee 'je, 'de ‑ʋʋ ‑jea dɛ 'dɔe nʋʋn ‑tɩ' o po, ao ‑te' ʋʋpʋ 'a ni'.
'Ma 'cɛ, dɛ Kea a ‑pɔan i ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ‑bo aoa sea dɩ 'dɔe nʋ ɛ, ‑mɛ nyʋ ‑ʋʋ sea tɔ'di nɩ ‑wɛe ‑ʋʋa wlaa aopʋ ɛ, aoa muɛ ʋʋa' wɔn "muua'.
Ka nyʋ ‑tea ʋʋa' ‑cɛ" ‑pee a na, ao na kan', ao se dɛ jrɛ'ɛ kʋɔn kwla' nɩ‑. 'Kaa ao 'bo aoa' ‑cɛ" ‑pee‑tea' ‑nɛ "i 'nɩɛ 'sʋ ao 'bo dɩsaɩn nʋɛ. Ka Kea 'a dbonʋʋn a na, 'kamɔ ao 'je na‑.
Ao ‑te' nyʋ ‑wee' 'a ni'. Aoa' de'di ‑wi" ‑ʋʋ ‑ke aoa naa Kea 'a ‑jei" ɛ, ao kma ʋʋpʋ 'a ‑tɩ'. Ao plee Kea jeejee. Ao ‑te' ‑bluajei 'a ni'.

Aopʋ ‑ɔɔ nʋʋa nyʋ "juɔi ɛ, ao jaa aoa' ‑cɛ" ja 'de aoa' 'bleʋn ‑sɔn, ‑wɛe ao 'je ʋʋpʋ 'a ni' ‑te' 'de dɛ "o dɛ ‑wee' "klein 'ʋn. ‑Bo ʋʋa' kplɩn nmɔ "jrii o, ‑bo ʋʋa' kplɩn nyni "jrii o, ao 'je ʋʋpʋ wɔn jeejee.
‑Bo nyɔ ‑nɩɛi" ɔ 'je Kea wɔn 'je ‑wɛe ɔɔ sea 'kle 'je 'de ɛɛ' ‑tɔ' 'ʋn ɛ, Kea a po ɔ "diwan.

‑Bo nyɔ 'ɔ ‑cɛ" 'kpa 'a dɛsaʋn ja ɔ 'kle "kpei ‑wɛe ɔɔ 'bɛɛ‑ pɛe "wɔin 'de ɛɛ' ‑tɔ' 'ʋn ɛ, nyʋ se ɛ 'bɛɛ‑ nyʋ 'je ɔ ‑tɩ' o po. 'Kaa ‑bo nyʋ a sea aopʋ 'kpɩ doin" ipo 'de aoa' dɩ 'dɔe nʋ‑tɩ 'ʋn ‑wɛe ao 'bɛɛ‑ ɛɛ' 'kle tu "wɔin ɛ, ‑mɛ Kea a muɛ aopʋ ‑tɩ' o poa'.
Ao 'je pɛe "wɔin 'bɛɛ‑ 'de 'kle 'di, ɛmɛ ‑tɩ Kea 'da aopʋ, dɛ‑nʋɛ' Klisɩ 'a ‑cɛ" 'kpa 'jeɛ 'kle 'de aoa' ‑tɔ' 'ʋn ‑ke. Ao bla 'o ɔɔ' ‑kɔ 'de, ‑wɛe ka ɔ na ao 'je kan' na‑.
Ɔmɔ se dɛsaʋn nʋ due', ɔ se sɩ 'tmʋ kpɛ due'.
‑Ta nyʋ a ‑cree" ɔ, ɔ se ʋʋpʋ ‑cree" ‑ke, ‑ta ʋʋa ‑tu" ɔ 'kle ɛ, ɔ se wlu 'wlʋ. 'Kaa Kea ‑ɛɛ ‑jea nyʋ 'a 'pee ka ‑cɔɔn' ka, ɛmɛ ɔ ‑te' ɔɔ' 'kmʋ kwa.
Ɔɔ' ‑cɛ" 'kpa mɔ ‑duo" ‑aa dɩsaɩn 'ʋn 'bo ɔ "jru, 'de ‑a ‑ke dɛsaʋn 'a 'wlʋa' 'je cɩɩɛn ‑wɛe ‑a ‑je dɩ 'dɔe nʋa 'a 'kmʋ nɩ‑. Ɔɔ' blati 'a ‑kɔ mɩ ‑bɔɔ' aoa' 'wɛ‑.
Ao ‑wee' siɛ 'kwla tɛin" 'de‑, ka 'blae ‑sea' 'dei ‑tei 'ble nɩa, 'kaa kaan ka la Sesi Klisɩ ‑nɩa aoa' 'dei ‑tei ‑cɔɔn'‑ ‑wɛe ‑ɔɔ ‑tua" aoa' ‑suu 'a ‑tɩ' ɛ, ɔmɔ ao "biie‑ 'e o.

'Nynʋkpae', aopʋ mɔ ‑ke ɛ, ao jaa "jru ja 'de aoa' kʋan‑wi" ‑pee ‑wɛe ‑bo ʋʋa' jrʋ' se Kea 'a wlu tɔ' 'ʋn 'je ke ɛ, 'de aoa' Kea 'a ‑jei" naasʋn‑ 'je ɛ nʋ ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'je 'e Kea o "biie‑. ‑Bo ao se ʋʋpʋ Kea 'a ‑tɩ' ‑pee 'tmʋ mɔ 'de ɛ, ʋʋa muɛ aoa' kplɩn "jriɛ‑ o sia' see,
dɛ‑nʋɛ' ka aoa' nʋʋdɩ 'srɛai" ‑wɛe aoa pleea Kea a, ʋʋa muɛ kan' 'jea'.
"Jriinmɔdɩ ‑jɩ ‑poa' "jri "kpae' 'bo ku ‑pʋn" ɛ, ao 'bo ‑mɩ i‑pɔɛn, ka "mɩɩ‑ dbaa' ke 'sani doin" poa' ke, dɩ 'dɔe ‑pʋn" ‑tuu" a' nɩa.
'Kaa aoa' "jriinmɔa' ‑mɛ ɛ, 'de ao pɛe o mɔ ɛ 'je kɩn poo‑. Ao nmɔ 'di wɔn, ao nɩ kupeeɛ' nyʋ, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɛɛ' "jriinmɔa' tu se wɔsɔn ‑ta 'ble, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ dɛwɔn 'bo Kea "juɔi.
'Nynʋkpae' ‑ʋʋ ‑naa Kea 'a ‑jei" tɛin" ‑wɛe ‑ʋʋ ‑tea' Kea ‑kwlɩ" ɛ, "jriinmɔa' ‑ɛ ‑nɩa 'de ʋʋpʋ 'ʋn, ɛmɛ ‑nao.
Ka Sara nɩa 'de 'nynʋkpae' ‑nʋ "klu ɛ, Ablaam ‑nɩa ʋa' kʋan, ʋa 'je ɔ wɔn ‑wɛe ʋa 'dɔɔ‑ ʋa' 'blei. ‑Bo ao 'srɛi" ‑wɛe dɛ 'dɔe nʋa 'a faʋn 'a nʋ aopʋ ɛ, ‑mɛ ao nɩɛ ʋa' "nynuunynʋkpae' ‑tu ‑o.

Kʋan‑wi", aopʋ mɔ ‑ke ɛ, ‑bo ao ke aoa' 'nynʋkpae' ‑te i ɛ, ‑mɛ ao nɩ tɔ'di. Ka 'nynʋkpae' sea 'di ikuu ɛ, ao sie ɛ ‑kwlʋ o. Ao nmɔ ʋʋpʋ 'kwa, ao ‑te' ʋʋpʋ 'a ni', dɛ‑nʋɛ' 'kmʋnɩa' dee Kea "nyɩa nyʋ "jɛi‑ ɛ, ʋʋ ke ao ‑wee' plɛɛn i. Ao nʋ kan', ao ‑tu" aoa' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ ‑tɩ' ‑wɛe dɛ jrɛ' je aoa' baewlu ‑je de kaan‑.
Dɛ ‑jɛ 'ma 'tmʋa ao ‑wee' "klein ‑pee ɛ, ‑mɛ ka : ao 'ble tɔ' due', ao 'wɔɔn‑ wlu' i, ao kma ba 'a ‑tɩ', ao 'je ba 'a wɛe‑, ao jaa aoa' ‑cɛ" ja 'de ba ‑pee due 'due.

‑Bo nyʋ nʋ aopʋ dɛsaʋn "jrii ɛ, ao 'bo ɛɛ' kpan ‑saa 'de dɛsaʋn nʋa' 'ʋn. ‑Bo nyɔ ‑cree" aopʋ ɛ, ao 'bo ɔ ‑cree" ɛ. 'Kaa ao po ɔ "diwan ka‑, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɛmɛ ‑ɛɛ 'daa' Kea 'da aopʋ ‑wɛe ɛ 'je ao "diwan po ‑ke.
Dɛ ‑crɩɩa' 'de Kea 'a wlu 'di tɛin" ɛ, kɛ 'da ka, ɛ 'na :
‑Bo nyɔ nɩɛ "i, Kea 'je ɔ "diwan po, 'de ɔ 'je 'e 'mʋa‑ 'ʋn nɩ ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔ tɛɛn ɔɔ' wɔn dɛsaʋn o, ɔ 'bɔ sɩ 'tmʋ‑tɩ.
Ɔ to dɛsaʋn 'kpʋ "i ‑wɛe ɔ 'je dɛ 'dɔe nʋ. Pɛe 'a blua 'a 'sʋ mɛ ɔ 'je 'o 'de bla ‑wɛe ɔ 'je i‑pɔn 'bo ɔ ke ɔɔ' ‑ponyiɔ 'nynɩ,
dɛ‑nʋɛ' nyʋ ‑srɛai", ʋʋpʋ Tʋ"bo a naa "jriɛ‑ o, ‑wɛe ‑ʋʋa baewlu ɛɛ po doin" o. 'Kaa nyʋ ‑a nʋa dɛsaʋn ɛ, ɛɛ toɛ ‑wi" ‑mʋ 'kpʋ "i.
‑Bo ao 'ble dɛ 'dɔe nʋa 'a 'kpɩ 'ee, ‑mɛ nyɔ wɛ‑ ‑je aopʋ dɛsaʋn "jrii nʋ ɛ‑ ?
'De ‑bo aoa sea 'kle 'je 'de aoa' "isrɛ‑tɩ 'ʋn mɔ 'de ɛ, ‑mɛ aomɔ nʋ 'mʋa‑. 'De ɛɛ' ‑tɔ' 'ʋn ɛ, nyʋ ‑a ‑tua" aopʋ 'kle 'a faʋn 'bo aopʋ nʋɛ, 'de tai' 'bo aopʋ "maa.

'Kaa ao "biie aoa' tɔ' 'de Tʋ"bo Klisɩ 'a 'sʋ "kpei, ao "tai‑ ɔ "i, ‑wɛe ɔɔ' 'sʋ 'je aopʋ 'a 'kmʋ ‑je o po. ‑Bo nyɔ "o nyɔ ‑tee' aopʋ i ɔ 'na dɛɛ‑tɩ ao tba Kea tɔ' "i ɛ‑, ‑mɛ ao ‑te ɛɛ' wɔ ‑saa 'a kein"ke 'de ɔ ‑pee.

‑Bo aoa sea ɛ wɔ ‑sa 'de ɔ ‑pee ɛ, ‑mɛ ao ‑tu" aoa' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ ‑tɩ' ‑wɛe ao 'je ɛ nʋ 'de ku peeɛ' ke nyʋ 'a ni' ‑tea' 'ʋn, dɛ‑nʋɛ' dɛ ‑ɛ ‑srɛai" "i 'de ao pɛe o, ɛmɛ ao 'je nʋ, ‑wɛe nyʋ ‑ʋʋa ‑sia" aoa' 'nynɩ saɩn ɛ, ‑tɩn' 'je ʋʋpʋ "i 'dbaa, ‑wɛe ka nyʋ ‑ke Klisɩ a na 'a kplɩn nmɔa "jrii ɛ, 'de ʋʋ 'je ɛ juo‑.
‑Bo ‑ma sea 'kle 'je 'de 'dɔe nʋa 'a ‑tɔ' 'ʋn, ‑wɛe Kea "tai ɛ "i 'de ‑ʋn "kpei ɛ, ‑mɛ "paa', ɛ je ‑nʋ' dɛsaʋn ‑wɛe ‑je 'kle 'de ɛɛ' ‑tɩ' 'ʋn ‑sii.

Klisɩ foo" 'sʋ 'jeɛ 'kle ‑ke, ɔ 'mɛɛ kpɛ due' koʋn ‑gbai' 'de nyiɔ 'ɔ dɛsaʋn 'a ‑tɔ' 'ʋn. Ɔmɔ ‑ɔ ‑srɛai" ɛ, ɔmɔ ‑mɛ 'diwɔnyniʋn 'a 'mɛa' ‑wɛe ‑ɔ ‑je ‑aʋn 'bo Kea "juɔi kpa. Ʋʋ 'dba ɔɔ' 'blʋku ‑kwlɔ i, 'kaa Kea jɔ 'kmʋ de 'de ɛɛ' ‑Suu 'ʋn.
'De ɛɛ' ‑Suu ‑tu ɛ, ɛ dboɔ' ‑wɛe ɔ mu, ɔ je 'mɛʋn 'a ‑sii ‑nɩa 'mɛʋn o ‑kwlɔ wlu ‑pee 'tmʋ.
Ɩa' ‑sii ‑tu ɛ, ɩ se Kea wɔn 'je tɛin". 'De ‑mɛ 'kamɔ Kea kuu tɔ' i mamaʋ 'sʋ Noe ‑pa ‑bato', ‑wɛe nyʋ ‑mɛ" na ‑gbai' pa 'de ɛ 'di, 'de ʋʋ 'pʋ "ni wɔin".

"Ni nyʋ ‑mɛ"na ‑nʋ 'pʋa wɔin" 'mʋa‑ a, ɛɛ' "ipoo‑tɩ mɛ ‑nɩ "ni aoa pooa "jru 'de ‑sɩanwɩ 'di ɛ. "Ni ʋʋa pooa aopʋ "jru ɛ, ɛ se mɛ ‑ɛɛ ‑sa aoa' ku ‑flɛn" kui nɩ‑. 'Kaa ‑bo aoa sea "ni "jru pooɛ, ‑mɛ aoa ‑teeɛ' Kea i, ‑wɛe ɛ 'je aoa' pɛe wɔɔ‑. ‑Bo aoa' "ni pooa' 'pʋʋ‑ aopʋ ɛ, ‑mɛ Sesi Klisɩ ‑mɛa ‑wɛe ‑ɔ ‑sɔan "kunyɩɔ' 'saaʋn ‑o.
Ɔmɔ mu 'de jaʋn 'di ‑wɛe ‑ɔ ‑te i 'de Kea 'a dianfɔ o, 'de ‑ɔ ‑nɩ 'o Kea 'a "soa‑wi" o, dɛwɔn ‑siiʋn o, "ikmadɩ ‑wee' "jru kpɔ'.
Ka Klisɩ 'jea kui wɔn, ao 'je kan' 'mɛ. Ɛmɛ ‑ɛɛ ‑tɔ' 'ʋn ao 'je ɔ ja ‑gbʋn ‑wɛe ao 'je kui wɔn'je ‑tɩ 'wɔɔn‑. Nyɔ ‑jea ɔɔ' ‑cɛ" wɔn ɛ, ɔmɔ ‑ke dɛsaʋn cɩɩɛn.

‑Bo ao ke Klisɩ 'ble tɔ' due' ɛ, ‑mɛ aoa' ‑cɛ" 'kpa 'a 'tʋn nʋdɩ saɩn se ɛ 'bɛɛ‑ ɩ 'je aoa' 'kmʋ ‑je o po. ‑Bo ɛ nɩ kan' a, ‑mɛ nɔ" ‑sia 'o ao 'jea nʋ 'de 'kmʋ "kpei ɛ, aoa mua Kea 'a ‑kwlʋtɩ 'a 'sʋ nʋa'.

Tɔ' ‑o, nɔ" ao "dua 'ʋn ‑wɛe ka nyʋ sea Kea juo a nʋa 'de aoa nʋa kan' a, ɛ ‑tiɛi" ‑wɛ‑, ao "ti la. Tɛin" 'de‑ ɛ, dɩ ‑sea' nʋ ka nɩ ɛ, ɩmɩ aoa nʋ : aoa' 'tʋn nʋdɩ saɩn 'bleɛ aopʋ kʋɔn 'ʋn, dɛ 'ɛ pɛe "ipoa' 'a ‑tɩn' 'a nʋ aopʋ, ao "duo aoa' nɔ" ‑wee' 'ʋn 'ɛ, ‑wɛe aoa ‑tu" ‑kɔ' jeejee, 'de aoa po nmɔ "jru, ‑wɛe kɔin "juɔi ‑gbɛɛa' ‑a nyaa Kea i ɛ, 'de aoa nʋ ‑mɛ.
'Kaa kaan ka, tai' "maa nyʋ ‑sea' Kea juo 'mɛ, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ʋʋ ke ao 'bɔ dɛ 'ɛ "jriitɩan 'a bɩ' "bee ‑tɩ 'mɛ, ɛmɛ ‑tɩ ʋʋa ‑cree" aopʋ.
'Kaa 'wɩ ‑sia 'o ‑wɛe Kea 'jea 'kmʋnɩʋn ke 'mɛʋn 'a 'pee 'je, ɩ se "itɛn, 'bomɔ nyʋ ‑a ‑cree" 'a aopʋ 'je ʋʋa' nʋʋdɩ 'a "kuan po 'bo Kea "juɔi.

'De ɛɛ' ‑tɔ' 'ʋn ‑pɔia" ‑tɩ 'tmʋʋɛ ‑ke 'de 'mɛʋn ‑pee. ‑Bo ʋʋ 'mɛ 'de ɛ, ‑mɛ ka nyʋ ‑wee' "klein a 'mɛa, 'kamɔ ʋʋ 'mɛ, ka nyʋ ‑wee' "klein 'jea 'pee 'wlʋ ɛ, 'kamɔ ʋʋpʋ 'je 'pee 'wlʋ ‑ke. 'Kaa ʋʋa' ‑suu 'bɛɛ‑ ɛ 'je 'kmʋnɩa' ‑wlʋa 'de Kea 'ʋn 'je ‑ke.
'Blʋa 'a ‑kwɛ‑ nɔ" "kʋʋan‑ i. 'De ɛɛ' ‑tɔ' 'ʋn ɛ, ao nɩ tɔ'di, ao juo aoa' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ ka, ‑wɛe ao 'je bae ka 'je.
Dɛ ‑jɛ ‑kɔan ‑tɩ' ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ao 'bo ba 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' o 'bɔɛ. ‑Bo nyɔ kma nyʋ 'a ‑tɩ' ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔɔ poɛ ʋʋa' ‑kɔ "puue' "kpei.
Ao kpʋʋn ba sɩn 'sɔɔn 'de aoa' ‑gbi" ‑sɔn i due 'due, ao 'bo 'mii wluɛ 'de ɛɛ' ‑tɔ' 'ʋn.
Kea po aopʋ "diwan 'de dɩ 'a kpɛ ‑tuu"‑tuu 'ʋn. Ɛmɛ ‑nʋɛ' ‑wɛe jrɔ' 'bɛɛ‑ ɔ 'je ɔɔ' ‑nɛ dɛ 'dɔe nʋ, 'de dɛ 'dɔe nʋa 'a 'kpɩ Kea "nyɩa aopʋ ɛ, ao 'jɩ 'ʋn "duo‑ ‑wɛe ao 'je ba sʋn o po.

‑Bo nyɔ 'ble wlua 'a 'kpɩ ɛ, ‑mɛ Kea 'a ‑tɩ' mɩ ɔ 'je 'tmʋ, ‑bo Kea "nyɩ nyɔ nyʋ sʋn o poa 'a 'kpɩ ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔ "duo ɔɔ' 'kpɩ ‑wee' "klein 'ʋn, ‑wɛe ɔ 'je ɛɛ' dbo tu nʋ. Aopʋ ‑bla 'o Sesi Klisɩ 'de ɛ, ao nʋ kan', ‑wɛe dɛ "o dɛ aoa mua nʋa' a, Kea 'a 'nynɩ 'je "i 'bɛ 'de ɔ 'ʋn jeejee. Ɛmɛ ‑ble 'nynɩ 'wlʋa' ke "ikmaa' 'de ‑sʋn "o ‑sʋn 'di. 'Kamɔ ɛ 'je nɩ mamaʋ 'sʋ.

'Ma ‑tɩ' kmaʋn, nai" ‑tɩ aoa 'jea ‑bo ɩa' mɔɔ' nyna aopʋ 'ʋn ɛ, ao 'bo ɩ dɩ dee‑ 'daa‑, ɩ 'bo ao tai' "maa, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɩa' dɩ tu mɩ Kea a nʋ ‑wɛe ɛɛ ‑tɩn aopʋ i, 'de ‑bo ao ‑te ɛ ‑kwlɩ" ‑wɛe ɛ 'je ɛ juo‑. Ao 'bo nʋɛ ɩ se ka ‑cɔɔn' ka nɩ‑.
'Kaa 'kle Klisɩ 'jea, ɛmɛ aoa 'je ‑ke. 'De ɛɛ' ‑tɔ' 'ʋn ɛ, ao 'di nmɔ wɔn, ‑wɛe ‑sɔntɩ ɔɔ' tʋ"bodɛ ɛ mua "jri "kpae' poa' a, 'de aoa' 'mʋa‑ 'je "i 'bɛ, ɛ 'je "jri "kpei ‑tie" cɛn.
Dɛ ao ke Klisɩ a na, ‑bo nyʋ a sea aopʋ ‑cree" 'de ɛɛ' ‑tɔ' 'ʋn ɛ, ‑mɛ ao nʋ 'mʋa‑, dɛ‑nʋɛ' Kea 'a ‑Suu ‑ɛ ‑bɛa "i ‑ɛ ‑sia dɩ ‑wee' ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ 'de aopʋ 'ʋn.
Nyɔ 'bo 'de aopʋ "klu nɩɛ, ‑wɛe ɔɔ' dɩsaɩn nʋa' o, ɔɔ' "ku'dbaa' o, ɔɔ' "jriia' o, ɔɔ' ‑tɩ' ‑ɩn sea kɔn ɩa' wɔn 'ʋn poa' 'bo ɔ 'kle "kpei jaa‑.
'Kaa ‑bo nyɔ nɩ Klisɩ 'a nyɔ ‑wɛe ɔɔ sea 'kle 'je 'de ɛɛ' ‑tɔ' 'ʋn ɛ, ɛ 'bo ɔɔ' ‑tɩn' 'bleeɛ, ɔ po Klisɩ 'a 'nynɩ ‑nɩa ɔ "kpei 'a Kea 'sɛ‑.
'Ma 'cɛ, Kea ‑tee 'pee 'jea' ‑wɛ‑ 'de ɛɛ' ‑gbu" ‑sɔnyʋ "klu. 'De ‑bo 'pee ‑mɛ ‑tee 'de ‑apʋ mɔ "kpei tɛin" 'dee, ‑mɛ ka ɛɛ mu nɩa' 'de nyʋ ‑na ‑ʋʋ se Kea 'a ‑tɩ' tɔ' 'ʋn 'jei "kpei ɛ‑ ?
Dɛ ‑crɩɩa 'de Kea 'a wlu 'di, ɛ 'naa :
‑Bo nyʋ ‑srɛai", ‑wi" ‑mʋ 'jee‑ 'pʋʋa' 'kle i 'dee, ‑mɛ ka ɛɛ mu nɩa' 'de 'diwɔn nyniʋn ke dɛsaʋn nʋʋn ‑wi" ‑mʋ 'a ‑tɔ' 'ʋn ɛ‑ ?
‑Jɛ ɛ nɩa kan' ‑mɔ 'ja a, ‑mɛ nyʋ ‑ʋʋa ‑jea 'kle 'de Kea 'a ‑kwlʋtɩ 'ʋn ɛ, ʋʋ kpa dɛ 'dɔe nʋa' nya ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'je ʋʋa' 'kmʋ nyiɔ 'ɔ Nʋi ‑ɛɛ' pooa wlu fai" kwa ‑te'.

'Ɩn nɩɛ "i 'ɩn 'je nyʋ ‑nɩa Kea ‑gbu 'a nyʋsoa 'de aopʋ "klu wlu ‑pee 'tmʋʋ‑, dɛ‑nʋɛ' 'mɔ nɩɛ Kea ‑gbu 'a nyɔsoa ‑o ‑ke. ‑Ta Klisɩ a 'jeea 'kle tɛin" ɛ, 'ɩn 'je ɛɛ' ‑ta 'mɛ. Ɔɔ' kɛɛma' dɛ ‑ɛɛ ‑mua' "jri "kpae' poa', ‑a ‑wee' a muɛ ɛɛ' ‑ta 'jea'.

Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ 'ma bae aopʋ i ‑wɛe nyʋ Kea ‑tea' aopʋ kwa ao 'je ʋʋpʋ 'a ‑tɩ' ‑tu" ka 'blae 'dei ‑tei a fua ɔɔ' 'blae i ɛ. ‑Bo aoa sea ɛɛ' dbo tu nʋ ɛ, ao nʋ ɛ 'de pɛe 'dɔe 'ʋn, ka Kea nɩɛ "i ɛ. Ka nyɔ ɔ ‑tea' nyʋ ‑klaan" "kpei ɛ, ɛ 'bo kan' nɩɛ. Ao "duo aoa' pɛe ‑wee' "klein 'ʋn, ao 'je ɛɛ' dbo tu nʋ, ao 'bo ɛ nʋɛ 'de 'wɛi 'je ‑tɩ 'ʋn.
Nyʋ Kea ‑tea' aopʋ kwa ao 'bo 'o ʋʋpʋ "jru 'jaa i‑pɔɛn, 'kaa ao ‑tu" aoa' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ ‑tɩ' ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'je 'bo aoa' kplɩn 'dɔe 'de bla.
‑Bo aoa sea kan' nʋ ɛ, ‑mɛ Sesi Klisɩ ‑ɔ fua ‑a ‑wee' "klein i ɛ, ‑sɔntɩ ɔɔ mua jia' a, ɔɔ muɛ aopʋ "i 'bɛɛa, ‑wɛe ɔ 'je aopʋ 'dɔe "jrii nʋ. Ɛɛ' 'dɔe tu se "jrii ‑kwɛ ‑ta 'blei.

'De aopʋ ‑jɔ ‑nɩa ‑kooa" mɩɩ" ‑wi" ɛ, ao jaa "jru ja 'de nyʋ ‑cɔʋn' ‑pee. 'De dɛ ao ‑wee' "klein 'jea nʋ ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ao 'je aoa' ‑cɛi" 'piie ‑wɛe ao 'je ba sʋn o po due 'due, dɛ‑nʋɛ' dɛ ‑crɩɩa' 'de Kea 'a wlu 'di kɛ 'da ka, ɛ 'naa :
Nyʋ ‑a ‑bɛɛa' ʋʋa' ‑cɛi" ɛ, Kea 'nyɛ ʋʋpʋ 'ʋn 'ɛ, 'kaa nyʋ ‑piia' ʋʋa' ‑cɛi" ɛ, ɛɛ nʋɛ ‑wi" ‑mʋ 'saaʋn "jrii.
‑Jɛ ɛ nɩa kan' ‑mɔ 'ja a, ‑mɛ ao jaa aoa' ‑cɛ" ja 'bo Kea 'a "ikmasʋn ‑sɔn, ‑wɛe ‑bo nɔ" ɛ ‑tua" nyni ɛ, 'de ɛ 'je aopʋ "jɛi kpa.
Dɩ "klein ‑ɩa ‑sɔɔn aoa ‑tua" ‑wɛe ao "kaea "jrii ɛ, ao ‑tɩ' Kea kwa. Ao ‑sa aoa' ‑sɔɔngbɛ "jru 'bo Kea 'kwa, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɛmɛ ‑ɛɛ ‑tu" aopʋ 'a ‑tɩ'.
Ao juo aoa' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ ka, ao 'bo i"mae, ‑siɔn' ‑nɩa aoa' tʋnyɔ ɛ, ɔɔ ‑piɛn' aopʋ 'dei ɔ 'je ao 'dba, ka ‑plaa a ‑pɔan nmi i, ɛ 'jea 'dba i ɛ.
Ao 'bo 'wɔɔɛn ɔ 'bo aopʋ kpʋɛn, ao 'bo Kea ‑kwlɩ" ‑tetɩ 'bɔɛ. Ao 'ble 'kpɩ, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ao 'je kan' 'mɛ, aoa' de'di ‑wi" ‑kɔa 'blʋa‑ ja, 'kle due' ‑nɩa 'mʋa‑ ɛmɛ ʋʋpʋ a 'je ‑ke.

Ka 'diwɔn nmɔa' ‑wee' ke 'saaʋn pooa 'de Kea 'ʋn kɩn ɛ, ao 'bo ɛ o"mae. Kea mɛ ‑da aopʋ ‑wɛe ao ke Klisɩ 'je "i "sii‑. 'De ao 'je 'de ɔɔ' kɛɛma'de ‑ɛ sea ‑kwɛ ‑ta 'ble 'ʋn nɩ‑. ‑Bo 'kle ao 'jea 'mʋa‑ 'de nɔ" pla 'di 'wlʋ 'o ‑jei" ɛ, ‑mɛ Kea a muɛ nʋa' ‑wɛe aoa' 'kmʋ 'je inyni, 'de ao 'je 'sɩn po, ‑wɛe ao 'je dɩ ikuu ‑sisi', 'de ka ɛ nɩa "i ɛ, ao 'je kan' nɩ.
'Ma 'cɛ, ka Kea 'blea "ikmaa' ‑wee' "klein, nyʋ 'je ɛ juo ‑o 'de nɔ" ‑wee' 'di. 'Kamɔ ɛ 'je nɩ‑ !

Silasɩ ‑ɔ ‑nɩa 'ma de'di 'ɩn ‑tea' ‑kwlɩ", ɔmɔ ‑po 'ʋn sʋn o, ‑wɛe 'ma 'tmʋʋ aopʋ wlutie ‑nɛ ‑pee. 'Ɩn nɩɛ "i 'ɩn 'je aopʋ 'a dɩ ikuu‑, ‑wɛe 'saaʋn ‑cɛɛn'‑ Kea nʋa aopʋ "jrii, ao 'je ɛ juo ‑wɛe ao 'je ɛ i "klii‑.
Nyʋ Kea ‑teea kpɔi" ‑ta Babilɔnɩ, ka ɛ ‑teea aopʋ kpɔi" ‑ke ɛ, ʋʋ 'na ʋʋpʋ ‑je aopʋ. Makɩ ‑ɔ ‑nɩa 'ma "ju 'de Klisɩ 'ʋn ɛ, ɔ 'na ɔmɔ ‑je aopʋ ‑ke.
Ao ‑gblee ba ‑kwlɩ" 'de ba 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' 'ʋn.
Aopʋ "klein ‑ɔ ‑nɩa Klisɩ 'a nyʋ ɛ, pɛe 'a blua' nɩ 'de aopʋ 'ʋn
II Peter: 'Mɔ Simɔ Piɛi ‑ɔ ‑nɩa Sesi Klisɩ 'a dbonʋi ‑wɛe ‑ɔ ‑nɩa ɔɔ' ‑tadboi ɛ, 'mɔ ‑ɔɔ ja aopʋ ‑ɔ ‑ke ‑aa Kea ‑kwlɩ" ‑tea' nɩa dɛ due' 'sbɛ‑. Sesi Klisɩ ‑aa Kea ‑ɛ ‑nɩa ‑aa 'Pʋʋi ɛ. Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ ɔ "nyɩ ‑a ‑wee' Kea ‑kwlɩ" ‑tea' due', ɛɛ' kɛ' kma' 'de ‑a ‑wee' "klein ‑pee.
Ao juo Kea ke Tʋ"bo Sesi, ao 'je nya mu, ‑wɛe "diwan 'je aopʋ kpʋn, 'de aoa' pɛe 'je blu.

Sesi mɔ ‑nʋɛ' ‑wɛe ‑a ‑juo Kea ‑cɛɛn'‑. Ɛmɛ ‑da ‑aʋn ‑wɛe ‑a ‑ke ɛ 'je i ‑te 'de ɛɛ' tʋ"bodɛ 'ʋn, 'de ‑a ‑je ɛɛ' 'diwɔnmɔa' "jriɛ‑ 'jee‑. ‑Bo ‑a ‑juo Kea a, ‑mɛ ɛɛ muɛ ɛɛ' "ikmasʋn tooa', ɛ 'je ‑aʋn dɩ ‑kɔan ‑tɩ' ‑ɩ ‑sia dɩ ‑wee' "nyɩ ‑wɛe ‑a ‑je 'kmʋ nɩ, 'de ‑a ‑je ɛɛ' 'tʋn nʋ‑tɩ nʋ. Dɩ ɛ "sia 'nynɩ ‑wɛe ɛ 'na ɛ 'je ‑a "nyɩ 'de ɛ, ka ɛ nʋa ‑aʋn ɩa' "nyɩ sʋn, 'kamɔ ‑nao. ‑Bo ao 'je ɩa' dɩ tu ‑wɛe 'kmʋ "kpeidɩ ‑ɩa muɛ isɔan' ao 'je ɩa' 'tʋn kwa ‑sɔn ‑saa. ‑Bo ɛ nɩ kan' ‑wɛe ao ke Kea 'a nɩsʋn 'je due' nɩ‑.

Sesi mɔ ‑nʋɛ' ‑wɛe ‑a ‑juo Kea ‑cɛɛn'‑. Ɛmɛ ‑da ‑aʋn ‑wɛe ‑a ‑ke ɛ 'je i ‑te 'de ɛɛ' tʋ"bodɛ 'ʋn, 'de ‑a ‑je ɛɛ' 'diwɔnmɔa' "jriɛ‑ 'jee‑. ‑Bo ‑a ‑juo Kea a, ‑mɛ ɛɛ muɛ ɛɛ' "ikmasʋn tooa', ɛ 'je ‑aʋn dɩ ‑kɔan ‑tɩ' ‑ɩ ‑sia dɩ ‑wee' "nyɩ ‑wɛe ‑a ‑je 'kmʋ nɩ, 'de ‑a ‑je ɛɛ' 'tʋn nʋ‑tɩ nʋ. Dɩ ɛ "sia 'nynɩ ‑wɛe ɛ 'na ɛ 'je ‑a "nyɩ 'de ɛ, ka ɛ nʋa ‑aʋn ɩa' "nyɩ sʋn, 'kamɔ ‑nao. ‑Bo ao 'je ɩa' dɩ tu ‑wɛe 'kmʋ "kpeidɩ ‑ɩa muɛ isɔan' ao 'je ɩa' 'tʋn kwa ‑sɔn ‑saa. ‑Bo ɛ nɩ kan' ‑wɛe ao ke Kea 'a nɩsʋn 'je due' nɩ‑.
'De ɛɛ' ‑tɩ' 'ʋn mɔ ‑wee' ɛ, ao "duo aoa' 'kpɩ ‑wee' 'ʋn ‑wɛe 'bo aoa' Sesi Klisɩ ‑kwlɩ" ‑tea' "kpei ɛ, ao 'je 'o kplɩn 'dɔe nʋa' po. ‑Wɛe 'bo aoa' kplɩn 'dɔe nʋa' "kpei ɛ, ao 'je 'o dɛ "jriijua' po.
Ao kpʋʋn aoa' ‑cɛ" i, ‑wɛe 'bo dɛ "jriijua' "kpei, ao 'je 'o ‑cɛ" "wɔin 'bɛɛa' ke pɛe ikua' po. ‑Wɛe 'bo ‑mɩ "kpei, ao 'je 'o Kea wɔn 'jea' po.
Ɛ se Kea wɔn 'jea' ‑mɛɛ' 'sʋ nɩ‑, ao kma aoa' de'di ‑wi" 'a ‑tɩ' ‑wɛe 'bo ‑mɛ 'de ɛ, ao 'je nyʋ 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' ‑ɛ ‑wlʋa 'de Kea 'ʋn to‑ 'de nyʋ ‑wee' ‑pee.

Kplɩn 'dɔe ‑ɩ ‑nɩa nʋ ka 'bo Kea 'a ‑jei", ɩmɩ ‑nao. ‑Bo aoa sea ɩa' kplɩn tu nʋ jeejee ɛ, ‑mɛ aoa' 'kmʋ se idooa, ao se foo" 'ʋn ‑tei, dɩ ‑wee' "klein a muɛ aopʋ kwa 'wɔan', ‑wɛe ao 'je ‑aa Tʋ"bo Sesi Klisɩ juo‑ sɔɔn‑ sɔɔn‑, ao 'je nya mu.
'Kaa nyɔ ‑mɩ 'a kplɩn tu sea 'e 'ʋn nɩ ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔɔ' 'je 'e nyai, ka "dɔi nɩa, 'kamɔ ɔ nɩ‑. Ɔɔ' dɩsaɩn ‑nɩa tɛin" ka Kea ‑kwɩ' ɛ, ɔ "mae' ɩ o.
Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ 'ma de'di ‑wi", ao 'je aoa' ‑cɛ" ikpʋʋn‑, ‑wɛe ao 'je ɩa' kplɩn tu nʋ. Ɛmɛ ‑toɛ ka Kea 'da aopʋ ‑wɛe ɛ ‑teea ao kpɔi" ɛ. ‑Bo aoa sea kan' nʋ ɛ, ‑mɛ ao se 'de dɛsaʋn 'di 'kpai 'nɔ 'kmʋ.
'Kamɔ ‑bo ao nʋ, ‑wɛe Kea 'je ao ‑kɩn kwa 'wɔɔn‑, 'de ao 'je 'e Kea 'a kɛɛma' ‑kwlɔ 'di pa. 'Bomɔ ‑aa Tʋ"bo ke ‑aa 'Pʋʋi Sesi Klisɩ a 'wlʋʋ 'nynɩ.
'Ma 'cɛ, 'ɩn 'je kan' 'mɛ, dɩ 'ma 'tmʋa ‑ta ao juɩ' sese, ao nyniɛ i 'de ɩ 'ʋn ‑sisi',
'kaa ‑ta 'ɩn nɩɩa 'nɔ 'kmʋ "kpei ke ɛ, 'ɩn 'je aopʋ ‑tɩ' ‑kwlʋ o poo ‑o jeejee, ‑wɛe ao je i "mae'‑,
dɛ‑nʋɛ' nɔ" ‑ɛ ‑sia 'o ‑wɛe 'ɩn 'jea 'kmʋ 'wlʋ, ɛ se "i tɛn 'bode, 'kamɔ ‑aa Tʋ"bo Sesi Klisɩ ‑sɛ 'kwla 'de 'ʋn ‑pee.
Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ ‑ta 'ɩn nɩɩa 'kmʋ ke ɛ, 'ma "duo 'ma nɔ" ‑wee' "klein 'ʋn 'de 'ma sie aopʋ wlu o, ‑wɛe ‑bo 'ɩn 'wlʋ 'kmʋ ɛ, 'de ao 'jɩ ‑kwlʋ o po jeejee.

Tɔ' ‑o, tɛin" sese ɛ, ‑a ‑tmʋʋ' aopʋ 'mɛ ‑a ‑na ‑aa Tʋ"bo Sesi Klisɩ a muɛ de jia', ɔ ke ɔɔ' "ikmaa' ke. Ɩa' wlu tu ɛ, ɩ se "nɩɩa ‑ɩ ‑wlʋa 'de nyiɔ 'ɔ tɔ' 'ʋn nɩ‑, 'kaa ɔ to ɔɔ' "ikmaa' 'mɛ ‑aa ‑cɛ" 'kpa je ɛ "jriɛ‑ 'jee‑.

Kea ‑nɩa ɔ "Bo, ɛɛ' ‑cɛ" ‑tu" ɔ ‑cian" "kpei ‑wɛe ‑ɛ ‑bɛɛ' ɔ "i. Kea ‑bɛa "i ‑ɛ ‑sia dɩ ‑wee', ‑ta ɛ 'tmʋʋa ɛɛ' wlu tu 'wɩ jrɛ' o ɛ, ‑a ‑je ɛɛ' ‑ta 'mɛ. Ɛ wlu' ka ɛ 'naa : "Ju ‑nɔ, ɔ nɩɛ 'ma ‑tɩ' kmaju ‑o, 'de ɔ 'ʋn mɔ 'ma 'mʋa‑tɩ ‑wee' nɩ‑.
‑Aa ‑cɛ" 'kpa 'wɔn wlu ‑nɛ 'mɛ, ‑ta ɔ ke ‑a ‑nɩɩa 'bo Kea 'a crʋ "kpei ɛ, 'bomɔ wlu ‑nɛ 'wlʋʋ 'de jaʋn 'di ‑wɛe ‑a ‑wɔn ɛ.

'Bo ‑mɛ 'de ɛ, dɩ ‑a ‑jea ‑wɛe ‑a ‑wɔan ke ‑jɩ Kea 'a wlu 'kwajaaʋn 'tmʋa sese ke, ɩ nɩɛ tɔ' ‑o ‑cɛɛn'‑. Wlu ʋʋ 'tmʋa aoa ɩa tɔ' o sie ɛ, ‑mɛ nmɔ "jrii. Ka nɛbi a wan 'de kwie 'di mamaʋ 'sʋ ‑sɔn' ɔ ‑sɩan, 'kamɔ ɩ nɩ‑. 'Kaa Klisɩ ka ‑klae" jrʋ a 'wlʋa ‑ɔ ‑nɩa kan', ‑sɔntɩ ɔɔ mua 'de ao pɛe o paa' a, 'de aopʋ 'ʋn a muɛ i iflɔan', ‑wɛe ao 'je 'e dɩ ‑wee' "klein 'dei 'wɔn.
Dɩ ao 'jea ‑kwlʋ o sie 'pepe, ɩ ka : ɛmɛ ‑nɩ wlu "klein Kea 'a wlu 'kwajaaʋn 'tmʋa 'nɔ 'sbɛ 'di ɛ, ʋʋ se ɩa' wlu tu 'bo ʋʋa' ‑cɛ" ‑kwlɩ" ‑sa,
'de wlu Kea jaa nyʋ 'kwa, ɩ se 'e nyiɔ 'ɔ ‑kwlʋtɩ 'ʋn 'wlʋ due', 'kaa Kea 'a ‑Suu ‑kwɛai mɛ ‑ɛɛ po ʋʋpʋ ‑je o, ɛmɛ ‑tɩ nyiɔpʋ 'bɛɛ‑ ʋʋ 'je wlu ‑wlʋa 'de Kea 'ʋn 'tmʋ.

Ka sɩ 'tmʋʋn nɩa 'e Suifʋ‑wi" "klu tɛin" ‑wɛe ʋʋa 'daa‑ ʋʋa' ‑cɛ" Kea 'a wlu 'kwajaaʋn ɛ, 'kamɔ sɩ 'tmʋʋn a mu 'de aopʋ "klu nɩa' ‑ke, ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'je ʋʋa' ‑cɛ" kɛ' wɔ ‑saʋn 'daa‑. Dɩ ‑ɩ sea tɔ' nɩ ɛ, ɩmɩ ʋʋa mu nyʋ tɔɔa' ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'je ʋʋa' "jru ‑jei" ‑saa. Nyʋ 'blei ‑jɔ ‑seia ʋʋpʋ ɛ, ʋʋa muɛ ‑mɔ 'ɔ ‑tɩ' o 'bɔa' ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'je ʋʋa' ‑cɛ" Kea 'a 'pee "jru ja‑ de 'bɔɔ‑ nɔ".
Nyʋ ‑tuu"‑tuu a muɛ 'bo ʋʋa' kplɩn saɩn 'de blaa' ‑wɛe 'de ʋʋa' nʋʋkplɩn 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn ɛ, nyʋ 'je tɔ' ‑tɩ 'a ‑jeblʋ wlaa‑.
Sɩ 'tmʋʋn ‑nʋ, ʋʋa muɛ 'wɛi 'je ‑tɩ ‑tu" 'a 'sʋ ʋʋ 'je aopʋ sɩ wɔn dii‑, ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'je aopʋ 'ʋn dii‑. 'Kaa ʋʋa' 'pee 'jeeɛ sese, ɛɛ' 'o nynia' se 'ʋn ‑kwlei 'de ʋʋ ‑teɛ isɔan' 'a kein"ke.

Dɛɛ‑tɩ 'ɩn 'da kan' a, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ Kea "srɛi. Ɛɛ' "soa‑wi" ‑nʋa dɛsaʋn tɛin" ɛ, ɛ se ʋʋpʋ "i "tai‑, 'kaa ʋʋ pooɛ "cɩn sɩn' ‑wɛe ɛ po ʋʋpʋ 'de kwie blo' 'di 'de "bie‑gbau" klaa" 'di, ‑wɛe ʋʋ ‑te i 'demu, 'de ʋʋa fuo ɛɛ' nyʋ 'a 'pee 'jewɩ.

'De nyʋ ‑ʋʋ nʋa dɛsaʋn tɛin" ɛ, Kea se ʋʋpʋ "i "tai‑, 'kaa ɛ dbaa "ni klaa" ‑wɛe ɛ 'plee‑ 'kmʋ "kpei, 'de ɛ 'dba dɛsaʋnʋʋn ‑wee' "klein. 'Kaa ɛ 'pʋʋɛ Noe ke ɔɔ' 'cɛ ‑mɛ" 'sɔn ke, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɔ nʋɛ "isrɛdɩ 'bo Kea "juɔi. ‑Ta nyiɔpʋ a nʋʋa dɩsaɩn ɛ, ɔ 'tmʋʋ‑ ʋʋpʋ 'mɛ, ɔ 'na : Dɩ aoa nʋa ɩ nyniɛ "jrii, ao 'bɔ ɩ o, ao nʋ dɛ 'dɔe.

'Bo ‑mɛ 'de ɛ, Sodɔm ke Gomɔɔ ‑ɩ ‑nɩa dɛsaʋnʋ ‑kwlɔ ɛ, Kea 'wlʋ ɩa' 'pee 'mɛ ‑ke, ɛ nʋɛ nɛ ‑wɛe ɛ ‑sa ɩa' ‑kwlɛ ‑tu i. Nyʋ ‑ʋʋa' 'je ɛɛ' wlu wɔn 'de ‑sɩanwɩ 'di ɛ, dɛ ‑ɛɛ mua ʋʋpʋ "jrii nʋa' mɛ ‑ɛɛ sʋn ɛ toa 'o 'mʋa‑.
'Bo ɩa' ‑kwlɛ ‑tu 'di ɛ, Lɔtɩ mɔ ‑srɛi", dɩsaɩn ʋʋa nʋa 'mʋa‑ ɩa "kaeɛ ɔ "jrii. Ɔɔ' 'sʋ mɔ Kea 'pʋʋ‑.

Dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɔmɔ ‑ɔ ‑nɩa dɛ 'dɔenʋi ‑wɛe ‑ɔ ‑tia" 'bo ʋʋpʋ "klu ɛ, ‑bo ɔɔ sea ʋʋa' kplɩn saɩn "jriɛ‑ 'jee‑, ‑wɛe ɔɔ sea ʋʋa' wlu saɩn 'wɔn jeejee, ɩa kpʋn ɔ ‑kwlʋ 'sʋ ɔɔ' 'mɩ a cɛn mlɛun" 'de ɔ 'di, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɔ 'srɛi".
Nyʋ ‑srɛai" ɛ, Tʋ"bo juo ʋʋpʋ 'a seie ka 'mɛ 'de 'kle 'kwa. 'De ‑ta ɛ 'jea 'diwɔn nyniʋn ‑te' ‑wɛe ɛɛ' 'pee 'jea ʋʋpʋ kpʋn nyʋ ‑wee' 'a 'pee 'jewɩ o ɛ, ɛ juo 'bo ‑mɔ 'mɛ.

Nyʋ ɛɛ' 'pee tu 'jea kpʋn mɔ ‑wee' ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ nyʋ tɔ' saɩn nɩa 'de 'ʋn ‑wɛe ‑ʋʋa ‑flɛɛan' Kea 'a "ikmaa' a, 'de ‑ʋʋ ‑na ‑ʋʋ se ɛ wɔn 'jei ʋʋpʋ ‑o. Ʋʋ kuɛ "jru, ʋʋa 'bɛɛ‑ ʋʋa' ‑cɛi", ʋʋa' 'je nyɔ "o nyɔ jrɔ' 'ɔ wlu dɛ 'ʋn. Nyʋ klae" ‑ʋʋ ‑nɩa wɔn 'je ka a, ʋʋa' plee ʋʋpʋ, ʋʋa' wɔn o toa 'a faʋn 'a nʋ ʋʋpʋ.
Kea 'a "soa‑wi" ‑blea 'kpɩ ‑wɛe ‑ʋʋ ‑kmai", ʋʋ ‑sia sɩ 'tmʋʋn ‑nʋ ɛ, ʋʋ 'bɛɛ‑ ʋʋ 'je ʋʋpʋ wlaa‑ 'de‑, 'kaa ‑wi" ‑mʋ 'a nʋ kan'. Ʋʋa' wluɛ ʋʋpʋ 'dei 'bo Kea "juɔi.

'Kaa ʋʋa' nyʋ tu ɛ, dɩ ʋʋ sea 'e 'de juo ɩmɩ ʋʋa 'tmʋ wlu saɩn ‑pee. Ʋʋa' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ tɔ' ‑ɔ po ʋʋpʋ ‑je o. Ka 'kwla 'dinmi ‑sea tɔ'di nɩ a nʋa, 'kamɔ ʋʋa nʋ. Ʋʋa muɛ 'mɛa' ka 'kwla 'dinmi a mua 'mɛa' ‑ke ɛ. Ʋʋa' ‑cɛ" 'kpa 'a dɩsaɩn mɩ ‑ɩa mu ʋʋpʋ i‑saa'.

'Kle ʋʋa mua 'jea' ɛmɛ ‑ɛɛ mu 'kle ʋʋ ‑tua" nyʋ 'a ‑kei" nɩa'. Dɛ ʋʋpʋ nɩa "i ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ʋʋ 'je ʋʋa' 'tʋn nʋ‑tɩ saɩn nʋ 'jrʋ ‑gbao. Ʋʋa' 'de aopʋ "klu nɩa' 'bleɛ ‑tɩn'. Ʋʋ ke aoa po sʋn ‑tadue 'mɛ kpɩɩn‑, 'kaa ʋʋ pooɛ "jri de ‑wɛe ʋʋa poo aopʋ 'srɛ i. Ɛmɛ ‑ɛɛ nʋ ʋʋpʋ 'tʋn.

Jɛi" 'jejriɛ 'ɛ 'sʋ ‑nɩ 'e ʋʋpʋ 'kʋn, ʋʋ se dɛsaʋn nʋa' o 'bɔ due'. ‑Bo ʋʋ 'je nyʋ ‑ʋʋa Kea 'a ‑jei" naa' sea iku ɛ, ʋʋa "tuɛn ʋʋpʋ 'de dɛsaʋn 'di. 'Wɛi 'a 'tʋn 'bleɛ ʋʋpʋ kʋɔn 'ʋn. Ʋʋa' nyʋ tu ɛ, Kea 'a 'daɩn a muɛ ʋʋpʋ kpʋan' ka "o ka.
Ʋʋ 'wlʋ 'bo ‑je ‑cɛɛn' "i 'mɛ ‑wɛe ʋʋ "maa ʋʋa' ‑cɛ". Bosɔ 'ɔ "ju Balaam ‑ɔ ‑kma 'wɛi 'a ‑tɩ' ‑wɛe ‑ɔ ‑wɔan dɛ ‑nyniia "jrii 'a nʋ‑tɩ tɛin" 'de ɛ, ɔmɔ ‑ɔɔ ‑kɔ ʋʋ bla 'o 'de.

Dɛ ɔɔ' Balaam ‑tu sea Kea wɔn 'je ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nʋɛ' ‑wɛe soofae' ‑sea' wlu 'ble wluu ɔ kwa, ka nyiɔ ɔ wlua ‑wɛe ɛ ‑cɛ' ɔ "bli 'bo ‑jei". 'De ɛ kaan ɔɔ' Kea 'a wlu 'kwajaai tu ‑je de ‑wɛe ɔ je kpɛɛn' dɩ ‑cɩɛi" nʋ.
Aoa 'jee, nyʋ ‑a tɔɔa nyʋ sɩ‑tɩ ɛ, ʋʋ se kpɔ 'ble. Ka "ni a ma 'o "kao‑ wɔn ɛ, 'kamɔ ʋʋpʋ nɩ‑. 'De ka poɔ' ɔ sia "ni 'de ɛɛ' dba, 'kamɔ ʋʋpʋ nɩ‑. Ʋʋa' ‑teɩn nmaeɛ' 'de kwie jre 'di, 'demɔ ʋʋ 'je mu.

Dɩ ʋʋa nʋa see ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ 'de kpɛɛn' ‑tɩ 'tmʋa' 'di 'bo ʋʋa 'bɛɛ‑ ʋʋa' ‑cɛi". Nyʋ ‑ʋʋ ‑wlʋa 'de nyʋ ‑se' Kea juo "klu ‑wɛe ‑ʋʋa naa Kea 'a ‑jei" dee 'ʋn ɛ, ʋʋ ‑pʋ ʋʋa ‑pɔn ʋʋ 'je 'bo Kea 'a ‑jei" ‑sa. Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ ʋʋ 'blee‑ ʋʋ ‑pʋ wɛ‑ɛ" o ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'je 'o ʋʋ ‑pʋ 'a nyiɔtɔ' saɩn 'de bla.

Ʋʋa ‑teɛ ʋʋpʋ pɛe 'dii, ʋʋ 'na : Aoa muɛ aoa' ‑cɛ" ‑pee ‑tea'. 'De ‑mɛ 'kamɔ ʋʋa' ‑cɛ" 'kpa 'a kplɩn saɩn ‑jea ʋʋ i ‑sa a, ʋʋ nɩ ɩa' kʋɔnpʋ‑, 'de 'kamɔ ɛ nɩ dɛ "o dɛ ‑sia ‑ʋn wɔn ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑ble ‑ʋn kʋɔn 'ʋn.

Tɔ' ‑o, ‑bo nyɔ juo Sesi Klisɩ ‑nɩa Tʋ"bo ‑wɛe ‑ɔ ‑nɩa Nyʋ'pʋʋi ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔ ‑saa 'kmʋ "kpeidɩ ‑ɩa kpʋʋan nyʋ ‑flɛn" kwa ‑sɔn. 'Kaa ‑bo ʋʋ "tai‑ ʋʋa' ‑cɛi" ‑wɛe 'kmʋ "kpeidɩ 'je tʋ 'a "jru kpa 'bo ʋʋpʋ "kpei ke'wlɛ ɛ, ‑mɛ ʋʋa' tɛin" ‑nɛ "paa' ɛ je ʋʋa' de'bɔɔ‑ ‑nɛ ‑sii.
'De ‑bo ɛ nɩ kan' ‑mɔ ɛ, ‑mɛ ʋʋa' ‑ɩn se "isrɛ ‑jeblʋ juo "paa', ɛ je ‑ɩn ‑juo ɛ ‑wɛe ‑ɩn ‑wlʋ 'bo Kea 'a kɛ' ‑sɔn ‑sii.
"Nɩɩ ‑aa nyʋ ‑cɔʋn' poa tɛin" 'tmʋɛ tɔ' ‑tɩ, ɩ 'naa : Dɩ ‑gbe' ‑kwla' ɩmɩ ɛ 'bɔɔ‑ de ɛ di. 'De be" nyʋ jrea, ɛmɛ ‑biie" ɛɛ' ‑cɛ" 'pɔɔ "jrii. Ka ʋʋ nʋa ‑ke, 'ka ‑nao.

'Ma ‑tɩ' kmaʋn, 'ma aopʋ 'a 'sbɛ ‑jei" poa 'a kpɛ 'sɔɔn ‑nɛ ka. Dɩ 'ɩn 'crɩa 'de 'ma 'sbɛ ‑nɩa kpɛ 'sɔɔn 'di ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ, 'ɩn nɩɛ "i 'ɩn 'je aopʋ ‑tɩ' ‑kwlʋ o poo‑, 'de ao 'bo i "mae'‑ ‑wɛe aoa' tɔ' 'je 'pepe nɩ‑.
Dɛ 'ma ‑pɔan i ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ao 'bo wlu Kea 'a wlu 'kwa jaaʋn 'tmʋa tɛin" o "mae. Kɛ' Sesi ‑nɩa ‑aa Tʋ"bo ‑wɛe ‑ɔ ‑nɩa ‑aa 'Pʋʋi "nyɩa ao, ‑wɛe ɔɔ' dboʋn tɔɔa aopʋ ɛ, ao 'bo ɛ o"mae ‑ke.
Dɛ ‑kɔan ‑tɩ' ‑wɛe ao 'jea ‑kwlɩ" 'blee‑ ɛmɛ ‑nɩ 'de de 'bɔɔwɩ o ɛ, nyʋ ‑nʋa ʋʋa' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ 'tʋn nʋ‑tɩ ɛ, ʋʋpʋ ‑a mu jia' ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'je aopʋ‑ wlaa‑.

Ʋʋa muɛ wlua' ka 'de ao ‑pee : Aomɔ se 'na Sesi Klisɩ 'na ɔɔ jiɛ dee ? Ɔ 'de ɛ‑ la‑ ? ‑A "bo ‑wi" ‑fua ɔɔ' dejia' ‑ke 'de ɛ, ‑wi" ‑mʋ 'mɛɛ sese, ‑mɛ ɔ se ji ke. Dɛ ‑tba' 'de sese o ɛ, ka 'kmʋnɩa 'de ɛ, 'kamɔ 'kmʋ nɩ‑, dɛ jrɛ' se fai" pooɛ ke !
Nyʋ ‑a wlua kan' ʋʋa' nyʋ tu jʋɩ' 'pepe ka Kea wlua ‑wɛe jaʋn ke 'blʋa‑ ‑nʋʋa, ‑wɛe 'blʋa‑ ke "ni poa ‑paʋn, 'de ka Kea cɛɛan 'de "ni 'ʋn ‑wɛe ɛ nʋa 'blʋa‑ a, 'kaa ʋʋ se ɛ "inɩ ʋʋ 'jɩ ‑kwlɩ" 'blee‑.
Wlu due' ‑nɛ, ɛmɛ Kea nʋ ‑wɛe "ni 'plee‑ 'kmʋ ‑nɩa tɛin" "kpei 'de ɛ sɔn i.

'Kaa Kea 'a wlu due' ‑nɛ, ɛmɛ ‑na 'blʋa‑ ke jaʋn ‑a ‑jeea "jriɛ‑ 'de ‑sɩanwɩ 'di ɛ, ɩ ‑teɛ nɛ 'ɛ ‑tea'. Ɩa muɛ i ‑tea' mamaʋ 'sʋ ɩ 'je nyʋ ‑wee' 'a 'pee 'jewɩ jɛɛ‑. 'De ɩa' 'wɩ tu 'di ɛ, Kea a muɛ nyʋ sea ɛɛ' wlu tɔ' 'ʋn 'je 'a ‑ma" i‑saa'.
'Ma ‑tɩ' kmaʋn, dɛ ‑jɛ ‑kɔan ‑tɩ' ‑wɛe ao sea o "mae' i ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ 'bo Tʋ"bo "juɔi ɛ, 'wɩ due' ‑kɔ' ‑sɩn 'a "wlu due' 'de ‑sɩn 'a "wlu due' ‑kɔ' 'wɩ due'.

Tʋ"bo 'a ‑cnɩ' 'de dɩ ɛ 'tmʋa 'a nʋʋ ‑tɩ 'ʋn ka nyʋ jrʋ' a naa tɔ' i ɛ. 'Kaa ɛ kuuɛ tɔ' i ke 'de aoa' ‑tɩ' 'ʋn, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɛ se ɛ "i nɩ nyɔ jrɔ' 'je isɔn‑. Dɛ ɛɛ ‑pɔan i ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ nyʋ ‑wee' "klein 'je ʋʋa' dɩsaɩn "i juo‑ ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'je 'de ɛ o "biie‑.

'De ‑mɛ 'kamɔ Tʋ"bo 'a 'wɩ a mu nyʋ "jru ‑tiia' ka "jrii 'a ‑kwlɔ paa' nɩa. 'De ɛɛ' 'wɩ tu 'di ɛ, jaʋn a muɛ isɔan', ɛɛ' kwiewlu a muɛ faʋn 'blea', ɛ 'je dɩ ‑wee' ‑sii. Nɛ ɛ muɛ dɩ ‑nɩa 'de jaʋn 'di ‑wee' sian' ‑wɛe 'blʋa‑ ke dɩ "klein ‑nɩa 'de 'blʋa‑ "kpei 'je isɔn ‑ke.
‑Jɛ dɩ ‑wee' 'a isɔnsʋn a mua kan' ‑mɔ nɩa' 'ja a, ‑mɛ ka ao 'jea na ao juo kan' ‑mɔ 'mɛ. Ao "nyɩ aoa' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ 'kmʋ Kea ‑wɛe ao 'je ɛ wɔn 'je 'de dɛ "o dɛ ‑wee' 'ʋn.

‑Ta ao nɩɩa Kea 'a ‑nɩ 'wɩ ‑nɩa nynia' fua' a, ao "duo 'kpɩ 'ʋn, dɩ "klein ao 'bɛɛa nʋa', ao 'jɩ nʋ ‑wɛe ɛɛ' 'wɩ tu 'je nyni ‑too"‑. 'De ɛɛ' 'wɩ tu 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn, nɛ ɛ muɛ jaʋn dia' ‑wɛe dɩ "klein ‑nɩa 'de ɛ 'ʋn ɩ 'je nyɛi 'de ɩ 'je isɔn‑.
'Kaa Kea cɛn wlu ‑tie", ɛ 'naa ɛɛ muɛ jaʋn dee ke 'blʋa‑ dee nʋa' ‑wɛe "isrɛʋn 'a 'sʋ 'je 'bo ɛ "kpei "ti. Ɛmɛ ‑aa fuo.
Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ 'ma ‑tɩ' kmaʋn, ‑ta ‑a ‑nɩɩa ɩa' dɩ tu fua' a, ao kpʋʋn aoa' ‑cɛ" i ‑wɛe ‑sɔntɩ Tʋ"bo a muɛ de jia' a, 'de ɔ 'bo aopʋ ‑kɔ ‑pʋn" jeeɛ, ‑wɛe pɛe 'a blua' 'je 'o ao ke Kea 'nynɩ nɩ‑.

Ao poɛ ‑kwlʋ o, dɛɛ‑tɩ Tʋ"bo sea de ji ke ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ɔ nɩɛ "i nyʋ 'je 'pʋ. ‑Aa de'di Pɔo ‑ɔɔ ‑tɩ' ‑a ‑kma, ɔ 'tmʋ ɩa' dɩ tu 'mɛ 'de ao ‑pee ‑ke. Kea mɛ ‑po ɔ tɔ'di, ‑wɛe ɔ 'crɩ ɩa' wlu tu 'de 'sbɛ 'di.

'De ɔɔ' 'sbɩ ‑wee' ɔɔ 'crɩa 'di ‑bo ɔ bla ɛɛ' dɛ tu 'a ‑tɩ' "i ɛ, ka ɔɔ 'tmʋ ɩ, 'kamɔ ‑nao. 'De wlu jrɩ' ‑nɩ 'e ‑wɛe ‑ɩa 'mii 'wɔan' nɩ 'kle. Nyʋ sea tɔ' 'ble ‑wɛe ‑ʋʋa' ‑kwlea wlu ‑kwlin ‑saatɩ ɛ, ʋʋa poo ɩ fai", ka ʋʋa pooa wlu jrɩ' ‑crɩɩa 'de Kea 'a 'sbɛ 'di fai" see ɛ. Ʋʋa' nyʋ tu a ja ʋʋa' ‑cɛ" Kea 'a 'pee "jru.

'Kaa 'ma ‑tɩ' kmaʋn, aopʋ mɔ ɛ, nyʋ ‑saa aopʋ fɛn' 'mɛ sese, ɛmɛ ‑tɩ ao 'je aoa' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ ‑tɩ' ‑tu" ‑wɛe nyʋ ‑ʋʋa' 'jea Kea 'a wlu wɔn je aopʋ 'a "jru ‑jei" ‑saa, 'de ʋʋa' sɩ je ɛ nʋ ‑wɛe ao je 'bo ʋʋpʋ 'a ‑kɔ 'de bla.

Dɛ ‑jɛ ao 'jea nʋ ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ao bla 'bo ‑aa Tʋ"bo Sesi Klisɩ ‑ɔ ‑nɩa ‑aa 'Pʋʋi 'a ‑kɔ 'de, ao 'je nya mu, ‑wɛe ao 'je ɔ juo sɔɔn‑ sɔɔn‑, 'de ɔ 'je aopʋ "diwan po. Ka ‑a ‑bɛɛa' ɔɔ' 'nynɩ "i 'de ‑sɩanwɩ 'di ɛ, ‑a ‑bɛɛ' kan' ɔɔ' 'nynɩ "i mamaʋ 'sʋ. Ɛ nɩ kan' jeejee !
I John: "Ju ‑ɔɔ ‑tɩ' ‑aa jia aopʋ 'tmʋa' 'de 'sbɛ ‑nɛ 'di ɛ, ɔmɔ ‑nɩ Kea 'a wlu ‑ɛɛ ‑nyɩa" nyiɔ 'kmʋnɩa' ‑sea' ‑kwɛ ‑ta 'ble ɛ. Ɔ nɩɛ 'kmʋ sese ‑mɛ dɩ ‑wee' "klein se nʋʋɛ ke. ‑Ta ɔ nɩɩa 'nɔ 'kmʋ "kpei ɛ, ‑a poɛ ɔɔ' wlu doin" o, ‑aa ‑cɛ" 'kpa 'je ɔ "jriɛ‑ 'mɛ, ‑wɛe ‑a ‑gbʋn ɔ ja 'pepe, 'de ‑aa sʋn blɔ "i.

‑Bo ‑aa sea 'kmʋ ‑sea' ‑kwɛ ‑ta 'ble 'a ‑tɩ' 'tmʋ ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔmɔ ‑aa ‑da. Ɔmɔ ‑ɔ ‑nɩ 'bo ɔ "Bo ‑pʋn" 'de‑, ‑wɛe ‑ɔ ‑wlʋ 'o 'de ‑ɔ ji 'nɔ 'blʋa‑ "kpei, ‑wɛe ‑a ‑jee' "jriɛ‑. Ɔ "Bo nʋɛ', ‑wɛe ɔ 'wlʋ 'kwla 'de ‑a ‑pee. Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ ‑aa ‑tmʋ ɔɔ' ‑tɩ' 'de ao ‑pee.
Dɩ "klein ‑a ‑jea 'de ‑a ‑wɔan 'de ɔ 'wɔn ɛ, ɩmɩ ‑aa ‑tmʋ 'de aopʋ ‑pee ‑ke, ‑wɛe ao ke ‑aa dbɛɛdɛ 'je "i "sii‑, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɛɛ' dbɛɛdɛ tu ɛ, Kea ke ɛɛ' "Ju Sesi Klisɩ ‑tu" ɛ 'bo ʋʋ ke ‑a ‑nynɩ.
‑Bo ‑aa sea aopʋ 'sbɛ ja 'de dɩ ‑nɩa 'mʋa 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑a ‑nɩɛ "i ‑wɛe ‑a ‑wee' 'a 'mʋa‑ 'je 'pepe nɩ‑.
Dɛ ‑a ‑wɔan 'de Sesi Klisɩ 'wɔn ‑wɛe ‑aa ‑tmʋʋ' a aopʋ‑ ɛ, ɛ ka : ɛmɛ ‑nɩ Kea nɩɛ ‑sɔn' ‑o, kwie 'a dɛ‑saan" ka se 'de ɛ 'ʋn nɩ‑.
‑Bo ‑a ‑na ‑a ‑ke Kea "siiɛ "i ɛ, ‑wɛe ‑aa sea kwie 'a dɩ ‑cɩɛi" i nʋ ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑aa ‑tmʋɛ sɩ, ‑aa' nʋ tɔi" dɩ.
'Kaa ka Kea nɩa 'de ‑sɔn' 'ʋn ‑bo ‑a ‑nɩ 'de ‑sɔn' 'ʋn kan' a, ‑mɛ ka ‑a ‑tia ‑a ‑wee' nɩɛ dɛ due', ‑wɛe dɛ ɛɛ' "Ju Sesi 'mɛa 'bo ‑aa ‑kɔi" 'de ɛɛ' ‑tɩ' 'ʋn ɛ, Kea ‑kɔ' ‑aa dɩsaɩn ‑wee' 'mɛ 'pepe.
‑Bo ‑a ‑na dɛsaʋn 'a ‑kɔ se ‑a ‑pʋn" nɩ ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑aa pooɛ ‑aa ‑cɛ" 'srɛ i, tɔ' ‑tɩ se 'de ‑a 'ʋn nɩ‑, dɛ‑nʋɛ' dɛsaʋn 'a ‑kɔ ‑nɩ ‑a ‑pʋn" 'mɛ.
'Kaa ‑bo ‑a ‑wɔɔn' ‑aa dɩsaɩn "i 'de Kea ‑pee ɛ, ɛɛ muɛ ɩ ‑kɔa' see, ‑wɛe ɛ 'je ‑aa 'di 'a wɔnynia' ‑wee' "klein "kpei 'wlʋ, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɛ ‑srɛi", ‑wɛe ɛɛ' 'wlʋ wlu "kpei.
‑Bo ‑a ‑na ‑a se dɛsaʋn nʋ ɛ, ‑mɛ Kea ‑ɛ ‑na ‑a ‑nɩɛ dɛsaʋnʋʋn ‑o ɛ, ‑aa nʋ ɛ sɩ 'tmʋi 'ʋn, ‑mɛ ɛɛ' wlu se 'de ‑a 'ʋn nɩ‑.

'Ma "nynuu‑, dɩ 'ma 'crɩa 'de 'sbɛ 'di ‑ta ‑wɛe 'ma ja aopʋ‑ ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ao 'je dɛsaʋn nʋ‑tɩ 'bɔ, ɛmɛ ‑tɩ 'ma nʋ kan'. 'De ‑bo ‑aa jrɔ' nʋ dɛsaʋn ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑a ‑bleɛ ‑tɩ' "kpei ‑sai 'bo Kea "juɔi. Ɔmɔ ‑nɩ Sesi Klisɩ ‑ɔ ‑srɛai" ɛ,
dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɔ to 'e ɔɔ' ‑cɛ" 'mɛ ‑wɛe ɔ ‑saa ɔɔ' ‑cɛ" 'sraa‑ 'de ‑aa dɩsaɩn 'a ‑kwɛ‑ ‑tɩ 'ʋn. Ɛ se 'de ‑aa 'sʋ 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn nɩ‑, ɔ nʋ ɛɛ' dɛ tu 'mɛ 'de 'blʋa‑ ‑wee' "klein 'a dɩsaɩn 'a ‑kwɛ‑tɩ 'ʋn ‑ke.
‑Bo ‑aa sea Kea 'a wlu wɔn 'je ɛ, ‑mɛ ka ‑a ‑jua Kea ‑a ‑je kan' 'mɛ.
Nyɔ ‑ɔ ‑na ‑ɔ juo Kea 'mɛ, ‑wɛe ‑ɔɔ' 'jea ɛɛ' wlu wɔn ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔ nɩɛ sɩ 'tmʋi ‑o. tɔ' ‑tɩ se 'de ɔ 'ʋn nɩ‑.
'Kaa nyɔ ‑ɔɔ ‑jea ɛɛ' wlu wɔn ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔmɔ ‑kma Kea 'a ‑tɩ' ‑cɛɛn'‑. Ka ‑a ‑ke Kea "sia "i ɛ, ka ‑a ‑jea ɛɛ' juosʋn nʋ, 'kamɔ ‑nao.
Nyɔ ‑ɔ ‑na ‑ɔ ‑ke Kea "siiɛ "i ɛ, ‑mɛ ka Sesi na, 'kamɔ ɔ 'je na.
'Ma ‑tɩ' kmaʋn, dɛ ‑ɛɛ ‑tɩ' 'ʋn 'ma ja aopʋ 'sbɛ ‑nɛ, ɛ se kɛ' dee 'ma bla nɩ‑, ɛ kɛ' soa soa ‑o. Ɛɛ' kɛ' tu ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ Kea 'a wlu ao 'wɔan tɛin" sese, ɛ 'na : ao kma ba 'a ‑tɩ'.

'De ‑mɛ 'kamɔ dɛ 'ma 'crɩa ‑wɛe 'ma ja aopʋ‑ ɛ, ɛ nɩ kɛ' dee. Dɛɛ‑tɩ ɛ nɩa kɛ' dee ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ɛɛ' tɔ' ‑tɩ poɛ "jri "kpae' 'de Sesi 'a 'kmʋ 'ʋn, ‑wɛe ɛ po "jri "kpae' ‑ke 'de aoa' 'kmʋ 'ʋn. Kaan ka kwie nɩɛ mua', ‑wɛe ‑sɔn' ‑cɛɛn' nɩ ‑sɩɩan' la 'bode.
Nyɔ ‑ɔ ‑na ‑ɔ ‑nɩɛ 'de ‑sɔn' 'ʋn ‑wɛe ‑ɔ ‑nyɛa ɔɔ' de 'di 'ʋn ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔɔ' jei tu se 'de kwie 'di 'wlʋ ke.
Nyɔ ‑kma ɔɔ' de'di 'a ‑tɩ' ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑mɔ "tiɛ 'de ‑sɔn' 'ʋn, dɛ ‑ɛ ‑jea ɔɔ' de'di 'de dɛsaʋn 'di po ɛ, ɛ se 'de ɔ 'ʋn nɩ‑.
'Kaa nyɔ ‑ɔ ‑nyɛa ɔɔ' de'di 'ʋn, ‑mɛ ‑mɔ nɩɛ 'de kwie 'di, ɔɔ' 'je i. ‑Ta ɔɔ mua ɔ se 'o juo‑, dɛ‑nʋɛ' kwie kpee 'de ɔ "jri 'de 'mɛ.
'Ma "nynuu‑, 'ma pooɛ aopʋ 'sbɛ ‑nɛ ‑jei" ‑wɛe ka aoa' dɩsaɩn ‑kwɛ‑a 'de Sesi 'a 'nynɩ 'ʋn ao 'je ɛ ‑kwlʋ o po.

Ao ‑ɔ ‑nɩa "bo ‑wi" ɛ, 'ma 'crɩ 'sbɛ ‑nɛ 'mɛ ‑wɛe 'ma poo aopʋ ‑tɩ' ‑kwlʋ o. Ka Kea nɩa 'kmʋ sese ɛ, ao juɩ'. Ao ‑kooa" mɩɩ" ‑wi" 'ma pooɛ aopʋ 'sbɛ ‑nɛ ‑jei" ‑wɛe ka ao kpa tʋ 'a "jru 'bo 'di 'a wɔnynii "kpei ɛ, 'de ao 'je ɛ ‑kwlʋ o po.

'Ma "nynuu‑, 'ma ja aopʋ 'sbɛ‑ ‑wɛe 'ɩn 'je ao ‑tɩ' ‑kwlʋ o poo‑, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ao juo Kea ‑ɛ ‑nɩa ‑a "Bo 'mɛ. Ao nyʋ ‑cɔʋn'‑, 'ma pooɛ aopʋ ‑tɩ' ‑kwlʋ o ‑ke ‑wɛe ka ao jua Kea ‑ɛ ‑nɩa 'kmʋ tɛin" sese ɛ, ao 'je ɛ ‑kwlɩ" 'blee‑. ‑Kooa" mɩɩ", 'ɩn 'tmʋʋ aopʋ wlu ‑nɩa 'mʋa‑ 'mɛ ‑ke ‑wɛe 'ɩn 'je aopʋ ‑tɩ' ‑kwlʋ o poo ‑wɛe ka ao dia ‑kla a, 'de Kea 'a wlu "tia 'de aopʋ 'ʋn 'ɛ ‑wɛe ao kpa tʋ 'a "jru 'bo 'di 'a wɔnynii "kpei ɛ, ao 'jɩ juo‑.
Ao 'bo 'kmʋ "kpeidɩ 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa. ‑Bo nyɔ kma 'kmʋ "kpeidɩ 'a ‑tɩ' ɛ, ‑mɛ Kea 'a 'tʋn se ‑teɩn 'ble 'de ɔ pɛe o.
Dɩ "klein ‑ɩ ‑nɩa 'kmʋ 'a dɩ ɛ, ɩ ka : tɔ' saɩn ‑ɩ ‑nɩa 'de nyʋ pɛe o, dɩ ‑wee' "klein pooa ‑ʋn pɛe "i o, ‑cɛi" 'bɛɛa' ‑ɛ ‑wlʋa 'de "wliiɛ‑ 'blea' 'ʋn o, ɩ se 'de Kea 'ʋn 'wlʋ, ɩ nɩɛ 'kmʋ 'a dɩ ‑o.
'Kmʋ a muɛ ‑sia' ɛ ke ɛɛ' dɩ "klein nyiɔ ɔ ‑pɔan i ke, 'kaa nyɔ ‑ɔɔ nʋa Kea 'a ‑kwlʋtɩ ɛ, ɔ ke Kea a muɛ 'kmʋnɩa' mamaʋ 'sʋ.
'Ma "nynuu‑, de'bɔɔ‑ nɔ" "kʋʋan‑ i ! Klisɩ 'a o ‑fɔin ‑ɔɔ ji nynɩ ao 'wɔan 'de ɛ, ɔɔ ji'. Nɔ" ‑a ‑nɩa 'di ‑ta, Klisɩ 'a 'ʋn 'nyɛʋn ‑tuu"‑tuu nɩ 'de nyʋ "klu ‑wɛ‑, ɛmɛ ‑toɛ ka de 'bɔɔ‑ nɔ" "kʋʋan i ɛ.

Ʋʋa' nyʋ tu 'wlʋɛ 'de ‑a "klu, 'kaa ʋʋ se ‑aa nyʋ nɩ 'de‑, ɛmɛ ‑tɩ ʋʋ 'wlʋ 'de ‑a "klu. ‑Bo ʋʋ nɩ ‑aa nyʋ 'de ɛ, ‑mɛ ʋʋ se ɛ 'bɛɛ‑ ʋʋ 'je 'de ‑a "klu 'wlʋ. Ka nyʋ ‑ʋʋ ‑ke ‑aa na ʋʋ ‑wee' sea kan' ‑aa 'cɛ nɩ, ʋʋa' 'de ‑a "klu 'wlʋa' mɛ ‑to ɛ 'pepe.
Aopʋ mɔ 'ja a, Kea ‑ɛ ‑nɩa 'pepe ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nyɩ" aopʋ ɛɛ' ‑Suu, ‑wɛe ao ‑wee' "klein juo tɔ' ‑tɩ. Ka nyʋ a poa Kea 'a dbonʋʋn ‑nɩa tɛin" 'cna "jru ɛ, 'kamɔ Kea po ɛɛ' ‑Suu 'de aopʋ 'ʋn.

Dɛɛ ‑tɩ 'ma poa aopʋ 'sbɛ ‑jei" ɛ, ɛ se ‑mɛ ao se tɔ' ‑tɩ juo nɩ‑, 'kaa ao juo tɔ' ‑tɩ 'mɛ, ɛmɛ ‑tɩ 'ma poo ao 'sbɛ ‑nɛ ‑jei" 'de ka sɩ sea 'bɛɛ‑ ɩ 'jea 'de tɔ' ‑tɩ 'ʋn 'wlʋ ɛ, ao 'je kan' ‑mɔ 'mɛ ‑ke.
Nyɔ ‑ɔɔ wlua ‑wɛe ‑ɔ ‑na Sesi se Nyʋ 'pʋʋi Klisɩ nɩ ɛ, ɔmɔ ‑nɩ sɩ 'tmʋ i, ‑mɛ ɔmɔ ‑nɩ Klisɩ 'a 'ʋn 'nyɛi ‑wɛe ‑ɔ ‑na ɔ se ‑a "Bo Kea ke ɛɛ' "Ju 'a ‑tɩ' "i nɩ‑.
'De nyɔ ‑ɔ ‑na ‑ɔ se "Ju juo ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔ ke "Bo se "i "sii‑. 'De nyɔ ‑ɔ ‑na ‑ɔ ‑juo "Ju 'mɛ ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔmɔ ‑ke "Bo "sii‑ "i.
Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ 'ma 'tmʋʋ aopʋ ‑wɛe dɩ "klein ao 'wɔan "i‑saa nɔ" ɛ, 'de ao 'jɩ i ‑te' 'de ao pɛe o. Dɩ ao 'wɔan "i‑saa nɔ" ‑bo ɩ "ti 'de ao pɛe o ɛ, ‑mɛ ao ke ‑a "Bo Kea ke ɛɛ' "Ju "siiɛ "i ‑ke.
Dɛ ‑ɛɛ wlu Klisɩ cɛan ‑tie" ‑wɛe ɔ 'jea ‑a ‑nyɩ" ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ 'kmʋ ‑sea' ‑kwɛ‑ ‑ta 'ble ɛ.
Dɩ ‑nɩ 'ma 'tmʋɩ 'de nyʋ ‑nɩɛ "i ‑ʋʋ ‑jea aoa' "jru ‑jei" ‑saa 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn.

'De aopʋ mɔ ɛ, nyɔ se ɛ 'bɛɛ‑ ‑wɛe ɔ 'je aopʋ dɛ jrɛ' tɔɔ la 'bode, dɛ‑nʋɛ' Klisɩ "nyɩ aopʋ ɔɔ' ‑Suu ‑mɛ ‑wɛe ɛ "ti 'de aopʋ 'ʋn, ɛmɛ ‑ɛɛ tɔɔ aopʋ dɩ ‑wee'. Dɩ ɛɛ tɔɔa aopʋ ɛ, ɩ nɩɛ tɔ', ɩ se sɩ nɩ‑. Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ dɩ ɛɛ tɔɔa aopʋ ɛ, ao 'jɩ wɔn ‑wɛe ao ke Klisɩ 'je "i "sii‑.
Kɩɩn 'ma "nynuu‑, ao ‑te 'de Sesi 'kwai la 'bode ! ‑Bo ‑a ‑wee' nʋ kan' a, ‑wɛe ‑sɔntɩ ɔɔ mua de jia' a, 'de ‑tɩn' je ‑a "i 'dbaa, ‑wɛe ‑a ‑je ɔ o tɛɛn‑.
Ka Sesi 'srɛa "i ‑bo ao 'je kan', ‑mɛ ka nyɔ ‑ɔɔ nʋa "isrɛdɩ 'wlʋa 'de Kea 'ʋn ɛ, ao 'wɔn ɛ 'mii 'pepe ‑ke.

'Ma 'cɛ, ao ‑gbʋn 'nɔ, dɛ Kea kma ‑aa ‑tɩ' ka ! Ɛɛ' nyʋ 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' cɛn ‑je "kpei ‑tie", ɛ nʋɛ' mɔ ‑wee' ɛɛ jea ‑aʋn ɛɛ' "nynuu‑ 'daa‑. 'De ‑a ‑nɩɛ' mɔ ‑cɛɛn'‑. Dɛɛ‑tɩ 'kmʋ "kpeinyʋ se ‑a dɛ 'daa‑, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ʋʋ se Kea juo‑.

'Ma ‑tɩ' kmaʋn, kaan ka la ‑a ‑nɩɛ Kea 'a "nynuu‑ ‑o, dɛ ‑jɛ ‑a ‑jea 'ʋn nɩ 'de nya, ‑mɛ se "jri "kpae' po ke 'pepe. 'De dɛ ‑jɛ ‑a ‑jua 'pepe ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ‑sɔntɩ ɛɛ muɛ "jri "kpae' poa' a, Kea ke ‑aa muɛ dɛ due' nɩa', dɛ‑nʋɛ' ka ɛ nɩa, 'kamɔ ‑aa mu ɛ "jriɛ‑ 'jeea'.
'De nyɔ "o nyɔ ‑tba' ɛɛ' dɛ tu tɔ' "i ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑mɔɔ ‑pɔn 'pepe nɩa' i, ka Sesi nɩa 'pepe ɛ.
'De nyɔ "o nyɔ ‑ɔɔ nʋa dɛsaʋn ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑mɔɔ' 'je Kea 'a kɛ' wɔn. Dɛsaʋn nʋa' mɛ ‑nɩ Kea 'a kɛ' wɔnblaa'.
'De ao juɛ' ka Sesi jia ‑wɛe ɔ 'jea nyʋ dɛsaʋn 'a ‑gbɛ "jru ‑saa a, dɛsaʋn 'a ‑kɔ dɛ‑saan" ka se ɔ ‑pʋn" nɩ‑.
Nyɔ "o nyɔ ‑ɔ ‑ke Sesi "sia "i ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑mɔ 'je dɛsaʋn nʋ ‑tɩ 'bɔ ‑o. 'Kaa nyɔ ‑ɔɔ kpa dɛsaʋn nʋa' nya 'ja a, ‑mɛ ‑mɔ se ɔ 'je, ‑wɛe ɔɔ' juo ‑tɩ.
'Ma "nynuu‑, ao 'bo aoa' ‑cɛi" "taiɛ ‑wɛe nyɔ 'bo ao 'srɛ i pooɛ. Nyɔ ‑ɔɔ nʋa "isrɛdɩ ɛ, ‑mɔ 'srɛi" ka Sesi 'a ‑cɛ" 'kpa 'srɛa "i ɛ.
'De nyɔ ‑ɔɔ kpa dɛsaʋn nʋa' nya a, ‑mɛ ‑mɔ nɩɛ ‑siɔn' 'ɔ nyɔ ‑o, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ‑siɔn' mɔ nɩɛ dɛsaʋnʋi ‑o sese. 'De Kea 'a "Ju ‑mɔ ji' ‑wɛe ɔ 'je ‑siɔn 'ɔ nʋʋdɩ i‑sa.
Nyɔ "o nyɔ ‑wlʋa 'de Kea 'ʋn ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑mɔ 'bɔ dɛsaʋn nʋ‑tɩ, dɛ‑nʋɛ' 'kmʋnɩa' ‑cɛɛn' ‑ɛ ‑wlʋa 'de Kea 'ʋn ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ 'de ɔ 'ʋn 'bode. Ɔ se ɛ 'bɛɛ‑ ɔ 'je dɛsaʋn nʋa' nya kpa, dɛ‑nʋɛ' Kea mɛ ‑nɩ ɔ "Bo.
Nyɔ ‑ɔɔ' nʋa "isrɛdɩ ‑wɛe ‑ɔ sea ɔɔ' de 'di 'a ‑tɩ' kma a, ‑mɛ ‑mɔ se Kea 'a "ju nɩ‑. Dɛ ‑ɛ ‑je ɛ nʋ ‑wɛe nyʋ 'jea Kea 'a "nynuu‑ ke ‑siɔn' 'ɔ "nynuu 'a "kpei‑ ‑seea' ka juo ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nao.
Tɔ' ‑o 'ma 'cɛ, wlu ao 'wɔan tɛin" sese ɛ, ɛ 'naa : ‑A ‑kma ba 'a ‑tɩ' due 'due.
‑A ‑ke Adam 'a "ju Kain 'bo ‑kɔɔɛ, ɔ nɩɛ 'di 'a wɔnynii ‑o. Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ ɔ 'dba ɔɔ' "dei. Dɛɛ‑tɩ ɔ 'dbɔ ɛ‑ ? Ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ɔmɔ 'ɔ nʋʋdɩ nyniɛ "jrii ‑wɛe ɔɔ' "dei 'a ‑nɩ nʋʋdɩ 'srɛi".
'Ma de'di ‑wi", ‑bo nyʋ ‑sea' Kea juo 'nyɛ aopʋ 'ʋn ɛ, tai' 'bo aopʋ "maa.

Ka ‑a ‑wlʋa 'de 'mɛa' 'kwa ‑wɛe ‑a ‑jea 'kmʋ dee nɩa' a, ‑a ‑je kan' 'mɛ. Dɛɛ‑tɩ ‑a ‑jea kan' a, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ‑a ‑kma ba 'a ‑tɩ'. Nyɔ ‑jɔ sea' ɔɔ' de'di 'a ‑tɩ' kma a, ‑mɛ ‑mɔ nɩɛ 'de 'mɛa 'a kʋɔnkwla' ke.
Nyɔ "o nyɔ ‑nyɛa ɔɔ' de 'di 'ʋn ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑mɔ nɩɛ "ku 'dbai ‑o. 'De ka 'kmʋnɩa' ‑sea' ‑kwɛ ‑ta 'ble sea 'de "ku 'dbai 'ʋn nɩ ɛ, ao 'je kan' 'mɛ.

Ao ‑gbʋn 'nɔ, dɛ ‑nɩa 'de nyiɔ 'ɔ ‑tɩ' kma ‑tɩ 'de ɛ, ‑a ‑juɛ', dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɛmɛ ‑nɩ Sesi to 'e ɔɔ' 'kmʋ 'mɛ 'de ‑aa ‑kɔi". ‑Jɛ ɛ nɩa kan' ‑mɔ 'ja a, ‑mɛ ‑amɔ ‑je 'de ‑aa 'kmʋ to ‑ke 'de ‑aa de 'di‑wi" 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn.
‑Bo nyɔ nɩ 'kmʋ 'a dɩ ‑wee' "klein 'a jei ‑wɛe ‑bo ‑tɩ' kpʋn ɔɔ' de 'di, 'de ɔɔ' 'je ɔɔ' wɛe 'ee, ‑mɛ ka Kea 'a nyʋ 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' nʋ 'de ɔɔ' 'ʋn nɩsʋn ɛ‑ ?
'Ma "nynuu‑, ‑a ‑bo nyʋ 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' nʋɛ 'de wɔn 'di ke mɩɩɔ 'dɩdɩ 'ʋn, 'kaa ‑aa nyʋ 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' po "jri "kpae' 'de tɔ' ‑tɩ nʋa' 'ʋn ‑wɛe ka ‑a ‑kma ba 'a ‑tɩ' ɛ, 'de ‑aa nʋʋdɩ 'je ɛ to‑.

'Kamɔ ‑bo ‑a nʋ ɛ, ‑wɛe ka ‑a ‑nɩa 'bo tɔ' ‑tɩ 'a ‑jei" ɛ, ‑a ‑je ɛ juo‑, 'de ‑aa pɛe 'je ja ji 'bo Kea "juɔi. ‑Bo ‑aa pɛe a sea ‑a 'pee kpʋʋn ɛ, ka ‑a ‑jea nʋ ‑wɛe ‑aa pɛe 'jea i ‑te, 'ka ka : Kea ‑jɛ ‑bɛa "i ‑ɛ ‑sia ‑aa pɛe ɛ, ‑mɛ juo dɩ ‑wee' "klein 'mɛ.

'Kamɔ ‑bo ‑a nʋ ɛ, ‑wɛe ka ‑a ‑nɩa 'bo tɔ' ‑tɩ 'a ‑jei" ɛ, ‑a ‑je ɛ juo‑, 'de ‑aa pɛe 'je ja ji 'bo Kea "juɔi. ‑Bo ‑aa pɛe a sea ‑a 'pee kpʋʋn ɛ, ka ‑a ‑jea nʋ ‑wɛe ‑aa pɛe 'jea i ‑te, 'ka ka : Kea ‑jɛ ‑bɛa "i ‑ɛ ‑sia ‑aa pɛe ɛ, ‑mɛ juo dɩ ‑wee' "klein 'mɛ.
'Ma ‑tɩ' kmaʋn, ‑bo ‑aa pɛe se ‑a 'pee kpʋʋn ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑a ‑bleɛ ‑kwlɩ" ‑tedɛ 'mɛ 'bo Kea "juɔi, dɛ jrɛ' 'ɛ faʋn se ‑a nʋi.
Dɛ "o dɛ ‑a ‑tee 'a i ɛ, ‑aa mu ɛ 'jea', dɛ‑nʋɛ' ‑aa ‑jeɛ ɛɛ' kɛ' wɔn, ‑wɛe ‑aa nʋ dɩ ‑nmɔɔa 'de ɛ "jri 'dei ɛ.
'De ɛɛ' kɛ' mɛ ka, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ‑a ‑je ɛɛ' "Ju Sesi Klisɩ 'a 'nynɩ tɔ' 'ʋn 'je, ‑wɛe ‑a ‑je ba 'a ‑tɩ' kma due 'due, 'kamɔ Klisɩ 'da 'de ‑a ‑pee.
'De nyɔ ‑ɔɔ ‑jea Kea 'a kɛ' wɔn ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑mɔ "tiɛ 'de Kea 'ʋn, ‑wɛe Kea "ti 'de ɔ 'ʋn. Ka Kea "tia 'de ‑a 'ʋn ka ‑a ‑jea ɛɛ' juosʋn nʋ ɛ, ɛɛ' ‑Suu ɛ "nyɩa ‑aʋn ɛmɛ ‑nʋɛ ‑wɛe ‑a ‑juo ɛ.

'Ma ‑tɩ' kmaʋn‑, ao 'bo ‑suu "o ‑suu 'a ‑tɩ' tɔ' 'ʋn 'jeɛ, 'kaa ao juo ‑sii 'a "kpei‑ ‑seea' ka‑, ‑wɛe ‑bo ɩ 'wlʋ 'de Kea 'ʋn 'de ao 'je kan' 'je. Dɛɛ‑tɩ 'ɩn 'da kan' a, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ sɩ 'tmʋʋn ‑tuu"‑tuu ‑ji' 'de 'blʋa‑ "kpei ‑wɛe ‑ʋʋa ‑daa' ʋʋa' ‑cɛ" Kea 'a wlu 'kwajaaʋn.
‑Suu ‑ɛ ‑wlʋa 'de Kea 'ʋn ka ao 'jea ɛɛ' juosʋn nʋ, 'ka ka : nyɔ "o nyɔ ka Sesi Klisɩ ‑snɛɛa nyiɔ 'ʋn ‑wɛe ɔ jia 'nɔ 'blʋa‑ "kpei ‑ɔɔ mu ɛ 'tmʋa' a, ‑mɛ Kea 'a ‑Suu ‑nɩ 'de ɔ 'ʋn.

'De nyɔ "o nyɔ ‑ɔ ‑na Sesi se 'e Kea 'ʋn 'wlʋ ɛ, ‑mɛ Kea 'a ‑Suu se 'de ‑mɔ 'ʋn nɩ‑, ‑mɛ Klisɩ 'a 'ʋn 'nyɛi ‑ɔɔ ji nynɩ ao 'wɔan sese ɛ, ɔmɔ ‑ɔɔ ‑suu nɩ 'de ‑mɔɔ' jei tu 'ʋn. Kaan ka la 'ja a, 'ma 'cɛ, Klisɩ 'a 'ʋn 'nyɛi ‑nɔ ɔ ji 'nɔ 'kmʋ "kpei ‑wɛ‑ 'bode.
'Kaa 'ma "nynuu‑, aomɔ ɛ, ao nɩɛ Kea 'a nyʋ ‑o. Ao kpa tʋ 'a "jru 'mɛ 'bo ʋʋa' sɩ 'tmʋʋn tu "kpei, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ‑Suu ‑ɛ ‑nɩa 'de aopʋ 'ʋn ɛ, ɛ kmai", ɛ je ‑suu ‑ɛ ‑nɩa 'de ʋʋpʋ 'ʋn ‑sii.
Ʋʋa' nyʋ tu 'wlʋɛ 'de 'blʋa 'dinyʋ "klu, ɛmɛ ‑tɩ 'blʋa 'di nyʋ po ʋʋpʋ 'a wlu doin" o, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ka 'blʋa 'dinyʋ nɩa "i, 'kamɔ ʋʋpʋ a wlu.
'Kaa ‑apʋ mɔ ɛ, ‑a ‑nɩɛ Kea 'a nyʋ ‑o. Nyɔ ‑ɔ ‑jua Kea a, ɔmɔ ‑ɔɔ po ‑aa wlu doin" o 'de nyɔ ‑ɔ sea Kea juo ɛ, ‑mɔɔ' po ‑aa wlu doin" o. 'Bomɔ ‑aa juo tɔ' ‑tɩ 'a ‑Suu ke sɩ ‑suu 'a "kpei‑ ‑seea' 'ɩn.
'Ma ‑tɩ' kmaʋn‑, ‑a ‑kma ba 'a ‑tɩ' due 'due, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ba 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' 'wlʋɛ 'de Kea 'ʋn. Nyɔ "o nyɔ ‑kma nyʋ 'a ‑tɩ' ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔ 'wlʋɛ 'e Kea 'ʋn, ‑wɛe ɔ juo Kea.
Nyɔ ‑ɔ sea nyiɔ 'ɔ ‑tɩ' kmaa', ‑mɛ ‑mɔ se Kea juo‑, dɛ‑nʋɛ' Kea mɛ ‑nɩ nyʋ 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa'.
Ka Kea 'a nyʋ 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' nʋa "jri "kpae' posʋn, 'ka ka : ɛɛ' "Ju jɔ due' koʋn ‑gbai' mɔ ɛ dbo 'nɔ 'blʋa‑ "kpei ‑wɛe ‑a ‑je 'kmʋnɩa' ‑cɛɛn' 'je 'de ɔɔ' ‑tɩ' tɔ' 'ʋn 'jea' 'ʋn.
Dɛ ɛɛ' nyʋ 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' tu tba 'de "jri, ɛ ka : ɛ se ‑apʋ mɔ ‑ɔ ‑kma Kea 'a ‑tɩ' nɩ‑, 'kaa Kea mɛ ‑kma ‑aa ‑tɩ' ‑wɛe ‑ɛ dbo ɛɛ' "Ju 'de ɔ nʋ ɔɔ' ‑cɛ" 'sraadɛ 'ʋn 'de ‑aa dɩsaɩn 'a ‑kwɛ‑tɩ 'ʋn.
'Ma ‑tɩ' kmaʋn, ‑bo Kea ‑mɛ kma ‑aa ‑tɩ' kan' ‑mɔ ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑a ‑je ba 'a ‑tɩ' kma ‑o due 'due ‑ke.
Nyɔ "o nyɔ se Kea "jriɛ‑ 'jee‑ due', ‑bo ‑a ‑kma ba 'a ‑tɩ' due 'due ɛ, ‑mɛ Kea "ti 'de ‑a 'ʋn 'ɛ, ‑wɛe ɛɛ' nyʋ 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' 'je "jri "kpae' po 'pepe 'de ‑a 'ʋn.
Kea "nyɩ ‑aʋn ɛɛ' ‑Suu 'mɛ ɛmɛ ‑tɩ ka ɛ "tia 'de ‑a 'ʋn ‑wɛe ‑a ‑tia" 'de ɛ 'ʋn ɛ, ‑a ‑bɛɛ' ‑a ‑je ɛ juo‑.
Ka ‑a "Bo Kea ja ɛɛ' "Ju 'de ɔ 'je nyʋ ‑wee' 'a 'Pʋʋi nɩ ‑aa ‑cɛ" 'kpa 'jee ɛ "jriɛ‑ ‑wɛe ‑a ‑nɩ ɛɛ' ‑ta 'jeʋn.
Nyɔ ‑ɔ ‑na Sesi nɩɛ Kea 'a "Ju ‑o ɛ, ‑mɛ Kea "ti 'de ɔ 'ʋn 'ɛ, ‑wɛe ɔmɔ "ti 'de Kea 'ʋn.
Ka "o ka ɛ 'je ɛ nɩ ɛ, ka Kea kma ‑aa ‑tɩ' ɛ, ‑apʋ mɔ 'je kan' 'mɛ ‑pepe, ‑wɛe ‑a ‑je ɛ tɔ' 'ʋn.
'Ma 'cɛ, Kea nɩɛ nyiɔ 'ɔ ‑tɩ' kmaa', nyɔ nyiɔ 'ɔ ‑tɩ' kmaa' "tia 'de 'ʋn ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑mɔ "ti 'de Kea 'ʋn 'ɛ, ‑wɛe Kea "ti 'de ɔ 'ʋn.

Dɛ Kea ‑pɔan ‑wɛe ɛ poa ɛɛ' nyʋ 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' 'de ‑a 'ʋn, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ 'nɔ 'kmʋ "kpei ‑a ‑nɩa ‑ta a, ka Sesi "tia 'de Kea 'ʋn ɛ, 'kamɔ ‑a ‑je 'de Kea 'ʋn "ti ‑ke, ‑wɛe ‑sɔntɩ ‑a mua 'pee 'a 'wɩ nɩa' 'de ‑a ‑je tɔ' tba ‑ta 'ble.

'Ma 'cɛ, Kea 'a nyʋ 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' ‑nɩa 'de ‑a 'ʋn ‑bo ɛ mu ɛ nyni ɛ, ‑mɛ faʋn se ‑a nʋi 'bode, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɛɛ' nyʋ 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' a ‑saa faʋn ‑jei". 'Kaa ‑bo faʋn nɩ 'de nyɔ 'ʋn ɛ, ‑mɛ 'pee ‑nɩ ɔ 'de, ‑mɛ ‑ta Kea nɩa "i ɛ, ɛɛ' nyʋ 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' se 'o nyni ke.
‑A ‑kma Kea 'a ‑tɩ', dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɛmɛ ‑ɛ ‑kma ‑aa ‑tɩ' tɛin".

‑Bo nyɔ 'na ɔ kma Kea 'a ‑tɩ' ‑wɛe ɔ 'nyɛ ɔɔ' de 'di 'ʋn ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔ nɩɛ sɩ 'tmʋi ‑o, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɔɔ' de'di ‑jɔ ɔɔ 'jeea "jriɛ‑ ‑bo ɔ 'nyɛ ‑mɔ 'ʋn 'ee, ‑mɛ Kea ‑jɛ ɔɔ' 'jeea "jriɛ‑ ka ɔ 'je ‑mɛ 'ɛ ‑tɩ' kmasʋn nʋ ɛ‑ ?
Ao ‑gbʋn 'nɔ, kɛ' Sesi "nyɩa ‑aʋn ɛ, ɛ ka : nyɔ ‑ɔ ‑kma Kea 'a ‑tɩ' ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔ 'je ɔɔ' de'di 'a ‑tɩ' kma ‑o ‑ke.
Ka Sesi nɩa Nyʋ'pʋʋi Kea ‑tea 'o ɛ, nyɔ ‑je ɛ tɔ 'ʋn ɛ, ɔmɔ ‑wlʋ 'de Kea 'ʋn. 'De nyɔ "o nyɔ ‑kma "bo 'a ‑tɩ' ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔ kma ɔɔ' "nynuu 'a ‑tɩ' ‑ke.
Ka ‑a ‑kma Kea 'a "nynuu 'a ‑tɩ' 'ee, ka ‑a ‑je ɛɛ' juosʋn nʋ ɛ‑ ? Ka ‑a ‑jea ɛɛ' juosʋn nʋ ɛmɛ ‑nɩ, ‑bo ‑a ‑kma Kea 'a ‑tɩ' ɛ, ‑mɛ ka ɛɛ' wlu "sia 'nynɩ, ‑a nʋ kan'.
‑Bo nyɔ kma Kea 'a ‑tɩ' ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔ 'je ɛɛ' kɛ' wɔn. 'De Kea 'a kɛ' wɔn 'jea' se 'kle nɩ‑,
dɛ‑nʋɛ' nyʋ "klein ‑wlʋa 'de Kea 'ʋn ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑wi" ‑mʋ kpa tʋ 'a "jru 'mɛ 'bo dɩ "klein ‑ɩa' nʋa Kea 'tʋn "kpei. 'De ‑aa Sesi 'a ‑tɩ' tɔ' 'ʋn 'jea' 'ʋn mɔ ‑a ‑kpaa tʋ 'a "jru 'bo dɩ ‑nɩa 'mʋa‑ "kpei.
Nyɔ ‑ɔ ‑beeɛ' ‑ɔ ‑je tʋ 'a "jru kpa 'bo dɩ ‑ɩa' nʋa Kea 'tʋn "kpei ɛ‑ ? Ka Sesi nɩa Kea 'a "Ju, nyɔ ‑je ɛ tɔ' 'ʋn ɛ, ɔmɔ ‑ɔɔ 'sʋ 'bɛɛ‑ tʋ 'a "jru kpaa' 'bo dɩ ‑ɩa' nʋa Kea 'tʋn "kpei.

Tɔ' ‑o, Sesi Klisɩ mɔ ‑ji' ‑wɛe ɔɔ jii 'de "ni ke nymɔ 'ɔ i wlaa' 'ʋn. Ɛ se 'de "ni 'a 'sʋ 'ʋn nɩ‑, 'kaa ɔ cɛɛn 'de "ni ke nymɔ 'ʋn, ‑wɛe ka dɩ ‑nɩa 'mʋa‑ nɩa tɔ' ‑tɩ ɛ, Kea 'a ‑Suu 'tmʋ ɩ. 'De Kea 'a ‑Suu mɛ ‑nɩ tɔ' ‑tɩ.
‑Tɩ 'a ‑ta 'jeʋn taan ‑ʋʋ ‑tmʋa Sesi 'a "kpei ‑tɩ ɛ, ʋʋ ka :
Kea 'a ‑Suu o, "ni o, nymɔ o, ka ʋʋ nɩa taan a, ʋʋ ‑wee' 'tmʋɛ dɛ due' 'de ɔɔ' ‑tɩ' 'ʋn.

Nyʋ ‑ʋʋ ‑jea ‑tɩ' 'a ‑ta dɛ ʋʋ 'tmʋa ‑aa ‑je ɛ tɔ' 'ʋn 'ɛ see. ‑Bo ‑aa sea nyʋ 'a wlu tɔ' 'ʋn 'je 'dee, ‑mɛ dɛɛ ‑tɩ dɛ Kea 'tmʋa, nyʋ se ɛ tɔ' 'ʋn 'je ɛ‑ ? Dɛ Kea 'tmʋa, ɛ nɩɛ dɛwɔn, ɛ je ‑tɩ 'a ‑ta 'jeʋn 'a wlu ‑sii. Dɛ ɛ 'tmʋa ɛmɛ ‑nɩ Sesi nɩɛ ɛɛ' "Ju ‑o.

Nyɔ ‑ɔ ‑jea Kea' a "Ju a ‑tɩ' tɔ' 'ʋn ɛ, ‑mɛ ka dɛ Kea 'tmʋa ɛ nɩa tɔ' ‑tɩ ɛ, ɔ 'wɔɔn‑ 'ɛ. 'Kaa nyɔ ‑ɔ se ɔɔ' ‑tɩ' tɔ' 'ʋn 'je ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑mɔ nʋɛ Kea sɩ 'tmʋi 'ʋn, dɛ‑nʋɛ' dɛ Kea 'tmʋa 'de ɛɛ' "Ju 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn ɛ, ɔ se ɛ tɔ' 'ʋn 'je.
Dɛ ‑ɛ ‑nɩa 'de ɛɛ' wlu tu 'de ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ Kea "nyɩ ‑a 'kmʋnɩa' dee ‑sea' ‑kwɛ ‑ta 'ble 'mɛ ‑wɛe ‑a ‑je ɛɛ' 'kmʋ tu 'de ‑a ‑ke ɛɛ' "ju 'a "i "sia' 'ʋn.
Nyɔ ‑ɔ ‑wɔɔan' ɛɛ' "Ju 'a ‑tɩ' ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔ 'je 'kmʋnɩa' dee ‑mɛ 'mɛ, 'de nyɔ ‑ɔ sea Kea 'a "Ju 'a ‑tɩ' 'wɔɔn‑ ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔ se 'kmʋnɩa' dee 'ble.
'Ma 'crɩ wlu ‑nɛ 'mɛ 'de 'sbɛ 'di ‑wɛe 'ma poo aopʋ ‑jei", 'de aopʋ ‑ɔ ‑tea Kea 'a "Ju 'a 'nynɩ ‑kwlɩ" ɛ, ka ao 'jea 'kmʋnɩa' dee sea' ‑kwɛ ‑ta 'ble, 'de ao 'je kan' 'je.
Ao ‑gbʋn 'nɔ, tɔ' tba ‑ta ‑a ‑blea 'bo Kea "juɔi ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ dɛ ‑aa ‑tee ɛ i, ‑bo ɛ nɩ ɛɛ' ‑kwlʋtɩ ɛ, ‑mɛ ɛɛ muɛ ‑aa wlu doin" o poa' see.
Ka ɛɛ poa ‑aa baewlu doin" o, ‑bo ‑a ‑je kan' ‑mɔ 'ja a, ‑mɛ ka dɛ ‑a ‑teea i ɛ 'kpa 'de ‑a 'kwa a, ‑a ‑je kan' ‑mɔ ‑ke.

‑Bo ‑ma de'di a sea dɛsaʋn ‑ɛɛ' kpa nyʋ 'de 'mɛa' 'ʋn nʋ, ‑wɛe ‑ɩn ‑je ɔ 'je ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑ɩn bae ɔɔ' Kea, ‑wɛe Kea 'je ɔ 'kmʋnɩa' "nyɩ. Dɛsaʋn 'ɩn "sia 'nynɩ ɛ, ɛ se ɔ 'de 'mɛa' ‑sea' ‑kwɛ ‑ta 'ble 'ʋn kpai. 'Kaa dɛsaʋn jrɛ' ‑nɩ 'o, ‑wɛe ‑bo nyʋ nʋ 'de ‑ɛɛ kpa nyʋ 'de 'mɛa' sea' ‑kwɛ ‑ta 'ble 'ʋn, 'ɩn se 'na ao bae ‑mɛ 'ɛ dɛsaʋn tu 'a baea'.
'Ma 'cɛ, kplɩn saɩn "o kplɩn saɩn nyiɔ ɔ nʋa ɩ nɩɛ dɛsaʋn ‑o, 'kaa dɩsaɩn jrɩ' ‑nɩ 'o ‑wɛe ‑ɩa' po 'mɛa' "jru "kpei‑.
‑A ‑je kan' 'mɛ nyɔ ‑nɩa Kea 'a nyɔ ɛ, ‑mɔɔ' kpa dɛsaʋn nʋa' nya, dɛ‑nʋɛ' Kea 'a "Ju Sesi ‑a fuo ɔ i, 'diwɔnynii se ɛ 'bɛɛ‑ ɔ 'je ɔ "ibla.
‑Bo 'diwɔnynii 'ble 'kmʋ ‑wee' "klein wlu "kpei mɔ 'de ɛ, ka ‑apʋ mɔ nɩa Kea 'a 'cɛ ɛ, ‑a ‑je kan' 'mɛ.

Ka Kea 'a "Ju jia 'nɔ 'kmʋ "kpei ‑wɛe ɔ po ‑a tɔ'di 'de ‑a ‑jua Kea ‑cɛɛn' ɛ, ‑a ‑je kan' 'mɛ ‑ke. Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ ‑a ‑ti" 'de Kea ‑cɛɛn' 'ʋn ‑bo ‑a ‑ke ɛɛ' "Ju Sesi Klisɩ "sii‑ "i ɛ. Ɛɛ' Kea tu mɛ ‑nɩ Kea ‑cɛɛn'‑, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ 'kmʋnɩa' sea' ‑kwɛ ‑ta 'ble ɛ.
'Ma "nynuu‑, ao ‑tu" aoa' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ ‑tɩ', kɔin nyiɔpʋ a ‑gbɛɛa' "juɔi ‑ɩ sea Kea nɩ ɛ, ao ke ɩ ‑seea' i.
II John: 'Mɔ Kea ‑gbu 'a nyɔsoa, aopʋ Kea 'cra i ‑wɛe ɛ ‑teea kpɔi" ɛ, 'mɔ ‑ɔɔ ja aopʋ 'sbɛ‑. 'Ɩn kma aoa' ‑tɩ' ‑cɛɛn'‑, 'de ɛ se 'ma 'sʋ mɔ ‑kma aoa' ‑tɩ' nɩ‑, 'kaa nyʋ "klein ‑ʋʋ ‑jua tɔ' ‑tɩ ɛ, ʋʋ kma aoa' ‑tɩ' ‑ke,
dɛ‑nʋɛ' tɔ' ‑tɩ "ti 'de ‑a 'ʋn 'ɛ ‑wɛe ɛ ke ‑aa mu nɩa' jeejee.
'Saaʋn o, nyʋ 'a wɛe 'jea' o, pɛe 'a blua' ‑ɩ ‑wlʋa 'e Kea ‑ɛ ‑nɩa "Bo ke ɛɛ' "Ju Sesi Klisɩ 'ʋn ɛ, ɩ ke aoa muɛ naa' wɛe ‑ao ‑je tɔ' ‑tɩ juo‑ jeejee 'de ‑ao ‑je ba 'a ‑tɩ' kma due 'due.
Dɛ aa' "nynuu 'a jrʋ' a naa 'o tɔ' ‑tɩ 'a ‑jei" ɛ, ‑mɛ 'bleɛ 'ma 'mʋa‑. Ka ‑a "Bo "sia 'nynɩ ‑wɛe ‑a ‑jea nʋ, 'kamɔ ‑nao.
'De kaan ka la 'ma de'di ‑wi", dɛ 'ma ‑tee' a aopʋ‑ i ɛ, ɛ se kɛ' dee nɩ‑, 'kaa kɛ' ‑a ‑jua see ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑o. Ɛɛ' kɛ' tu mɛ ‑nɩ ‑a ‑je ba 'a ‑tɩ' kma due 'due.
Ba 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' ‑nɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ‑a ‑je Kea 'a kɛ' wɔn 'je. Ɛmɛ ao 'cɩan tɛin" sese ‑wɛe ‑ɛɛ dɛ tu 'je aopʋ ‑je o po.
Dɛɛ‑tɩ 'ɩn 'da kan' a, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ nyʋ 'srɛipooʋn ‑tuu"‑tuu ‑nɩ 'e 'blʋa‑ "kpei, ‑ʋʋa' tɔɔ Sesi Klisɩ 'a nyiɔ 'ʋn ‑snɛɛ ‑tɩ. 'De nyɔ ‑ɔɔ ‑tmʋa ‑mɩ ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑mɔ ɔ 'tmʋɛ sɩ, ɔ nɩɛ Klisɩ 'a o ‑fɔin ‑o.
‑Jɛ ɛ nɩa kan' ‑mɔ 'ja a, ‑mɛ ao ‑tu" aoa' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ ‑tɩ' ‑wɛe dbo ao nʋa ɛ je idooa foo" 'ʋn, 'kaa ao kpʋʋn aoa' ‑cɛ" i, ‑wɛe ao 'je aoa' dboa 'a ‑kei" ‑cɛɛn' 'je.

Dɛ ‑jɛ Klisɩ 'a ‑cɛ" 'kpa tɔɔa nyʋ ɛ, nyɔ "o nyɔ ‑sea' 'e ‑mɛ 'dei ‑te, ‑wɛe ‑ɔ cɛan ‑mɛ "kpei ‑tie" ɛ, ‑mɛ ‑mɔ se Kea 'a dɛ nɩ‑. 'De dɛ Klisɩ tɔɔa nyʋ, nyɔ ‑ɔ ‑tea 'e ‑mɛ 'dei ɛ, ‑mɛ ɔ ke "Bo ke "Ju "siiɛ "i.
‑Bo nyɔ ji 'de aopʋ "klu ‑wɛe ɔ se ɩa' dɩ tu nyʋ tɔɔ ɛ, ao 'bo ɔ sɩn 'sɔɔn kpʋɛn, ‑wɛe ɔɔ' 'jewlu o po‑tɩ,
dɛ‑nʋɛ' nyɔ ‑ɔ poa ɔɔ' jei tu 'snɛ 'ja a, ‑mɛ dɩsaɩn ɔɔ nʋa ɔ ke ‑mɔ ɔ nʋ ɩ.

Dɩ ‑tuu"‑tuu ‑nɩ 'bo 'ʋn ‑kwlɩ", ‑wɛe 'ɩn 'je ao ‑pee 'tmʋʋ 'de‑, 'kaa 'ɩn se ɛ "inɩ ‑wɛe 'ɩn 'je 'sbɛni 'ʋn "duo‑, 'de 'ɩn 'jɩ ‑wee' 'crɩ 'bo 'sbɛ "kpei, dɛ‑nʋɛ' 'ma naa tɔ' i 'ɩn 'na 'ɩn 'je 'de aopʋ o ji ‑wɛe ao ke 'ma ‑a ‑je "jru "ikooɔ‑, 'de ‑a ‑wee' 'je 'e 'mʋa‑ klaa" 'ʋn nɩ‑.
Aoa' de'di Kea 'cra i ‑ke ɛ, ʋʋ 'a "nynuu 'na ʋʋpʋ ‑je aʋn.
III John: 'Mɔ ‑ɔ ‑nɩa Kea ‑gbu 'a nyɔsoa a, 'ma de 'di Kaisɩ, ‑mɔ ɔɔ' ‑tɩ' 'ɩn kma 'de tɔ' ‑tɩ 'ʋn, ‑mɔ 'ma ja 'sbɛ‑.
'Ma ‑tɩ' kmai‑, dɛ ‑ɛɛ baea' 'ma baea 'de ‑ma ‑tɩ' 'ʋn ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ dɩ ‑wee' "klein 'je ‑ʋn kwa 'wɔɔn‑, ‑wɛe ka ‑ma ‑suu nɩa 'o tɔ' ‑tɩ 'a ‑jei" ɛ, 'de ‑ɩn ‑je kui ‑sɔn i flɔan' 'ble kan' ‑ke.
Dɛ ‑ɛ ‑blea 'ma 'mʋa‑ kpleiin, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ‑aa de 'di‑wi" jrʋ' ‑ʋʋ ‑wlʋa 'de ‑ma Kea ‑gbu 'di ɛ, ʋʋpʋ ‑po' 'ʋn "kuan, ʋʋ 'na ‑ma ‑jeɛ tɔ' ‑tɩ 'a "dia, ‑wɛe ka ɩ "sia 'nynɩ ɛ, 'de ‑ma na kan'.
Ka aopʋ‑ ‑nɩa 'ma "nynuu‑ 'de Kea 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn ‑wɛe, aoa naa 'bo tɔ' ‑tɩ 'a ‑jei" ɛ, ‑bo 'ɩn 'wɔn ɩ ɛ, ɩ 'bleɛ 'ma 'mʋa‑, ɩ je dɛ "o dɛ ‑wee' "klein ‑sii.
'Ma ‑tɩ' kmai‑, dɛ ‑aa de'di ‑wi" ‑wlʋa Kea ‑gbi 'dii ‑wɛe ‑ʋʋ jia 'dʋʋa' 'de ‑ma Kea ‑gbu 'di 'de ‑ɩn ‑kpʋʋn a ʋʋpʋ sɩn 'sɔɔn ɛ, ‑mɛ nmɔ "jrii. Ka Kea 'a ‑jei" naai a nʋa, 'kamɔ ‑nao.
Ka ‑ɩn ‑kma nyʋ 'a ‑tɩ' ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑ɛɛ "kuan ʋʋ po 'e Kea ‑gbu "juɛi. ‑Bo ʋʋ 'je ʋʋa' 'dʋʋa' nya kpa a, ‑mɛ ‑ɩn po ʋʋpʋ sʋn o, 'ma bae ‑ʋn ɛ. ‑Bo ‑ɩn nʋ kan' a, ɛmɛ ke Kea ‑kooɔ' "i,
dɛ‑nʋɛ' Sesi Klisɩ 'a ‑tɩ' mɛ ʋʋ mu 'tmʋʋa'. Ʋʋ 'wɔan mu‑tɩ 'de ɔɔ' 'nynɩ 'ʋn ɛ, ʋʋ se ɛ "inɩ ʋʋ 'je dɛ "o dɛ jrɛ' i ‑tee' 'de nyʋ ‑ʋʋ sea Kea 'a ‑jei" naa 'kwa.
Nyʋ ‑ʋʋa nʋa kan' ‑mɔ 'ja a, ‑mɛ ‑apʋ ‑je ʋʋpʋ sʋn o po, ‑wɛe ʋʋ ke ‑a ‑je tɔ' ‑tɩ 'a dbo nʋ ‑tadue.
‑Sɔo ɛ, 'ɩn pooɛ Kea ‑gbu 'sbɛ jrɛ' ‑jei", 'kaa dɛ 'ɩn 'tmʋa 'de ɛ 'di ɛ, Diotrɛfɩ 'na ɔ se ɛ doʋn" o poi, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ɔ nɩɛ "i ɔ 'je nyʋ ‑wee' "klein 'a nya nɩ‑.

Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ ‑bo 'ɩn ji ɛ, 'de 'ɩn 'je aopʋ ɔɔ' nʋʋdɩ 'a "kuan po. Dɩ ɔ nʋa ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ɔɔ wluuɛ ‑a 'dei. 'De ɛ se ‑mɛɛ' 'sʋ nɩ‑, ɔ se nyiiɔ nɩ 'de ‑aa de'di ‑wi" ‑pee. ‑Bo nyʋ jrʋ' nɩɛ "i ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'je ‑aa de'di ‑wi" 'dɔe "jrii nʋ ɛ, ɔɔ kaan ʋʋpʋ ‑je de, ‑wɛe ɔ 'na ao 'wlʋ 'nɔ 'ma Kea ‑gbu 'di.
'Ma ‑tɩ' kmai‑, ‑ɩn ‑bo dɛsaʋn nʋa' 'cɩan‑, 'kaa ‑ɩn ‑cɩan dɛ ‑cɛɛn' nʋa'. Nyɔ ‑ɔɔ nʋa dɛ ‑cɛɛn' ɛ, ɔmɔ ‑nɩ Kea 'a nyɔ. Nyɔ ‑ɔɔ nʋa dɛsaʋn ɛ, ɔ se Kea juo‑.

'De Demetrisɩ ‑mɔ ɛ, nyʋ ‑wee' "klein a po ɔ ‑tɩ' o. Tɔ' ‑tɩ ʋʋ 'tmʋa 'de ɔɔ' ‑tɩ' 'ʋn ɛ, ɛ poɛ "jri "kpae' 'de ɔɔ' 'kmʋ 'ʋn. ‑Apʋ mɔ ‑ke ɛ, ‑aa po ɔ ‑tɩ' o ‑ke. ‑Ma ‑cɛ" 'kpa 'je kan' 'mɛ, dɩ ‑aa ‑tmʋa 'de ɔɔ' ‑tɩ' 'ʋn ɛ, ɩ nɩɛ tɔ' ‑o.
Dɩ ‑tuu"‑tuu ‑nɩ 'bo 'ʋn ‑kwlɩ" 'ɩn 'je 'crɩ 'de 'sbɛ 'di, ‑wɛe 'ɩn 'je ‑ʋn ‑jei" poo 'de‑, 'kaa 'ɩn se ɛ "i nɩ 'ɩn 'je 'sbɛni ke 'sbɛcrɩ tu 'ʋn "duo‑ ‑wɛe 'ɩn 'jɩ 'crɩ,
Pɛe 'a blua' nɩ 'de ‑ɩn 'ʋn ! ‑Aa de'di ‑wi" 'na ʋʋpʋ ‑je ‑ʋn. 'Mɔ ‑je ‑aa de'di ‑wi" due 'due.
Jude: 'Mɔ Suidɩ, 'ɩn nɩɛ Sakɩ 'a "dei ‑o, ‑wɛe 'ma nʋʋ Sesi Klisɩ "juɔi. Aopʋ ‑ɔɔ ‑tɩ' ‑a "Bo Kea kma ‑wɛe ɛ 'da 'de ‑ɔ ‑tea Sesi Klisɩ 'a ‑tea' a, 'mɔ ‑ɔɔ ja aopʋ 'sbɛ‑.
'Ɩn nɩɛ "i Kea 'je aoa' wɛe 'je, 'de ɛ 'je ao ɛɛ' pɛe 'a blua' ke ɛɛ' nyʋ 'a ‑tɩ' kmaa' wɔn "jii‑.

'Ma ‑tɩ' kmaʋn, ka Kea nʋa ‑a ‑wee' 'a 'pʋʋsʋn ɛ, 'ma ‑pɔn 'ɩn 'je ɛɛ' 'sbɛ aopʋ ‑jei" poo. ‑Ta 'ɩn nɩɩa ɛɛ' 'sbɛ tu 'a 'crɩa 'a, 'bomɔ dɛ ‑jɛ ‑kɔan ‑tɩ' 'kpaa' 'bo 'ʋn ‑kwlɩ", ɛmɛ ‑tɩ 'ma 'tmʋ ɛ 'de ao ‑pee. Ɛɛ' dɛ tu mɛ ‑nɩ Kea 'a tʋ ‑fɔan'. Kea 'a ‑tɩ' ao 'jea tɔ' 'ʋn ɛ, ɩ ‑teeɛ ɛɛ' nyʋ kwa 'bode, ɩa' poo fai". Ao kpʋn 'e "jri ‑wɛe ao 'je ɩa' tʋ ‑fɔn'.

Dɛɛ‑tɩ 'ɩn 'da kan' a, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ nyʋ jrʋ' ‑ʋʋa' 'je Kea 'a wlu wɔn ‑wɛe ‑ʋʋ ‑nɩ 'de ao "klu wɔɔ‑ 'sʋ ao se juo‑. Ʋʋa' nyʋ tu ɛ, ʋʋ 'naa ‑jɛ ‑aa Kea a 'jea nyʋ 'a wɛe la ‑mɛ dɛ "o dɛ ‑jia' 'de ʋʋpʋ "jru 'di ɛ, ʋʋ 'bɛɛ‑ ʋʋ 'je ɛ nʋ. 'De ɛɛ' ‑tɩ' 'ʋn ɛ, Sesi Klisɩ ‑ɔɔ 'sʋ nɩa ‑aa 'Blei ke Tʋ"bo ɛ, ʋʋa' doin" se ɔɔ' ‑tɩ' inɩ‑. Ka Kea 'a 'pee kpʋn a ʋʋa' nyʋ tu ɛ, ɛ 'crɩɩɛ' sese 'de ɛɛ' 'sbɛ 'di.

Dɩ ao jua see ɛ, ɩmɩ 'ma ‑pɔn 'ɩn 'je aopʋ ‑kwlʋ o poo‑. ‑Ta Kea ‑saa Israɛ‑nyʋ kʋɔnkwla' 'de Esipʋ‑blʋa "kpei ɛ, nyʋ "klein ‑ʋʋ ‑kua "jru ‑wɛe ‑ʋʋ ‑na ‑ʋʋ se ɛ wɔn 'jei ɛ, ʋʋ ‑wee' "klein 'mɛɛ 'bo ‑jei".

'Kamɔ ɛ nɩ ‑ke 'de Kea 'a "soa‑wi" jrʋ' 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn. ‑Tein 'dɔe ‑jɛ Kea "nyɩa ʋʋpʋ 'de jaʋn 'di ‑bo ʋʋ nɩ 'o "kpei ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'jea ni' wɔn nɩ ɛ, ʋʋ 'bɔ 'o ‑mɔ 'mɛ. Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ Kea po ʋʋpʋ "cɩn bɩ', ‑wɛe ɛ ‑te' ʋʋpʋ i 'bo ‑ta ‑kpea i ɛ, 'bomɔ ʋʋ 'je nɩ mamaʋ 'sʋ ɛ 'je 'pee 'jewɩ klaa" jɛɛ‑.

Nyʋ ‑ʋʋ ‑nɩa 'bo Sodɔm ke Gomɔɔ ke, ‑kwlɛ ‑ke ɩ "kʋʋan i 'dii ɛ, dɛ ‑nʋʋa ʋʋpʋ "jrii ao po ɛ ‑kwlʋ o ‑ke. Dɩ ‑ɩa ‑dbaa' nyʋ ‑tɩn' "i, ‑wɛe ‑ɩ ‑sea' nʋ ka nɩ ɛ, ɩmɩ ʋʋa' 'blʋku a po ʋʋpʋ ‑je o 'sʋ ʋʋa nʋ ba "jrii. Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ Kea ja nɛ, 'de ɛ ‑sa ʋʋpʋ 'a ‑kwlɛ i. Dɛ ‑ɛ ‑nʋʋa ʋʋpʋ "jrii 'mʋa‑ a, ɛmɛ ‑saa nyʋ ‑wee' "klein fɛn' 'de nɛ ‑sea' 'mʋ‑ta 'ble 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn, ‑wɛe ka ʋʋpʋ nʋa nyʋ je kan' nʋ ‑ke.

Nyʋ ‑ʋʋ pa 'de aopʋ "klu ɛ, dɩsaɩn due' ‑nɩ mɩ ʋʋpʋ a nʋ ‑ke. Ʋʋ 'na Kea tɔɔ ʋʋpʋ dɩ 'de jajri 'ʋn. 'De ɛɛ' ‑tɩ' 'ʋn ɛ, ʋʋa kpʋʋɛn ʋʋa' 'blʋku ‑flɛn" 'de dɛsaʋn nʋa' 'ʋn, ‑wɛe dɛ ʋʋ 'blea "jru kpɔ' i ‑tei ɛ, ɛɛ nyaa ʋʋpʋ i, 'de ʋʋa to Kea 'a "soa‑wi" wɔn o.

Dɛ ʋʋpʋ nʋa 'mʋa‑, Misɛlɩ ‑jɔ ‑nɩa Kea 'a "soa‑wi" 'a klaa" a, ‑mɔ se ‑mɛ nʋ kpɛ due'. ‑Ta ɔ ke ‑siɔn' kpʋʋan "wɔin 'de Moisɩ 'a "ku 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn ɛ, ɔ se ɔ wɔn o to kpɛ due' ‑wɛe ɔɔ' ‑soo' opoo‑tɩ, 'kaa ɔ 'naa : ‑Siɔn', Tʋ"bo 'a ‑cɛ" 'kpa ‑je ‑ʋn "bli ‑cɛ' !

'Kaa ʋʋa' nyʋ tu ɛ, dɩ "klein ʋʋa' 'wɔan 'dei ɛ, ʋʋa wlaa ‑mɩ 'mɛ jeejee. 'De dɩ "klein ʋʋa' pɛe a tɔɔa ʋʋpʋ ɛ, ɩmɩ ʋʋa bla 'o 'de, ka 'kwla 'dinmi a nʋa, 'kamɔ ʋʋa nʋ. Dɩ ʋʋa nʋa 'mʋa‑ ɩmɩ ‑ɩa mu ʋʋa' 'mɛa' "jru "kpei‑ poa'.

Ɛ nɩɛ "nmia‑tɩ ‑o 'de ʋʋa' ‑tɩ' 'ʋn, dɛ‑nʋɛ' ʋʋ bla 'o Kaɩn 'a ‑kɔ 'de. Ʋʋa 'kpa 'wɛi 'a 'tʋn o ʋʋa jea 'e Balaam 'a ‑kɔ 'de bla ʋʋa jea blu. Ʋʋa' "jrukua' poɛ ʋʋpʋ 'a "maa "jru "kpei‑, ka Kore nʋa 'de ɛ.

‑Bo ʋʋ ke aopʋ 'kɩɩn‑ "jrui ‑wɛe aoa sea ‑tadue dii ɛ, ɛɛ 'kɔɔ‑ aoa' "jua‑, ‑wɛe ɛɛ dooa aopʋ 'a 'nynɩ. Ʋʋ nyniiɛ 'de aopʋ "klu i. Ʋʋa' nyʋ tu ɛ, dɛdia' 'a ‑tɩn 'a nʋ ʋʋpʋ. Ʋʋa' naa nyɔ jrɔ' 'ɔ ‑tɩ' tɔ' "kpei‑, ʋʋpʋ 'a 'sʋ 'je di, ʋʋ 'je dbo, ɛmɛ ʋʋa ‑pɔn i jeejee. Ʋʋ se nʋʋdbo 'ble, ʋʋa' kpʋn wlu "kpei, dɩ nyʋ ‑teea ʋʋpʋ ‑kwlɩ", ʋʋa' nʋ ɩ. Ka ‑bo "ni jii 'de jaʋn‑kwlʋ ‑ji ‑ji ‑wɛe ‑bo poɔ' ji ɛ ‑sia' 'de ɛɛ' dba a, 'kamɔ ʋʋpʋ nɩ‑. Ao 'je kan' 'mɛ ke'wlɛ ti ‑bo ti 'a cro nɔ" nyni ‑wɛe ‑ɩa' croa, 'de ‑ɩa puua ‑mɛ ‑mɩ 'mɛɛ "pɔnpɔn.

Ʋʋa' nyʋ tu ɛ, dɩ ‑ɩ ‑ke ʋʋ ‑kɔɔa' ke'wlɛ, ɩ ka : Ka ‑bo 'tɔn ni 'fea srɩ' ‑gboe ‑wɛe ɛɛ' 'wlʋa ‑gblɛun" 'de ɛɛ' fɩʋn' a boa ɛ kpʋn a ‑flɛn" ɛ, 'kamɔ ʋʋa' dɩsaɩn nɩ‑. Ʋʋa' nyʋ tu, ka 'cʋ‑sɩɩn ‑ɩa' kpʋn a 'bo ɩa' ‑teɩn "kpei‑ nɩa, 'kamɔ ʋʋ nɩ ‑ke. Kea nmae ʋʋa' ‑teɩn 'mɛ 'bo ‑ta ‑nɩa ‑plipli ɛ, 'bomɔ ʋʋ 'je i ‑te jeejee.
Enɔkɩ ‑ɔ ‑nɩa nyiɔ 'ɔ "ji ‑ɛ tba 'de Adam "kpei 'a ‑mɛ" 'sɔn ‑nɔ ɛ, ɔmɔ ‑wlu ka tɛin" sese 'de ʋʋa' nyʋ tu 'a ‑tɩ' 'ʋn. Ɔ 'naa : Ao ‑gbʋn 'nɔ, Tʋ"bo ke ɔɔ' "soa‑wi" 'a ‑kwlʋ ‑tuu"‑tuu a muɛ jia',
‑wɛe ɔ 'je nyʋ ‑wee' "klein 'a 'pee 'je. 'De nyʋ "klein ‑ʋʋa' 'jea Kea wɔn ‑wɛe ‑ʋʋa nʋa dɩsaɩn ɛ, ʋʋa' wɔn 'je "mu, ‑wɛe wlu saɩn klae" klae" ʋʋa' nyʋ tu 'tmʋa Kea ‑pee ɛ, ʋʋ 'je ɩa' "kuan po.

Ʋʋa' nyʋ tu a wluuɛ nyʋ 'dei jeejee, dɩ ‑wee' "klein a kpʋn ɛ ʋʋpʋ ‑kwlʋ, dɛ ʋʋ nɩa 'ʋn ɛ, ɛɛ' bluua ʋʋa' pɛe‑. Dɩ ʋʋa' pɛe a pooa "i, mɩ ‑ɩa po ʋʋpʋ ‑je o. ‑Cɛi" 'bɛ ‑wlu klae" ‑nɩ, ɩa' 'sʋ ‑a ji 'de ʋʋpʋ 'wɔn. Ʋʋa pooɛ nyʋ 'srɛ i ‑wɛe ʋʋ 'je dɛ 'je, 'de ʋʋa dii nyiɔpʋ 'ʋn, ʋʋa ple i.
'Kaa 'ma ‑tɩ' kmaʋn aopʋ mɔ ɛ, wlu "klein ‑aa Tʋ"bo Sesi Klisɩ 'a dbonʋʋn 'tmʋʋa aopʋ tɛin", ao 'bʋɩ o "mae !

Dɛ ʋʋ 'tmʋa 'de ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ ‑sɔntɩ 'blʋa 'a mua ‑kwɛa' a, aopʋ ‑ɔɔ naa Kea 'a ‑jei" ka ‑cɔɔn' ka a, nyʋ jrʋ' a muɛ aopʋ wlaa'. Ʋʋa' nyʋ tu se Kea juo‑. Dɩsaɩn ‑ɩa nʋa ʋʋa' pɛe 'tʋn ɛ, ɩmɩ ‑ɩa po ʋʋpʋ ‑je o.
Nyʋ ‑nɩa 'mʋa‑ ʋʋpʋ ‑a nʋɛ ‑wɛe nyiɔpʋ a 'nyɩɩɛ 'ʋn 'de ʋʋa ‑seea' i. Dɛɛ‑tɩ ʋʋa nʋa kan' a, ɛmɛ ‑nɩ Kea 'a ‑Suu se 'de ʋʋpʋ 'ʋn nɩ‑, ʋʋa' nyiɔtɔ' mɛ ‑ɛɛ po ʋʋpʋ ‑je o.

'Kaa 'ma ‑tɩ' kmaʋn aopʋ mɔ kpʋʋn aoa' ‑cɛ" i ‑wɛe ao 'je ba sʋn o po 'de Kea 'a wlu 'cɩan' 'ʋn, 'de aoa' Kea ‑kwlɩ" ‑tea' ‑ɛ ‑siia dɩ ‑wee' 'je 'boa ɛ 'je nya mu. 'De ‑bo aoa sea Kea bae ao "tai‑ Kea 'a ‑Suu "i ɛ 'je aopʋ ‑je o po.
Ka Kea kma aoa' ‑tɩ', ao po ɛ ‑kwlʋ o jeejee, ‑wɛe ao 'je ba 'a ‑tɩ' kma kan' mamaʋ 'sʋ ‑aa Tʋ"bo Sesi Klisɩ 'a nyʋ 'a wɛe 'jea 'je "jri "kpae' po, ‑wɛe ɔ ke ‑a ‑je 'kmʋ nɩ jeejee.
Nyʋ ‑a pleea pɛe i, ao 'je ʋʋpʋ 'a wɛe‑, ao nʋɛ mamaʋ ka 'pʋʋa' 'a ‑tɩ' nɩa tɔ', ʋʋ 'je ɛ juo 'pepe.

Nyʋ jrʋ' ‑nɩ 'e mu ke'wlɛ ‑wi" ‑mʋ "kʋʋan‑ 'e nɛ 'ʋn mua' i. Ao nʋɛ mamaʋ 'sʋ ʋʋ 'je nɛ ‑sea' 'mʋ‑ta 'ble wɔin" 'pʋʋ. Nyʋ jrʋ' ‑nɩ 'emu ke'wlɛ ‑ʋʋa wɛe ao 'je 'je. 'Kaa ‑bo aoa sea ‑wi" ‑mʋ 'a wɛe 'je ɛ, ao ‑tu" aoa' ‑cɛ" 'ɛ ‑tɩ', ‑wɛe ao je ʋʋa' 'ʋnpaadɩ "ibla, dɛ‑nʋɛ' dɩsaɩn ʋʋa nʋa ɩ kpʋʋɛn ʋʋa' dɩ ‑wee' "klein ‑flɛn".
Kea ‑ɛ ‑bɛɛa' ‑ɛ ‑jea aopʋ 'de ifuo ɛ, ‑wɛe ao jea 'e dɛsaʋn 'di 'kpa a, ao po ɛ 'sɛ‑ ! Ɛɛ muɛ nʋa' ‑wɛe ‑sɔntɩ aoa mua 'de ɛɛ' ‑sɔn' 'ʋn mua' a, ao se ‑kɔ ‑pʋn" nɩi ‑wɛe 'mʋa‑ klaa" 'je aopʋ nʋ.

Kea ‑ɛ ‑nɩa due' koun ‑gbai' ‑wɛe ‑ɛ ‑nɩa ‑aa 'Pʋʋi 'de ‑aa Tʋ"bo Sesi Klisɩ 'ʋn ɛ, ‑aa ‑bɛɛ' ɛɛ' 'nynɩ "i. Dɛ ‑tba' 'e tɛin" sese o, ‑wɛe ‑ɛ ‑jɛɛa ‑sɩanwɩ ɛ, 'nynɩ 'wlʋa' o, kɛɛma' nɩa' o, "ikmaa' o, dɛwɔn‑sia' nɩɛ ɛɛ' dɛ ‑o 'de nɔ" "o nɔ" ‑wee' 'di ! 'Kamɔ ɛ nɩ‑ !
Revelation of John: Dɩ Sesi Klisɩ ‑sa 'kwla 'de Kea 'a ‑jei" naaʋn ‑pee ɩmɩ ‑crɩɩɛ' 'de 'sbɛ ‑nɛ 'di. Kea mɛ ‑nyɩ" ɩa' dɩ tu Sesi Klisɩ ‑wɛe ɔ 'jɩ to 'de ɔɔ' dbonʋʋn ‑pee, 'de ka ɩa mua ‑too" 'a ɩ 'jea 'o nyni ɛ, ʋʋ 'jɩ juo‑. Ɛmɛ ‑tɩ Sesi Klisɩ dbo ɔɔ' "soai 'de ɔɔ' dbonʋi San o ‑wɛe ɛ 'je ɔ 'tmʋʋ‑.
Wlu Kea 'tmʋa ‑wɛe Sesi Klisɩ nynia 'o ɛ, 'mɔ San ‑nɩ ɩa' ‑ta 'jei, ‑wɛe dɩ "klein 'ɩn 'jeea "jriɛ‑ ɛ, 'ɩn 'crɩɩ 'de 'sbɛ 'di.
Nyɔ ‑ɔɔ nʋa 'sbɛ ‑nɛ 'dii ɔ ke nyɔ "o nyɔ ‑ɔɔ poa dɩ'kwla‑sawlu ‑nɩ doin" o ‑wɛe ‑ɔɔ ‑je ɛ wɔn ɛ, 'mʋa‑ nʋ ‑mɔ, dɛ‑nʋɛ' nɔ" ‑tuu" 'a ‑wɛe ɩa' dɩ tu 'jea 'o nyni ɛ, ɛ "kʋan 'mlai".

'Mɔ San, 'mɔ ‑ɔɔ ‑crɩ 'sbɛ‑ ‑wɛe ‑ɔɔ poo ɛ Kea ‑gbi ‑mɛ" 'sɔn ‑nɩa 'de Asi ‑jei" : Kea ‑ɛ ‑nɩa 'kmʋ tɛin" ‑wɛe ‑ɛ ‑nɩa 'kmʋ ‑sɩan 'de ‑ɛɛ mua jia' a, ɛ ke ‑sii ‑mɛ" 'sɔn ‑nɩa 'bo ɛɛ' tʋ"bokpa‑tɛ "juɔi ke, Sesi Klisɩ ‑ɔɔ ‑tmʋa tɔ' ‑tɩ ‑wɛe ‑ɔ sea wlu fai" poo‑ ɛ, ɛɛ' nyʋ 'a pɛe blua' ke ɛɛ' "diwan kpʋn aopʋ ! Sesi Klisɩ mɔ Kea ‑saa "i, ɛ ‑sa "kunyɩɔ' 'de 'mɛʋn "klu. 'Beɔ "klein ‑nɩa 'nɔ 'kmʋ "kpei ʋʋa' nyɔ se ɔ ‑sii, ɔmɔ ‑nɩ 'bo ʋʋpʋ "jru kpɔ'. Ɔmɔ ‑kma ‑aa ‑tɩ' ‑wɛe ‑ɔɔ nymɔ seie ‑aʋn 'de ‑aa dɩsaɩn 'kwa.

'Mɔ San, 'mɔ ‑ɔɔ ‑crɩ 'sbɛ‑ ‑wɛe ‑ɔɔ poo ɛ Kea ‑gbi ‑mɛ" 'sɔn ‑nɩa 'de Asi ‑jei" : Kea ‑ɛ ‑nɩa 'kmʋ tɛin" ‑wɛe ‑ɛ ‑nɩa 'kmʋ ‑sɩan 'de ‑ɛɛ mua jia' a, ɛ ke ‑sii ‑mɛ" 'sɔn ‑nɩa 'bo ɛɛ' tʋ"bokpa‑tɛ "juɔi ke, Sesi Klisɩ ‑ɔɔ ‑tmʋa tɔ' ‑tɩ ‑wɛe ‑ɔ sea wlu fai" poo‑ ɛ, ɛɛ' nyʋ 'a pɛe blua' ke ɛɛ' "diwan kpʋn aopʋ ! Sesi Klisɩ mɔ Kea ‑saa "i, ɛ ‑sa "kunyɩɔ' 'de 'mɛʋn "klu. 'Beɔ "klein ‑nɩa 'nɔ 'kmʋ "kpei ʋʋa' nyɔ se ɔ ‑sii, ɔmɔ ‑nɩ 'bo ʋʋpʋ "jru kpɔ'. Ɔmɔ ‑kma ‑aa ‑tɩ' ‑wɛe ‑ɔɔ nymɔ seie ‑aʋn 'de ‑aa dɩsaɩn 'kwa.

Ɔmɔ ‑nʋɛ' ‑wɛe ‑a ‑kpa ɔɔ' 'bleenyʋ, 'de ɔmɔ ‑te 'o ‑aʋn ‑wɛe ‑a ‑je ɔ "Bo Kea "juɔi nʋʋ‑ ka 'sraa ‑saʋn ‑nɩa tɛin" nɩa. Ɔmɔ nyʋ 'je 'nynɩ 'wlʋa' o, "ikmanynɩ kpaa‑ 'de ‑sʋn "o ‑sʋn 'di. 'Kamɔ ɛ 'je nɩ !

Ao ‑gbʋn 'nɔ, ɔɔ ji' 'bo buee" 'ʋn, nyʋ ‑wee' "klein a mu ɔ "jriɛ‑ 'jeea'. Nyʋ ‑ʋʋ koɔ ɔ 'bo tu ‑kwlɩ" ɛ, ʋʋa mu ɔ "jriɛ‑ 'jeea' ‑ke. 'Blʋa 'a blo' wɔn‑ ‑wee' "klein a muɛ kpleea' 'de ɔɔ' ‑tɩ' 'ʋn. Kɩɩn, 'kɩ nɩ‑ !
Kea ‑nɩa ‑aa Blei, ɛ kmai" ɛ je dɩ ‑wee' ‑sii. Ɛ nɩɛ 'kmʋ sese, ɛ nɩɛ 'kmʋ ‑sɩan ‑ke, ɛɛ muɛ jia'. Ɛɛ' Kea tu mɛ ‑wlu ka, ɛ 'na : 'Mɔ ‑saa "i, 'mɔ ‑bɔɔ' de.

'Mɔ San 'ɩn nɩɛ aoa' de 'di 'kle aoa 'jea 'de ‑a ‑ke Sesi 'a "i "sii ‑tɩ' 'ʋn ɛ, 'ma 'je ɛ ‑ke. Ao ke 'mɔ ke ‑a ‑plaan 'beɔdɛ due' i ‑wɛe ka "o ka ɛ 'je ɛ nɩ ɛ, ‑a ‑ke Sesi "sii "i. Dɛ 'ɩn 'tmʋa Kea 'a wlu ‑wɛe dɩ 'ɩn 'jea 'de Sesi 'ʋn 'ɩn 'tmʋ ɩ ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑nʋɛ' ‑wɛe ʋʋ kpa 'ʋn 'bo 'tɔniɛ 'a du'. 'Bo 'a ‑ta ‑tu ɛ, nyʋ a 'daa‑ 'o Patimɔsɩ.
'Bo Patimɔsɩ mɔ 'ɩn nɩ‑, ‑jɛ Tʋ"bo 'a ‑kwlewɩ o kaan 'sʋ ɛ, Kea 'a ‑Suu "ji 'de 'ʋn 'ɛ. 'Sʋ 'ɩn 'wɔn nyɔ jrɔ' 'ɔ wlu 'bo 'ʋn 'de ‑wɛe ɔ kpa wlu "jɛi ka ‑kaʋn a wlua.

Ɔ 'na : Dɩ ‑ma ‑jeea' "jriɛ‑ ɛ, ‑ɩn ‑crɩ 'de 'sbɛ 'di ‑wɛe ‑ɩn ‑jɩ Kea ‑gbi ‑mɛ" 'sɔn ‑nɩ ‑jei" poo‑. Ɩa' Kea ‑gbi ‑tu ka : Kea ‑gbu ‑nɩa 'o Efɛsɩ o, Siminɩ o, Pɛɛkamʋ o, Tiatii o, Saadɩ o, Filadɛfi o, Laodise ke.
‑Ta 'ma "biia i ‑wɛe nyɔ ‑ɔɔ wlua 'ʋn ‑pee 'ɩn 'je ɔ "jriɛ‑ 'jee‑ 'sʋ ɛ, 'ɩn 'jeeɛ ‑dam'ba ‑tuu"‑tuu "jriɛ‑ 'bo ‑dam'ba 'a "kpei ‑tedɩ ‑mɛ" 'sɔn "kpei. Ɩa' ‑dam'ba 'a "kpei ‑tedɩ ‑tu ɛ, 'sani ‑nʋɩ'.
'Sʋ 'ɩn 'jeeɛ "ju due' "jriɛ‑ 'bo ɩa' ‑kwea'‑, ‑ɔ ‑ke nyiɔ 'ɔ "ju ‑kooɔ'‑. "Bai ɔ paa 'ʋn ɛ, ɛ tba i 'de ɔ boin o kpɔ‑ kpɔ‑ ‑wɛe ɔ bla 'saniwlʋ ‑kwlʋ 'di.
Ɔɔ' "jru "pluu' "puu'‑ ka jee" ‑fua" nɩa, ɔɔ' "jri a wan' ka nɛmɩɩɔ nɩa.
Ɔɔ' bɩ a fan' ka ‑bo nyʋ tba ‑tiɛn 'o "jri ‑wɛe ɛ ‑sainya 'de nɛklɩn' 'ʋn ɛ, 'kamɔ ɩ nɩ‑. Ɔɔ' wlu ‑kɔ' "ni‑gbuu klaa" 'a klu 'ɩn.
Ɔɔ' diansʋn 'bleɛ 'cʋ‑sɩɩn ‑mɛ" 'sɔn kwa. ‑Placnɛ ‑nma" 'a ‑wɛe ‑ɛɛ "jri nɩa 'sɔɔn ɛ, ɛmɛ ‑ɛɛ ‑wlʋ 'de ɔ 'wɔn. Ɔɔ' "jua‑ a fan' ka ‑bo 'jrʋ ‑te ‑gbao ‑wɛe ɛɛ fan.
‑Ta 'ɩn 'jee ɔ "jriɛ‑ 'sʋ ɛ, 'ɩn ‑ka i 'bo ɔ bɩ o, ka nyɔ ɔ 'mɛa. 'Sʋ ɔ ‑teɛ' 'ʋn ɔɔ' diansʋn "kpei ‑wɛe ɔ wlu ka, ɔ 'na : Faʋn 'bo ‑ʋn ‑nʋɛ ! 'Mɔ ‑saa "i 'mɔ ‑bɔɔ' de.
'Ɩn nɩɛ 'kmʋ. 'Ɩn 'mɛɛ 'de‑, 'kaa kaan ka 'ɩn nɩɛ 'kmʋ 'bode ‑bode 'bode. 'Ɩn 'bleɛ "ikmaa' 'bo 'mɛa' ke ‑ta 'mɛʋn nɩa "kpei.
